Pu piw pam sukw tūwutsit akw pumuy amumi yuaaykuqe paṅqawu: Oveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya pēk̇enit anta; put wuhti kwúsuhqe, payhp tuwanit ṅumnit enaṅ namiqwrilaṅwu; noqw pam sohsok put pēk̇enaṅwu.
Iit yantaqat sohsok Jesus sinmuy amumi tūwutsit akw yuaata; nihqe pam tūwutsit qa akw yuaatanik, pay amumi qa yuaataṅwu.
Yan Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat hin lavayhtiqa aw antsaniwa; pam ura paṅqawu: Nu tūwutsit hihta tuawi’taqat akw yuaatani; nu tūwaqatsit hisat yukiltiqat aṅqaqw hihta tupkiwyuṅqat paṅqawni.
Pahsat pu Jesus sinmuy aṅqe’ hōnat, kīmi paki. Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam aw ökihqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Um as söhövostusaqat hihta tuawi’taqat itamuy āawnani.
Noqw pam hu’waqe amumi paṅqawu: I’ lolmat poshumit uyhqa hapi nūu, Sinot Tíata.
Noqw pāsa hapi yep qatsi. Lomavoshumi hapi moṅwtunatyat aṅqw sinoiwtaqamu; noqw sohövostusaqa hapi hakiy qalolmat sinomatu.
Pu tuwqa, pumuy uyhqa hapi i’ Nukpana; yep qatsit so’ṅwamiq pituqw, pahsat pu höhöqsattiqat antani, noqw aṅ tsovalayaniqam hapi ōveqatsit aṅqw hoṅvia’yamu.
Noqw ōviy hapi söhövostusu tsovalaniwht, qȫhit akw taqtsokiwhq, pay pan hapi yep qatsit so’ṅwaveq hintani.
Nu Sinot Tiat ihoṅviaymuy ayataqw, puma imoṅwtunatyay aṅqw sohsokmuy lasnayaqamuy, pu qaanhinwisqamuy tsovalayani;
Nen pumuy qöpqömiq qȫhit aqw maspayani. Pep a’nö tsaykitiwni, pu tama ṅuritiwni.
Noqw pep pu’ hakim súanyuṅqam Nay moṅwtunatyayat ep tāwat an tālawṅway’yuṅwni. Tuqayvastotaa! Pi uma naqvuy’yuṅwa.
Pu i’ pīwu: Oveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya himu a’nö hihk̇ay’taqat pasve tupkiwtaqat anta. Put hak tāqa túwahqe, ahoy amht, put ep kwaṅwtoynaqe, ahpiynihqe sohsok hihta himuy húyahqe, put pāsat tui.
Pu i’ pīwu: Oveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya hakiy huhyaqat lolmat pearl hepnumqat anta.
Pam hak sūkw pearl pas a’nö hihk̇ay’taqat túwahqe, ahpiynihqe sohsok hihta himuy húyahqe, put tui.
Pu i’ pīwu: Oveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya pakiwmaktutsayat anta. Pam wuhkovatuphamiq tūviwhqe, sohsok hinyuṅqamuy pāvakiwhtuy inhta.
Put aw ohpokq, puma pāhut qalavoq put láṅaknayaqe, pep yesvat, pu aṅ nūnukṅwatuy pāvakiwhtuy hihta aqw taṅatotat, pu pay hin’ewakwmuy maspayaṅwu.
Noqw pan hapi hintani yep qatsit so’ṅwaveq’a. Oveqatsit aṅqw hoṅvia’yam nankwuse’, aṅ nūnukpantuy lomasinmuy amuṅaqw tsīk̇ayani,
Nen pumuy qöpqömiq qȫhit aqw maspayani. Pep a’nö tsaykitiwni, pu tama ṅuritiwni.
Pu Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma īit sohsok māmatsya? Noqw puma aw paṅqaqwa: Owi, Tutuyqawhqa.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Sohsoyam tutuvenit tuwi’yuṅqam ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat ahpiy tutaqayhpit tuwi’vayaqam hapi hakiy k̇ahaktaqat anyuṅwa. Puma tutuvenit aṅqw hisattutuqayhpit sinmuy tutuqaynaya, pu pūhut tutuqayhpit pīwu.
Noqw Jesus yan tutuqaynaqey yukut, paṅqw ahpiy’o.
Noqw pam nāp kitsókiy ep pítuhqe, pumuy tsotsvalkiyamuy aṅ pumuy tutuqayna. Noqw put aw tūqayyuṅqam aw k̇ātayyuṅqe, nātuviṅlalwaqe paṅqaqwa: Ya sen i’ haqaqw it wuwantuwit makiwa? Is uti, pu it k̇ātutmalat haqaqw öqalmakiwa?
Ya qa i’ wunavutsit tumaltuwi’taqat tíata? Ya yuat qa Mary yan mātsiwa, pu put tupkomat James‐niqw, pu Joses‐niqw, pu Simon‐niqw, pu Judas.
Pu siwamat, ya qa puma sohsoyam itamumya? Noqw ya sen i’ haqaqw īit hihta makiwa? kitota.
Nihqe puma put ep qaan’unaṅwtoti. Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay pi Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat sohsovik k̇aptsi’tiwṅwu, hal pay nāp kitsókiy‐sa ep’e, pu pas nāp kiy ep pīwu.
Noqw puma qa tuptsiwni’yuṅqw, ōviy pay pam pep qa a’nö hihta tumalta.
Noqw ephaqam Moṅwi Herod Jesus hihta hintsakqat navota;
Nihqe tumal’aymuy amumi paṅqawu: I’ John kūyit akw tūtuvoylalawṅwuqa. Pas hapi pay pam hakton mokiwuy aṅqw ahoy tātayi; nihqe ōviy k̇ātatayhpit hintsaki.
Herod pi nȫmay Herodias unaṅwve hinhtiniqe, hakimuy ayataqw, puma John ṅuayaqe somyat, sivikimi panaya. Ura Herod tupkoy Philip nömanawhki.
Noqw John Herod aw paṅqawu: Soon as um uhtupkoy nömanawhkinik̇aṅwo.
Noqw pam as put nīnaniqey anhtik̇aṅw, piw sinmuy maqasti; puma put Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayayatnihqat pan aw tāyuṅqw ōviy’o.
Noqw Herod tihtiwhpuyat aw pituqw, pam nōviwhqat aw k̇aysiwhqamuy sinmuy tūtsama. Noqw pumuy nōnovaqw, Herodias tiat māna ep pákihqe, pumuy amuhpewi wunimaqw, Herod put aw nahyoṅwa.
Noqw ōviy pam pas öqalat pasiwniy akw put aw paṅqawhqe, pam nāp hihta ōviy tūviṅtaqw put máqaniqey aw paṅqawu.
Noqw pam yuy tutavoyatnihqe put aw paṅqawu: Um kūyit akw tūtuvoylalawhqat John qötöyat tsaqaptat ep íniwtaqat nuy máqani.
Noqw pas as Moṅwi qahahlayhtik̇aṅw, pay nuṅwu pas aw qaöwílvayhtiqe, nawus put máqaniqey paṅqawu, ispi k̇aysiwhqam sinom put amum yesqam lavayiyat nanaptaq’ö.
Nihqe hakiy ayataqw, pam sivikiminihqe, John qötöyat ayo tuku;
Nihqe put qötöyat tsaqaptat ep íniwtaqat kwusivaqe, mānat aw tavi; noqw pam put yuy aw yawma.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam ökihqe, tokoyat haqami amwisa; nit ahpiyyaqe, Jesus āawnaya.
Noqw Jesus put navotqe, pay nāla pākihut akw haqamii, haqam pas qa hak waynumqat paṅsoo. Noqw sinom put nanaptaqe hāhaqaqw kitsókit aṅqw nāp put aṅkya.
Noqw Jesus paṅqw yámakqe, qaan’ewakw hintaqamuy sinmuy tuwa; nihqe pumuy ōkwatuwhqe, pumuy amuṅaqw tūtuyyaqamuy qalaptsina.
Noqw tapkiwmaqw, put aw nánatuwnayaqam put awyaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Yep qayēsiwhq, pas hapi hísatniqwti. Um as sinmuy hōnaqw, puma aṅqe’ kitsókiva nankwuse’, nenṅem hihta tunöstuy’yani.
Noqw pay Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Soon as puma ahpiyyani. Uma nopnayani.
Noqw puma put aw paṅqaqwa: Itam panis tsivot pölaviki’yuṅwa, pu lȫqmuy pākiwhtuyu.
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pew kiwisaa.
Pu sinom tūsaqat aṅ yesvaniqat pam amumi paṅqawu, nit pu pam tsivot pölavikit ömahtat, pu pākiwhtuy kwusut, pu ōmiq tayk̇aṅw, put ep God aw hahlayhti; nit yōṅoytat, put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi put oya; noqw puma sinmuy amuhpa’ o’ya.
Noqw puma sohsoyam nȫnösaqe ȫöya; noqw puma akwsiṅwqat yōṅoyhput pölavikit tsovalayaqe, pakwt lȫq sihk̇ay’taqat hoaput aṅ opomnaya.
Noqw nȫnösaqam tsivót‐sikip sōmorit pahsa’haqam tahtaqtya, noqw pu momoyam‐niqw pu tsātsayom pīwu.
Pahsat pay Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy pākihut aqw yuñe’, pay ahsavo wuhkovatuphat ayoqwatyaniqat pumuy tusoq’ayata nāto pam sinmuy niman’ayalawhqee.
Noqw pam sinmuy hōnat, nāwaknaniqe nāla tsomomiq’a; nihqe mihikq, pam pepeq súnalaa.
Noqw pahsat pākihu wuhkovatuphat nāsaveq hinnumk̇aṅw, pāhut wuṅwnuptuqat akw wawaöklawu, amuhpewi hūhukq ōviy’o.
Noqw talhahayiṅqw, Jesus pāvaqe waymak̇aṅw pumuy amumii.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put pāvaqe waymaqw tutwaqe, tsātsawnaqe paṅqaqwa: Pam tualaṅw’u, kitota; nihqe tsātsawnaqe a’nö hiṅqaqwa.
Noqw pahsat pay Jesus pumuy amumi lavayhtiqe, paṅqawu: Uma qa hin unaṅway’yuṅwni; pay nūu; uma qa tsawiniwyuṅwni.
Noqw Peter lavayhtiqe aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, kurs pay pas umnen, nuy pāvaqe ūminiqat um paṅqawni.
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pew’i. Pahsat pu Peter pākihut aṅqw yámakqe, Jesus aw pāvaqe wayma.
Nit pas a’nö hūhukq pam navotqe pahsat pay tsawna, nihqe pakitoqe a’nö paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, nuy ayo távii.
Noqw Jesus pahsat pay put aw māvuyaltiqe ṅuat, aw paṅqawu: Is okiw um öwituptsiwni’taqa, ya um hinoqw pēvewinhti?
Noqw puma pākihut aqw pakiqw, hūk̇aṅw qe’ti.
Noqw ima pākihut aṅqw taṅawtaqam Jesus aw ökihqe, pas hihtatotaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Kurs um pas antsa God Tíata.
Pu puma ayoqwat nöṅakqe, haqam tutskwat Gennesaret aw öki.
Noqw pep sinom put pituqw nanaptaqe, pep aṅqe’ tutskwat aṅ ahsupoq hakimuy ayatotaqe, sohsokmuy tūtuyyaqamuy put aw tsamvaya;
Nihqe pay ṅas’ew puma put yuwsiyat qalavaqe nömökput aw tóṅokyaniqey put aw nānawakna, noqw hakim hihsa’nihqam put aw tóṅokyaqam pās qalaptuya.
Pahsat pu hakim tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam Pharisee‐sinom amumum Jerusalem aṅqwyaqam Jesus aw ökihqe aw paṅqaqwa:
Ya hinoqw ūmi nánatuwnayaqam wūwukwmuy navotiyamuy qaanhinwisa? Oviy pi puma nōnovanik qa māvaqtotaṅwu.
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe, amumi paṅqawu: Noqw ya hinoqw ōviy piw uma umuhnavotiy akw God tutavoyat qahihtatota?
Pi God tutaptaqe paṅqawu: Um unay, pu uṅuy pumuy k̇aptsi’tani. Pu hak nay, pu yuy pumuy qalomálavayhtiqa pas pay mokmantani, ura kita.
Noqw úmawat paṅqaqwa: Hak nay, pu yuy pumuy amumi paṅqawni: Nu as umuy hihta akw paaṅwanik̇aṅw, God aw put sohsok noa, kite’, pay tutavot aṅqw mātaviwṅwu, uma kitota.
Nen pam pumuy paaṅwaniqey qe’tik̇aṅw, pay qa hihta ep qaanhtiniqat uma kitota. Yan uma God tutavoyat ayo yuykuya, umuhnavotiy akw’a.
Uma nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu, pas pi ōviy Esaias Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat umuy súaṅqawhqe paṅqawu:
Ima sinom moay akw inumi ökiwta, pu lavayiy akw nuy k̇aptsilalwa; noqw pi unaṅwaam inuṅaqw haq’ursvehaq’a.
Piw haktonsa inumi okiwlalwa. Puma pi sinmuy tutavoyamuy pas antsa tutuqayhpinihqat pan put tūtutuqaynaya, yan’i.
Pu pam sinmuy nāmi wáṅwayhqe, amumi paṅqawu: Inumi tūqayyuṅwaa, nen uma māmatsyani.
Himu hakiy moamiq pak̇e’, qa pam hakiy tuyoy’ewakwtaṅwu. Pi hakiy moaṅaqw nȫṅataqa hapi hakiy tuyoy’ewakwtaṅwu.
Pahsat pu put aw nánatuwnayaqam put awyaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Ya Pharisee‐sinom it yantaqat nanaptaqe qatsúyhtiqw um qa navota?
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay pi Ina ōveqatsit ep qátuhqa himutskit qa uyhq pam himutski ṅáipwaniwni.
Pay pi panyuṅwni. Pay pi puma qapostalyaqam qapostalyaqamuy tsamya. Noqw kurs qapostalqa qapostalqat wīki’maqw, puma nāma haqami pövamiq posni.
Pahsat pu Peter lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Kurs i’ lavayi hihta tuawi’taqat itamuy āawnaa.
Noqw Jesus paṅqawu: Ya uma piw nāt pas qa mātsi’yuṅwa?
Ya himu sinot moayat aqw pak̇e’, ahpiy ponomiq pak̇e’, kwayñave tūviwṅwuqat uma pas nāt qa mātsi’yuṅwa?
Pi himu sinot moayat aṅqw nöṅakqa unaṅwayat aṅqwniṅwu; nihqe pam hapi sinot tuyoy’ewakwtaṅwu.
Pi hak qalomáhintsakqa unaṅwpeq qalomátunatyay’taqey mahtakni’ta. Pam tuqwyantunatyay’ta; nömaqtsit sokoptimaniqey tunatyay’ta; qahopqatsit aṅ hinmaniqey tunatyay’ta; uyiṅwtunatyay’ta; hakiy hihta atsátoynaniqey tunatyay’ta; nuhtumiq hiṅqawlawniqey tunatyay’ta.
Hak pan hinmaqa nātuyoy’ewakwtaṅwu. Noqw hak qa māvaqtat, nösqa qa put akw tuyoy’ewayhtiṅwu.
Pahsat pu Jesus paṅqw ahpiynihqe, Tyre‐nik̇aṅw, pu Sidon pumuy amuqlavohaqamii.
Noqw meh, hak Canaan‐tutskwat aṅqw wuhti paṅqw yámakqe, put aw tsa’lawhqe aw paṅqawu: Um okiw nuy ōkwatuwni, Tutuyqawhqa, David Tíata! Okiw iti māna nukpanhikwsit akw tuyqawiwtaqe okiwhinta.
Noqw Jesus put aw qa ṅas’ew hiṅqawu. Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put awyaqe, aw öqaltotiqe paṅqaqwa: Put ahpiy hōnaa; taq pam panis itamuṅk tsa’tinuma.
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay nu Israel‐sinmuy amumi‐sa ayatiwa. Puma pi kanelmuy amún haqami hiniwhtotiq’ö.
Pahsat pu wuhti put awnihqe, aw naokiwhtaqe, paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, okiw inumi unaṅwtavii.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Pas hapi hak tsātsakwmuy nȫsiwhqamuy nawhkit, put popkotuy amumi maspaniqw, pam qa súanta.
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pas antsaa, Tutuyqawhqa, noqw pi popkot moṅwímuy nönöspiyamuy aṅqw hihta piṅput löhöhötaqat nōnovaṅwu.
Pahsat pu Jesus lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Is uti um hak wuhti! pas uhtuptsiwni qaöwíewa; pay uṅ hin nāwaknaqw uṅem pantani. Noqw put tiat pay pahsat qalaptu.
Pu Jesus paṅqw ahpiynihqe, wuhkovatuphat Galileet ep ahoy pitu; nihqe tsomomiqnihqe pepeq qatuptu.
Noqw sinom qaan’ewakw hintaqam hakimuy qayaktaqamuy, qapostalyaqamuy, qayuáatotaqamuy, qapasíwyuṅqamuy, pu k̇aysiwhqamuy tūtuyyaqamuy put aw tsamvaya; nihqe pumuy Jesus atpipo o’ya; noqw pam pumuy qalaptsina.
Noqw sinom pas k̇ātayuṅwa, imuy qayuáatotaqam yuaaykuyaq’ö, pu qapasíwyuṅqam qalaptuyaq’ö, qayaktaqam nankwusaq’ö, pu qapostalyaqam tālawnayaq’ö; nihqe puma God Israel‐sinmuy Tutuyqawhqayamuy pas hihtatota.
Pahsat pu Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy nāmi wáṅwayhqe, amumi paṅqawu: Pas nu sinmuy ōkwatuwa, puma pu’ pāyis talqat aṅ inumumyaqw, nȫsiwhqaam súlawhtiq’ö. Noqw soon nu pumuy qa ö́yiwyuṅqamuy hōnani; taq nāp hisat sen puma kiy qa aṅ ökit māmaṅuani.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put aw paṅqaqwa: Kurs pi itam haqam amuptsiwtaqat pölavikit tuiyani? Pi itam qayēsiwhpuveya. Pas k̇a itam soon imuy qaan’ewakw hintaqamuy sinmuy öynayani.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hihsa’haqam pölaviki’yuṅwa? Noqw puma paṅqaqwa: Tsáṅee, pu piw híkikwmuy pāvakiwhtuyu. Noqw puma pay hiṅsayhohyamu.
Noqw sinom tutskwava yesvaniqat pam amumi paṅqawu.
Nit pu pam tsaṅe pölavikit ömahta, pu pāvakiwhtuyu; nit put ep God aw hahlayhtit, yōṅoyhtat, put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi put oya; noqw puma sinmuy amuhpa’ put o’ya.
Noqw sohsoyam nȫnösaqe ȫöya. Noqw puma akwsiṅqat tsovalayaqe, tsaṅe’ hoaput aṅ opomnaya.
Noqw nȫnösaqam nālöp sōmorit pahsa’ tahtaqtya, pu momoyam tsātsakwmuy amumum nāto pīwu.
Pu pam sinmuy aṅqe’ hōnat, pākihut aqw pakit, Magdala‐kitsókit qalavoq pitu.
Noqw hakim Pharisee‐sinom Sadducee‐sinmuy amumum ökihqe, Jesus aw tuwantota; pam ōveqatsit aṅqw k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’taqat pumuy amumi mahtaknaniqat aw ö’qalya.
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe, amumi paṅqawu: Uma tapkiqw paṅqaqwaṅwu: Kurs qāvo kwaṅwqatni, ōviypi tokpela pālaṅwpu, kitotaṅwu.
Pu talavay uma paṅqaqwaṅwu: Kurs pu’ hin sóniwni, ōviypi tokpela pālaṅpu, piw aṅqe’ himu ohpokiwta. Uma nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu, pay as uma tokpelat pitsáṅwayat māmatsyaṅwunik̇aṅw, uma soon qatsi haqe’ qalawmaqat hihta tuawi’taqat māmatsyani.
Is uma pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqam nukpansinomu, tusk̇apsinomu! Uma k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’taqat aw yórikyaniqey nānawakna. Nīk̇aṅw uma soon k̇ātatayhpit aw yórikyani, hal pas sūkw k̇ātatayhpit aw uma yórikyani. Pam Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayayat Jonas qatsíyat ep hiniwhtiqat an aw yukiltini. Noqw pam paṅqw nakwsuqe ahpiy’o.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam wuhkovatuphat ayoqwat nöṅak‐wisk̇aṅw, kurs puma nitk̇ay suhtokya.
Noqw pahsat pu Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma Pharisee‐sinmuy pu Sadducee‐sinmuy pēk̇eniyamuy ep tunatyaltotini.
Noqw puma nānami yuaatotaqe paṅqaqwa: Itam itahnitk̇ay qa kivayaqw, ōviy itamumi paṅqawu.
Noqw Jesus put navotqe, amumi paṅqawu: Is okiw uma öwituptsiwni’yuṅqamu. Ya uma hinoqw qa nitk̇a’vayaqey nānami yuaatota?
Ya uma nāt pas qa mātsi’yuṅwa? Ura nu tsivot pölavikit tsivót‐sikip sōmorit pahsa’nihqamuy tahtaqtuy nopna. Noqw uma akwsiṅwput tsovalayaqe, hihsa’ hoaput aṅ opomnaya? Ya uma pas qa ṅas’ew put u’ni’yuṅwa?
Pu ura piw nu tsaṅe’ pölavikit nālöp sōmorit pahsa’nihqamuy tahtaqtuy nopna. Noqw uma akwsiṅwput tsovalayaqe, hihsa’ hoaput aṅ opomnaya? Ya uma pay put suhtokya?
Noqw ya uma hinoqw qa māmatsya? Nu qa pölavikit umumi yuaata. Uma Pharisee‐sinmuy‐nik̇aṅw pu Sadducee‐sinmuy pēk̇eniyamuy ep tunatyaltotinaqat nu kita.
Pahsat pu puma māmatsyaqw, kurs pam qa pölavikit pēk̇eniyat paṅqawht, kurs puma Pharisee‐sinmuy tutuqayhpiyamuy‐nik̇aṅw pu Sadducee‐sinmuy tutuqayhpiyamuy ep nāmi tunatyaltotinaqat amumi lavayhti.
Pu Jesus Caesarea Philippi ahayhpo pítuhqe, put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy tūviṅtaqe, amumi paṅqawu: Ya nu’ Sinot Tiat hákiynihqat sinom paṅqaqwa?
Noqw puma aw paṅqaqwa: Um yaw kūyit akw tūtuvoylalawhqat John‐nihqat haqawat paṅqaqwa; noqw haqawatuyniqw yaw um Elias; pu pētuyniqw yaw um Jeremias, sen pay yaw um suhk̇a Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaata.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Noqw úmuyniqw nu’ hak’i?
Noqw Simon Peter lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Um hapi Christ, God aṅqw Moṅw’asi’taqa, God qátuhqat Tíata.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Pas um Simon Jonat tiat hahlayhpit ep’e; pi qa hak sino ūmi it mātakta; pi Ina ōveqatsit ep qatuhqa pam hapi uṅ put āawna.
Um hapi Peter. Noqw nu isinomuy tsovalat, it pik̇aqlöt ep soñawnen pumuy akw nēṅem kītani.
Noqw nu’ hapi ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat aw hötahpit ūmi óyani; noqw um yep qatsit ep hihta hakiy aw uhtaqw, pam ōveqatsit put aw uhtsiltimantani; pu um yep qatsit ep hihta hu’wanaqw, pam ōveqatsit ep hu’waniwni.
Pahsat pu pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy pās mēwaqe, pam hapi Jesus Christ‐nihqat qa hakiy āawnayaniqat amumi paṅqawu.
Pahpiy pu Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy hihta hiniwhtiniqat awintivaqe, amumi paṅqawu: Itam Jerusalem aqwyaqw, God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu wukw’a’yam‐niqw, pu tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam nuy ṅuayat, okiwsahsanyat, nuy nīnayani. Noqw ahpiy pāyis talq nu ahoy tātayni.
Pahsat pu Peter put ṅuat, qöhqöyaqe aw paṅqawu: Soon pantani, Tutuyqawhqa. Soon um pantsaniwni.
Noqw pam namtökt, Peter aw paṅqawu: Yupa ayohaqamii, Satan; um inumi sus’itsi. Um qa God tunatyayat yuaata, nīk̇aṅw sinmuy tunatyayamuyu.
Pahsat pu Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Inuṅkniqey nāwaknaqa nātatamtat, nahoylehtsiy kwusut, inuṅkmantani.
Taq qatsiy k̇ahk̇awnaqa put kwayhni; pu itunatyay ōviy qatsiy kwayhqa put túwani.
Ispi puyaw as sino tūwaqatsit sohsok himuy’vak̇aṅw, pas nāp qatsiy kwahe’, hin pam put akw moṅwvasni? Hal ya sen sino hihta akw qatsiy ahoy nāptini?
Pi nu Sinot Tiat nāt Inay tālawṅwayat pasiwk̇aṅw, ihoṅviaymuy tsamk̇aṅw pítuni; nen pahsat pu nu sohsokmuy sinmuy hin tumaltotaqat pan amumi ahoytani.
Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Soon pas hisat nu’ Sinot Tiat imoṅwtunatyay yank̇aṅw pítuni. Noqw ima yep hoṅqam haqawat nāt mokiwuy qa aw ök̇e’, puma put aw yórikyani.
Noqw ahpiy navaysikis talq, Jesus Peter‐nit, James‐nit, pu put tupkoyat John pumuy tsamk̇aṅw, haqami wupatukwit aqw puma yayva. Noqw pumuy pepeq nánaltyaqe,
Pumuy tāyuṅqw, pam alöṅti; noqw pas put taywaat tāwat an tālawṅway’va; pu yuwsiat tālat an qȫtsati.
Noqw meh, pepeq Moses Elias amum pumuy amumi mātaqtiqe, put amum yuaata.
Noqw Peter lavayhtiqe, Jesus aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, pas hapi itam yépeqyaqw pam lolma. Uṅ pan nāwaknaniqw, itam yepeq payhkomuy kistotani, sukw úṅemnit, pu sukwat Moses éṅemnit, pu sukwat Elias éṅem’i.
Noqw pam nāt yuaataqw, meh, pi ōmaw suyan talqa pumuy nākwapna; noqw hakiy tönaat ōmawuy aṅqaqw paṅqawu: I’ hapi pas aw iunaṅwa Itii; pas nu put hahlayhti. Uma aw tūqayyuṅwni.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put nanaptaqe, tayway akw tutskwami yēvaya, pas tsātsawnaqe ōviy’o.
Noqw Jesus amuminihqe, amumi toṅokt, paṅqawu: Huvam hoṅvaa; uma qa tsawiniwyuṅwni.
Noqw puma kwuhpukyat, aṅqe’ yórikyaqe, pay qa hakiy tutwa, pay Jesus‐saa.
Noqw puma tūkwiṅaqw hanwisq, Jesus pumuy mēwaqe, amumi paṅqawu: Uma hapi hin yórikyaqey qa hakiy āawnayani, hisat nu’ Sinot Tiat mokiwuy aṅqw ahoy tātayniqat pahsavoo.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put tūviṅtotaqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Ya hintaqw ōviy tutavot tutuqaynayaqam Elias mohti pítuniqat paṅqaqwa?
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe, pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay antsa Elias pas suyan mohti pítuni; nen sohsok hihta haqe’ hintaniqat aw antsantani.
Noqw nu umumi paṅqawni: Pay Elias pitu; noqw puma put qa māmatsyaqe, pas tunatyay an put hintsatsna. Noqw pan hapi nu’ Sinot Tiat piw pumuy amuhpiy okiwsaniwni.
Pahsat pu put aw nánatuwnayaqam māmatsyaqw, kurs pam kūyit akw tūtuvoylalawṅwuqat John pumuy amumi lavayhti.
Noqw puma sinmuy amumi ökiqw, hak Jesus aw pítuhqe, aw tamötswunuptut, paṅqawu:
Tutuyqawhqa, um as okiw itiy ōkwatuwni; taq pam okiw homimitutuyhqe okiwhinta; nihqe pam piép qȫhit aqw posṅwu, pu pāmiq’a.
Noqw nu as ūmi nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi put wikvaqw, puma kurs hin put powatotani.
Pahsat pu Jesus lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Is ohi uma qatuptsiwni’yuṅqamu, nukushinyuṅqamu, pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqamu, ya nu hihsavohaqam umumum yantani? ya nu hihsavohaqam umuy maqsonlawni? Pew wikyaa.
Noqw Jesus nukpanhikwsit mēwa; noqw pam put aṅqw yamakq, tiyo pahsat pay powalti.
Pahsat pu Jesus aw nánatuwnayaqam pay nánaltyak̇aṅw put aw ö́kihqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Ya hintaqw ōviy itam kurs hin put hóroknayani?
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ispi uma qa tuptsiwni’yuṅqee; pi nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Kurs uma pay híhin tuptsiwni’uyṅwe’ (nāmahin pi as pam mustard‐uyit sivosiyat an pay hihsayhoyaniqw) uma it tūkwit: Yaṅqw ayo nahlakuu, aw kitotaqw, pam soon qa nahlakni. Pu qa himu umuṅem qa pasiwtani.
Nīk̇aṅw hak qa napwalni’k̇aṅw qa nāwakink̇aṅw pas soon it yantaqat qalomáhikwsit hakiy aṅqw ayo hóroknani.
Noqw nāt pumuy Galileet ep yesq Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu’ Sinot Tiat sinmuy amumi mātaviwni.
Noqw puma nuy nīnayani; noqw ahpiy pāyis talq nu ahoy tātayni. Noqw puma it nanaptaqe, pas qahahlayhtoti.
Noqw puma Capernaum ep ökiqw, hakim God kīyat eṅem siviwuy tsovalantotaqam Peter aw ökihqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Ya umuy tutuqaynaqa God kīyat aw sīvat ōoywaqat qa sivima?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: As’a. Nit pam kimi pakiqw, Jesus pay mohti lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Simon, ya um hin it aw wūwa? Ya tūwaqatsit ep momṅwit hakimuy amuṅaqw tax ömalalwa, pu nahpe sívita? Ya sen nāp sinomuy amuṅaqw put ömalalwa? Sen pay hakimuy a’löṅtuy amuṅaqö’?
Noqw Peter put aw paṅqawu: Pay a’löṅtuy amuṅaq’ö. Noqw Jesus aw paṅqawu: Noqw pay kurs sinomat qeniveya.
Noqw pay itam pumuy qa unaṅwmoknaniqw, ōviy um wuhkovatuphat awnen, aqw huhuwhpit tūvani; nen um hihtawat mohti hórokne’, ṅúani; nit tsaṅwtapne’, aṅqw hihsaqw sīvat túwani; um put aṅqw hóroknat, nēṅem‐nik̇aṅw pu inuṅem momṅwituy amumi sisvini.
Noqw ephaqam Jesus aw nánatuwnayaqam put aw ökihqe, paṅqaqwa: Ya hak ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat ep pas suspavanni?
Noqw Jesus hakiy tsākwhoyat wáṅwayhqe, put amuhsonmi tavi;
Nit paṅqawu: Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Pas uma nāp umuhtunatyay aṅqw qa lasye’, tsātsakwmuy qa amuntote’, soon ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat aw yuṅni.
Paniqw hapi ōviy haqam it tsākwhoyat an qanāhihtataqa pam hapi ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat ep suspavanni.
Pu haqawa inatṅwaniy aṅ yan tsākw pās távihqa hapi nuy pās távini.
Nīk̇aṅw hapi hak haqam imuy tsātsakwmuy inumi tuptsiwni’yuṅqam hihtawat lasnaqw, put eṅem pas is óhini? Pay pi tatam put kwapk̇aqe mata hāyiltiqw, pam wuhkovatuphat a’nö hötsit aqw paöymokq, pam put eṅem lolmani.
Is ohi sinmuy amuṅem’i, hakimuy hīhihta akw lomavöhut aṅqw lasyaqamuy amuṅem’i. Taq sinmuy lasnayaqam pas soon haqami peveltini. Nīk̇aṅw pantsatsk̇aqamuy amuṅem pas is óhini!
Paniqw hapi ōviy kurs uhma, sen uhkuku uṅ lasnaniqw, um put ayo tukut, nāṅaqw ayo tūvani; pay pi um tatam qa pasiwk̇aṅw qatsit aw pákini, hikis pi as um pās pasiwk̇aṅw, qȫhit qa súlawhtiṅwuqat aqw túviwni.
Pu kurs uhposi uṅ lasnaniqw, um put ayo hóroknat, nāṅaqw ayo tūvani. Pay pi um tatam sūkw pōsi’k̇aṅw qatsit aw pákini, hikis pi as um pās lȫqmuy pōsi’k̇aṅw maskimiq qȫhit aqw tūviwni.
Uma tunatyaltote’ qa hihtawat imuy tsātsakwmuy paysoqtotani; taq nu umumi paṅqawni: Pumuy tuwalan’aymat Inay ōveqatsit ep qátuhqat taywayat aw sutsep tāyuṅwa.
Pi nu’ Sinot Tiat haqami hiniwhtotiqamuy ayo óyaniqe ōviy pitu.
Ya uma hin wūwantota? As kurs hak haqam tsivót‐sikip sunat kanelmuy pokmuy’taqw, suhk̇a pumuy amuṅaqw haqaminiqw, pam hinhtini? Pam púmuywatuy mātapt, tsotsmomihaqaminen, it haqaminihqat heptoni.
Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Pam put tuwe’, put ep pas hahlayhtini, imuy nālöp sunat pakwt pept sihk̇ay’taqamuy qa haqami hiniwhtotiqamuy amuhpenihqee.
Noqw pan hapi piw Umuna ōveqatsit ep qátuhqa imuy tsātsakwmuy himuwat súlawhtiniqat qa nāwakna.
Pu ōviy kurs piw umún tuptsiwni’taqa hihta ep ūmi qaanhtiqw, um put awnen, pay umuy nālaniqw put öwihiniwhtipuyat aw pónaknani; noqw kurs pam ūmi tuqayvastaqw, pahsat hapi um put pay ahoy tuyqawvani.
Ason kurs pam ūmi qa tuqayvastaqw, pahsat pu um sūkw, sen lȫqmuy wikk̇aṅw awni; noqw lȫqmuy, sen payhkomuy tūqayyuṅqw, pep hin lavayhtiwhqa pasiwtamantani.
Noqw kurs pam pumuy amumi qa tuqayvastaqw, pahsat pu um inumi tuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy tsovawtaqw, pumuy put āawnani. Pu kurs pam pumuy amumi qa tuqayvaste’, pam nawus úmuyniqw qatuptsiwni’taqat antamantani, sen moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalawhqat an’i.
Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Uma tūwaqatsit ep hihta somyaqw, pam ōveqatsit ep sómiltimantani; pu uma tūwaqatsit ep hihta ṅahyaqw, pam ōveqatsit ep ṅāhiwmantani.
Pu nu piw umumi paṅqawni: Kurs uma lȫyöm tūwaqatsit ep hihta ōviy Inay aw tūviṅtaniqey ep sun unaṅwtiqw, ōveqatsit ep Ina umeṅem put aw antsantamantani.
Pi haqam lȫyöm, sen pahyom inatṅwaniy aw yank̇ahk̇aṅw haqam tsovawtaqw, pep nu pumuy amumumni.
Pahsat pu Peter put awnihqe aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, kurs itupko inumi qa sūs qaanhtiqw, ya nu hihsakis put ep aw pöhikni? Sen tsaṅé’sikisi?
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Tsaṅe’sikisi nu hapi ūmi qa kita, pas payhp sunat aṅqw pakwt sihk̇ay’tasikip tsaṅe’sikisi, (tsaṅe’sikip pakwt tsaṅe’sikis navitaṅhtiqat pahsaa).
Panta hapi. Oveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya hak moṅwi tumal’aymuy amumi sīvat ep pohtaniqey nāwaknaqat anta.
Nihqe pam put aṅ purivaqw, hak wūhak sōmorit sīvat put aw pöiwtaqa aw wikvaniwa.
Noqw pay kurs pam hihta sisviniqw, pam huyiwniqat moṅwiat paṅqawu, pu nȫmaata, pu timatu, pu sohsoy himu himuata, noqw pöiyat ep sisviwni.
Noqw ōviy tumal’aya put atpipo nātuvaqe, okiw aw naokiwtaqe paṅqawu: Moṅwi, pay um okiw inumi qa pas k̇ānavotitaqw, pay nu soon ūmi qa sohsok sisvini.
Pahsat pu moṅwi put ōkwatuwhqe mātavi; nihqe sohsok pöiyat ayo yuku.
Noqw pay pam tumal’aya paṅqw yamakt, sukw tumalsuṅway put aw sunat sīvat pöiwtaqat tuwa; nihqe pam put tönhpe ṅuat, aw paṅqawu: Um inumi pöiwtaqey sisvini.
Noqw put tumalsuṅwaat put kukmiq nātuvaqe, put aw naokiwtaqe paṅqawu: Pay um qa pas okiw inumi k̇ānavotitaqw, pay nu soon ūmi qa sohsok sisvini.
Noqw pam qa nakwhaqe, put sivikimi tūva, hisat pöiy sisviniqat pahsavoo.
Noqw ōviy put tumalsuṅwamat hin hiniwhtiqat aw yórikyaqe, pas qa hahlayhtoti; nihqe moṅwiy aw ökihqe, sohsok put āawnaya.
Pahsat pu moṅwiat tumal’ayay wáṅwayhqe, aw paṅqawu: Is ohi um hak nukpantumal’aya, um inumi pan nāwaknaqw, ōviy nu sohsok uhpöiy uhpiy ayo yuku.
Noqw puyaw nu uṅ hin ōkwatuwhq, soon um tuwat qa pan uhtumalsuṅway ōkwatuwni?
Noqw moṅwi pas itsívutiqe, hakiy okiwsanyaṅwuqamuy amumi put mātavi, pas hisat put aw pöiwtaqey sohsok put aw sisviniqat pahsavoo.
Noqw kurs umún tuptsiwni’taqa umuhpewi qaanhtiqw, uma umuh’unaṅṅaqw qa aw pöhikyaqw, pay ōveqatsit ep Ina piw tuwat umuy pan hintsanni.
Noqw Jesus yan yuaataqe yukut, Galileet aṅqw ahpiynihqe, Jordan yupqöymi Judeat qalavoq pitu.
Noqw qaan’ewakw hintaqam sinom put aṅkya; noqw pam pumuy pepeq qalaptsina.
Noqw Pharisee‐sinom nuhtum put aw ökihqe, put unahepyaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Ya tāqa pay nāphihta ep nȫmay mātapniqw pam súanta?
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma it aṅ qa tuṅwaya: Ura God yayhniwhqat epeq pumuy yúkuhqe, pumuy tāqat‐nit pu wuhtit yuku, it’a?
Nihqe pumuy yúkuhqe paṅqawu: Yantaqw hapi ōviy tāqa nay, pu yuy pumuy mātapt, nȫmay aw hūrstimantani; noqw puma sūk̇a tókomantani.
Panta hapiniqw, ōviy puma pāpu qa lȫyömnit, sūk̇a tókoniwhtiṅwu. Paniqw ōviy God hihta namitsk̇aqw, qa hak put nāhoy távini.
Noqw puma put aw paṅqaqwa: Noqw hinoqw pantaqw hak nāmataviwuy pēnat, pu nȫmay nahpiy lālaymantaniqat Moses tutapta?
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ispi uma anahaat unaṅway’yuṅqw ōviy pay hak nȫmay mātapmantaniqat Moses umuy hu’wana. Nīk̇aṅw pas as yayhniwhqat aṅqw qa panta.
Noqw nu hapi umumi paṅqawni: Tāqa nȫmay qa hintsakq, put mātave’, piw sukw amum qatupte’, tokot ūuyṅwu; pu wuhtit mātaviwhqat amum qatuptuqa tokot ūuyṅwu.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam aw paṅqaqwa: Kurs tāqat pu nȫmayat amuṅem pan hintaniqw, pay kurs k̇a qa nȫmataniqw pam pay lolmani.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay qa sohsoyam tahtaqt namituyqawi’yuṅwa; nihqe ōviy kurs hin it tutavot kwusuyani. Noqw God pētuy‐sa öqalmaqaqw ōviy puma namituyqawi’yuṅwa.
Pi haqawat nömaqtsit aw qa pasiwyuṅqam pay pas pank̇ahk̇aṅw tihtiwya; noqw haqawat panyuṅqam pay sinmuy amuhpiy pan yukiltoti; pu haqawat pas pay ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat tunatyawyuṅqey ōviy qa nȫmatota. Haqawa it aṅ hinmaniqa nam panhtii.
Pahsat pu hakim put aw tsātsakwmuy tsamvaya, pam pumuy amumi may akw toṅokt nāwaknaniqat ōviy’o. Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam pumuy mēwaya.
Noqw Jesus paṅqawu: Uma tsātsakwmuy inumiyaniqat nakwhanayani; uma qa mēwantotani; pi panyuṅqam hapi ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat ep sinoiwyuṅwa.
Pu pam pumuy amumi matyawht, paṅqw ahpiy’o.
Noqw pahsat pu hak tiyo Jesus aw pituhqe, aw paṅqawu: Lomatutuqaynaqa, ya nu hihta lolmat hinhte’, qatsit qaso’taqat himuy’vani?
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Ya um hinoqw nuy lolmalawu? Pi qa hak lolma, pas sūk̇aa, i’ God. Noqw pay pi um qatsit aw pákinik, um hin tutaptiwhqat aṅ hinmani.
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Hihtawata? Noqw Jesus paṅqawu: Um hakiy qa nīnani, um qa nāp úhimuy tokot qa sokoptani; um hihta qa ūuyni, um hakiy hihta qa atsátoynani;
Um unay, pu uṅuy pumuy k̇aptsi’tani; pu um pas hin nāmi unaṅway’taqey pan uhsinosṅway aw unaṅway’tani.
Noqw pam Jesus aw paṅqawu: Pay nu itsákoy aṅqaqw pan tutavot sohsok aṅ hinma. Noqw ya nu haqam hihta nāt qaanhti?
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Pay pi um pas pasiwtaniqey nāwakne’, um ahpiynen, hihta úhimuy huyahtani; nen aṅ ōokiwyaqamuy put huytani; nen um ōveqatsit ep hihta nukṅwat himuy’tani; nit um aṅqwnen inuṅkni.
Noqw pam put navotqe qahahlayk̇aṅw ahpiy’o, pam hihta nihti’taqe ōviy’o.
Pahsat pu Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Pas k̇ahaksino ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat aw pákiniqw eṅem qa tūvosi.
Noqw nu nāt piw umumi paṅqawni: Pay himu pohko pȫlay’taqa tsakomostat aṅ pórokput aṅ yámakniniqw, pam pay qa pas qa tūvosi. Noqw pay k̇ahaksino ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat aw pákiniqw, pam put eṅem pas qa tūvosi.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put nanaptaqe, hin kurs wūwayaqe paṅqaqwa: Noqw pantaniqw, hak sen ayo yámakiwtani?
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay i’ sinmuyniqw kurs hin pasiwtani; nīk̇aṅw pay God‐niqw sohsoy himu pasiwta.
Pahsat pu Peter lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Meh, itam hapi sohsok hihta mātapyat, uṅk nankwusa; noqw itam panhtotiqw, itamuṅem hintani?
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Hisat qatsit nātoniqat aw pituqw, Nu’ Sinot Tiat k̇aptsi’tiwk̇aṅw imoṅw’atsveway ep qátuni. Noqw pep pu’ uma inuṅk hinnumyaqam piw tuwat pakwt löq sihk̇ay’taqat moṅw’atsvewat aṅ yesk̇ahk̇aṅw, Israel‐sinmuy pakwt löq sihk̇ay’tasikivo sinoiwtaqamuy amumi moṅw’iwyuṅwni.
Hak haqam inatṅwaniy ōviy sinomuy, sen nāp himuy hihta tatamhtat, yep qatsit ep tsivót‐sikip sunat aw hóyokiwtaqat ömahtani, sen pam kiy tatamhtani, sen pāvamuy, tupkomuy, qȫqamuy, siwamuyu, sen nay pu yuy, sen nȫmay pu timuy, sen pāvasayu. Pu qatsit nātoniqat ep pam qatsit qaso’taqat makiwni.
Nīk̇aṅw k̇aysiwhqam mohti’wisqam nuhtuṅkyani, pu nuhtuṅkyaqam mohti’wisni.
Pi ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya hak tāqa ovauyi’taqat anta. Pam hak suits talavay tumal’aymuy wáṅwayi.
Noqw puma sūkw yālit ōviy tapkinayaniqey hu’wayaqw, pam ovauyiy aw pumuy ayata.
Noqw wukotöṅvaqw, i’ ūyi’taqa haqe’ waynumk̇aṅw, hakimuy piw tuwa. Puma huhyankive hoṅnumya qahintsatsk̇aqee.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay uma iovauyiy awyani. Noqw pay ason hin súantaqw, nu pan umumi sisvini. Noqw puma awya.
Noqw tāwanasaptiqw, pu tāwat atvelpetiqw, pam aṅqe’ nakwsuqe piw anhti.
Noqw pu kanel’ökisat, piw pam huhyankiminihqe, piw hakimuy tahtaqtuy tuwa, ep hoṅnumyaq’ö, nihqe amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hinoqw paysoq tēvep hoṅnumya?
Pu suhk̇a aw paṅqawu: Ispi qa hak itamuy tumal’ayhtaq’ö. Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: Uma turs piw iovauyiy awyani, amumi kita.
Noqw pu tapkiqw, ovauyi’taqa tumalmoṅwiy aw paṅqawu: Um tumalay’yuṅqamuy wáṅwayni; nen pumuy amumi sisvini. Um nuhtuṅk ökihqamuy aṅqw hoyoyoykuk̇aṅw, mohtimaqat aqw yúkuni.
Noqw ima pas pay tumalqe’totiniqw ökihqamuy amumi suskomuy yālit sisvi.
Nīk̇aṅw mohti ökihqam puma wūhaq ömahtotaniqey wūwaya; nit puma pay amún sohsoyam suskomuy yālit ömahtota.
Noqw puma ahsatiy ömahtotaqe, ūyi’taqat aw qa tsúyak‐unaṅway hiṅqaqwaqe,
Paṅqaqwa: Ima nuhtuṅk ökihqam panis sūs tāwat qöniltiqat aṅ tumaltota; noqw itam tēvep tumalay’yuṅwa, pu itam utuhuut k̇ānanapta. Noqw um sun itamumi sisvi.
Noqw pam sukwat aw paṅqawu: Ikwátsi, pay nu qa hin qasuanhti. Ya um qa sūkw yālit ōviy tumaltaniqey inumum pan yuku?
Taa, uh’ahsatiy um yawk̇aṅw nimani. Pay nu sohsokmuy umumi sun sisviniqey nāwakna, umuy tēvep tumalay’yuṅqamuy‐nik̇aṅw pu imuy nuhtuṅk ökihqamuy pīwu.
Ya nu hihta nāp isivay hintsanniqey nāwakne’ panhtiniqw, pam qasuanta? Ya nuy qa unáṅwawniqw, ōviy um inumi qa kwaṅwátayta?
Noqw ōviy nuhtuṅkyaqam mohti’wisni, pu mohti’wisqam nuhtuṅktotini. Pi k̇aysiwhqam as wáṅwayniwya, nik̇aṅw hikiyom namorstiwya.
Noqw pumuy Jerusalem aqwyaqw, Jesus imuy pakwt löq sihk̇ay’taqamuy put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy nanaltyaqw, amumi paṅqawu:
Meh, itam Jerusalem hapi aqwya. Noqw nu’ Sinot Tiat God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy‐nik̇aṅw pu tutavot tutuqaynayaqamuy amumi noiwni; noqw puma nuy nīnayaniqey pasiwnayani.
Pu nuy qa‐Jew‐sinmuy amumi noayaqw, puma inumi tututsiwyani; nuy wuvahtotani; pu nahoylehtsit aw nuy muayani. Nīk̇aṅw pāyis talq nu ahoy tātayni.
Noqw pahsat pu Zebedeet timat yuy amum Jesus aw pitu. Noqw yuam put pas hihtatak̇aṅw aw okiwlawu, hihta tuṅlay’k̇aṅwo.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Ya um hihta nāwakna? Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Ason um uhmoṅwqeniy ep qatuptuqw, as imuy itimuy amuṅaqw haqawa uhputvaqe qátuniqw, pu suhk̇awa uhsuyvaqe qátuniqat um itamuy hu’wani.
Noqw Jesus tíyotuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma hihta ōviy tūviṅlawhqey qa mātsi’ta. Ya pay uma nuy k̇ānavotpit aṅqw yúkuniqat aṅqw yúkuniqey suhtaq’ewa? Ya sen uma nuy hin tuvoylaiwtaqat pan tuvoylatiwniqe ōviy’o? Noqw puma put aw paṅqawu: Owi, pay itam suhtaq’ewa.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay nu kānavotpit aṅqw yúkuniqat uma as soon qa yúkuni; piw nuy hin tuvoylaiwtaqat pan uma tuvoylatiwni. Nīk̇aṅw pay nu hakiy iputvaqe, sen isuyvaqe qátuniqat paṅqawniqey aw qa tutuyqawi. Nīk̇aṅw pay ason pas pam hakimuy amuṅem na’sastiwhq pam pumuy amumi noiwni.
Noqw ima pakwtnihqam put nanaptaqe, pumuy nātupkomuy amumi qa yan unaṅwtoti.
Noqw Jesus pumuy nāmi wáṅwayhqe, amumi paṅqawu: Uma navoti’yuṅqw imuy qa‐Jew‐sinmuy moṅwimat pumuy amumi tutuyqawya, noqw pavansinom öqalay pumuy nanvotnatiwisa.
Nīk̇aṅw uma hapi qa panyuṅwni. Pay umuṅaqw haqawa pas pávanniqey nāwaknaqa umuy nawus tumalay’tani.
Pu uma haqawa sustutuyqawniqey nāwaknaqa nawus piw sohsokmuy tūwikiamni.
Hikis pi nu’ Sinot Tiat qa hihta tu’yalawniqe ōviy pitu; pi nu nuhtumi unaṅwtapniqe ōviy pitu, piw sinmuy k̇aysiwhqamuy amuṅem iqatsiy táve’, pumuy ayo óyaniqe ōviy’o.
Noqw pumuy Jerichot aṅqw ahpiyyaqw, qaan’ewakw hintaqam sinom Jesus aṅkya.
Noqw meh, lȫyöm qapostalqat tāqat pöqlave qatuk̇aṅw, Jesus aṅqe’niqw navotqe, tsa’lawhqe paṅqawu: Is okiw itamuy ōkwatuwaa, Tutuyqawhqa, um David tiat!
Noqw sinom pumuy mēwayaqe, qa hiṅqawlawniqat amumi paṅqaqwa. Noqw pahsat pu puma pas pāpu a’nö paṅqawu: Is okiw itamuy ōkwatuwaa, Tutuyqawhqa, um David tiat!
Noqw Jesus pep wunuptut, pumuy wáṅwayhqe, amumi paṅqawu: Ya nu umuy hintsanniqat uma nāwakna?
Noqw puma put aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, um as okiw itahposiy tālawnani.
Pu Jesus pumuy ōkwatuwhqe, pumuy pōsiyamuy aw hintsana; noqw pahsat pay pumuy pōsiam tālawva; noqw puma put aṅki.
Noqw puma Jerusalem aw hayiṅwnayaqe, Olive‐tsomot aw öki, Bethphage‐kitsókit aw’i. Noqw Jesus lȫqmuy put aw nánatuwnaqamuy ayataqe,
Amumi paṅqawu: Uma umupyeve kitsókit awnen; uma pep mōrot som’iwtaqw tiyat ámumnihqat túwani. Uma pumuy ṅaht, aṅqw inumi wikni.
Pu ason kurs hak umumi hiṅqawhq, uma aw paṅqawni: Tutuyqawhqa imuy nāwakna, kítani; noqw pahsat pay pam pumuy aṅqw lālayni.
Yan Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat hin lavayhtiqat aw antsaniwa; ura pam paṅqawu:
Uma Sion ep sinmuy āawnayani: Meh, umuhmoṅwi aṅqw umumii, okiw’unaṅway’k̇aṅw mōrot akw tsokiwma, morohyat akw’a.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnaqam ahpiynihqe, Jesus hin amumi lavayhtiqat anhti;
Nihqe mōrot wikva, pu morohyata. Noqw sinom yuwsiy amutsmi ahpatota; noqw Jesus aqw wūvi.
Noqw sinom pas qaan’ewakw hintaqam pönawit yuwsiy ahpatota; pu pētu himutsotskit nantaqayat tsahqayaqe pönawit o’ya.
Noqw ima mohti’wisqam amuṅkyaqamuy amumum tsa’tiwisqe paṅqawwisa: Öqawmaṅwu, David tíata! Uma Tutuyqawhqat natṅwaniyat aṅ pitutoqat pas hihtatotani. Nam God Sus’oveqnihqa put öqalaa!
Noqw pam Jerusalem ep pituqw, kīve sinom hin mowawaykuqe paṅqaqwa: Ya pam hak’i?
Noqw sinom paṅqaqwa: I’ Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaata, Jesus, Galileet ep Nazareth aṅq’ö.
Noqw pu Jesus God kīyat aw pítuhqe, ep ihpove huhyayaqamuy, pu hihta tuhtuy’yaqamuy sohsokmuy paṅqw tusoqlalayi, nit sīvat nāhoyṅwantotaqamuy huhyanpiyamuy takumna, pu höwihtuy huhyayaqamuy atsvewayamuy énaṅ’a;
Nihqe amumi paṅqawu: Ura Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat put eṅem yan pēna: Iki nāwakinpikihu yan túṅwantiwni. Noqw tuwat soq uma put uuyiṅwtuy kivatoynaya.
Noqw hakim qapostalyaqam, pu qayaktaqam God kīyat ep put aw öki, noqw pam pumuy qalaptsina.
Noqw tsātsayom God kīyat ep saáataqe, paṅqaqwa: Öqawmaṅwu, David Tiat! Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw pu tutavot tutuqaynayaqam it nanapta. Pu puma pas nāp yórikya Jesus k̇ātutmalat hintsakq’ö; nīk̇aṅw tuwat a’nö itsívutotiqe,
Jesus aw paṅqaqwa: Ya um imuy hiṅqaqwaqw qa navota? Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: As’a. Noqw ya uma it tutuvenit qa hisat aṅ tuṅwáya: Um titipostuy, pu yōyoṅyaqamuy moayamuy ahpiy pas suyan tayawintiwni, it aṅ’a?
Pu pam pumuy mātapt, kitsókit Bethanyt awnihqe, pep talöṅna.
Noqw talavay pam ahoy kīminik̇aṅw, tsöṅmoki.
Nit pam pöhut qalave nönvospaltsokit túwahqe, aw last, qa hihta ep tuwa, pay nahpit‐saa, nihqe aw paṅqawu: Pay um pas yahpiy qa hisat sipalay’vani, kita. Noqw pahsat pay nönvospaltsoki lāki.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put tutwaqe, k̇ātayuṅqe paṅqaqwa: Is uti! Nönvospaltsoki súlaki.
Jesus lavayhtiqe, pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Pas uma qapēvewnayak̇ahk̇aṅw qa wiwsiye’ nuy nönvospaltsokit hintsanqat uma piw pan hintsak‐wisni. Hikis put epnihqe hóyokput uma hintsak‐wisni. Uma it tūkwit nahlak̇e’ wuhkovatuphamiq tūviwniqat aw paṅqaqwaqw, pam kurs hin qa panhtini.
Pu uma qapēvewni’k̇ahk̇aṅw Inay aw hihta ōviy tūviṅtote’, soon qa put makiwyani.
Noqw pam God kīyat aw pákihqe, sinmuy tutuqaynaqw, ima God awwat mohpeq momṅwit, pu sinmuy amuṅaqw wukw’a’yat put aw ökihqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Ya um hihta öqalat aw yank̇aṅw īit hintsaki? Hak uṅ it öqalat maqa?
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe amumi paṅqawu: Kurs nu tuwat umuy sukw hihta tūviṅtani; noqw kurs uma nuy put āawnayaqw, nu tuwat hihta öqalat aw yank̇aṅw īit hintsakqey umuy āawnani.
Ura John kūyit akw tūtuvoylalawu. Pam pantsakniqey haqaqw makiwa? sen ōveqatsit aṅqö’? sen sinmuy amuṅaqö’? Noqw puma nānami yuaatotaqe paṅqaqwa: Ya sen itam Oṅaq’ö, kitotani? Soon qa pam itamumi paṅqawni: Noqw hinoqw uma put aw qa tūtuptsiwa?
Ya sen itam sinmuy amuṅaq’ö kitotani? Nīk̇aṅw itam sinmuy mamqasya. Pi sinom sohsoyam John Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaatnihqat pan mātsi’yuṅwa.
Noqw puma lavayhtotiqe Jesus aw paṅqaqwa: Kurs itam hin paṅqaqwani; noqw pam umumi paṅqawu: Pay nu ōviy piw soon hihta öqalat aw yank̇aṅw īit hintsakqey umuy āawnani.
Noqw ya uma hin wūwantota? Hak tāqa lȫqmuy tiyotimuy’ta; nihqe pam mohti’maqat awnihqe aw paṅqawu: Itii, um pu’ iovauyiy ep tumalay’tani.
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe nay aw paṅqawu: Sóoni, kitat, pay hihsavoniqw wuwniy alöṅtaqe aw haqamii.
Pu pam aṅknihqat awnihqe aw piw án lavayhti. Noqw pam hu’waqe nay aw paṅqawu: Nu awni, itanaa, kitat pay qa aw’i.
Noqw ya úmuyniqw imuy lȫqmuy amuṅaqw himuwa nay tunatyayat anhti? Noqw puma aw paṅqaqwa: Pay mohti’maqa. Noqw Jesus amumi paṅqawu: Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Ima moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalalwaqam, pu tokoy huhyayaqam momoyam umupyeve pay God moṅwtunatyayat aw yuṅta.
Pi John súantaqat pöhut umuy āawnaniqe umumi pituqw uma put aw qa tūtuptsiwa; noqw aṅwu pi moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalalwaqam, pu tokoy huhyayaqam put aw tūtuptsiwa. Noqw as uma aw yórikyat umuhtunatyay aṅqw qa lasya, uma as aw tūtuptsiwanik̇aṅwo.
Huvam inumi tuqayvastotaa. Noqw nu umuy tūwutsit āawnani. Hak tāqa ōvat uyht, put aw ṅöyakna, nit haqam ōvat pālayat yuykuyaniqat eṅem qölötat, tuwalankihut kīta; nit ūyit tumalay’yuṅqamuy amumi put mātapt, yāvoqhaqamii.
Pu ōviy kwaṅwtinisavotiqw pam tumal’aymuy ūyit tumalay’yuṅqamuy amumi hōna, aniwnit ömahtotaniqat ōviy’o.
Noqw ūyit tumalay’yuṅqam put ayamuyatuy ṅuahtotaqe, sukwat wuvahtota, pu sukwat nīnaya, pu sukwat tatatupya.
Pu piw pam pētuy tumal’aymuy mohti aqwyaqamuy amuhpenihqe hóyokiwtaqamuy amumi ayata. Noqw puma pumuy mohti’ ökihqamuy amún hintsatsna.
Pahsat pu pam nuhtuṅk pas tiy pumuy amumiq tavi paṅqawhqee: Puma pay itiy soon qa k̇aptsi’totani, yan wūwaqee.
Noqw soq ūyit tumalay’yuṅqam tiyat tutwaqe nānami paṅqaqwa: I’ hapi nay akpetaniqa. Taa, itam nīnayani, nen itam hihta himuyat himhtotani, kitota.
Nihqe puma put ṅuayat, ovauyit aṅqw qalavo tūvayat, nīnaya.
Taay, noqw ya ōvat ūyi’taqa pite’, ūyit tumalay’yuṅqamuy hintsanni?
Noqw puma put aw paṅqaqwa: Soon qa pam pumuy qahopihtuy qöyani, nit pas pētuy tumal’ayhtani; noqw puma put kwaṅwtiqw put aw kiwismantani, kitota.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma qa hisat it tutuvenit aṅ tuṅwáya? Owa kīlalwaqamuy amuhpiy qalavo tūviwhqa hapi tuyqaatniwhti. Tutuyqawhqa it tumaltaqw, itamuyniqw k̇ātatayhpi, it’a?
Yaniqw ōviy nu umumi paṅqawni: God moṅwtunatyaat umuṅaqw nawhkiwht, pu hihtuywatuy sinmuy amumi noiwni. Noqw puma hapi moṅwtunatyat ep sinoiwyuṅqamuy amún hinwisni.
Noqw it owat ep posqa hapi yóṅoyhtimantani; nīk̇aṅw ason pam owa hakiy aw pohse’ put pās tostani.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit, pu Pharisee‐sinom, puma put lavayiyat aw tūqayyuṅqe māmatsyaqw, kurs pay pam pumuy yuaata.
Nihqe puma as put ṅuayaniqey unaṅwtotit, piw sinmuy maqastoti, púmuyniqw pam Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaatniqw ōviy’o.
Noqw Jesus tūwutsit hihta tuawi’taqat akw pumuy amumi lavayhtiqe paṅqawu:
Oveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya hakiy moṅwit tiat nāaptsinaqw eṅem nōvatiwhqat anta.
Put naat nōviwhqat aw tūtsamiwyuṅqamuy wáṅwayyaniqat ōviy ayamuy aṅqe’ ayata. Noqw tūtsamiwyuṅqam awyaniqey qa nānawakna.
Pahsat pu piw pam pētuy tumal’aymuy ayataqe amumi paṅqawu: Uma tūtsamiwyaṅqamuy amumi paṅqaqwani: Taay, nōva pās yukilti; nu iwakasvokmuy, pu iwakashoymuy wi’yuṅqamuy qöya; noqw shosoy himu pās yukiwta. Uma nāaptsinaqat ep nōviwhqat awyani.
Noqw puma put paysoqtotaqe, haqe’ nankwusa, suhk̇a pāsay aw’i, pu suhk̇a huhyanpiy aw’i.
Noqw pētu tumal’aymuyatuy ṅuahtotat, pumuy okiwsasnat, qöqya.
Noqw moṅwi put navotqe itsivuti; nihqe pumuy amumi solāwamuy ayataqw, puma tumal’aymuyatuy qöqyaqamuy tuwat qöqya; nit kitsókiyamuy taqtsokya.
Noqw pahsat pu moṅwi tumal’aymuy amumi paṅqawu: Pas nāaptsiniwhqat ep nōviwhqat pās yukiwta; noqw kurs tūtsamiwyaqam qahopitu. Noqw ōviy soon pumuy amuṅaqw haqawa nōviwhqat aṅqw nösni.
Taay, uma aṅqe’ pöhut aṅ nankwuse’, hakimuy hihsa’nihqamuy tutwe’, uma pumuy nōviwhqat aw tūtsamtotani.
Noqw ōviy puma tumal’a’yat aṅqe’ pöhut aṅ nankwusaqe, hakimuy hihsa’nihqamuy tutwaqe, paṅso tsovalaya, qalomásinmuyu, pu lomasinmuyu. Noqw haqam nāaptsiniwhqat ep sinom ohpo.
Noqw moṅwi tūtsamiwyuṅqamuy amumi kuyvatoqe, ep pákihqe, hakiy tāqat nāaptsiniwhqat ep yuwsit qa yuwsi’taqat tuwa.
Nihqe pam put aw paṅqawu: Ikwátsi, ya um hin nāaptsiniwhqat ep yuwsit qa yuwsi’k̇aṅw pew paki? Noqw kurs pam hiṅqawni.
Pahsat pu moṅwi tumal’aymuy amumi paṅqawu: Huvam māyat, pu hok̇ayat somyat ayo’haqami ihpomi qalālat aw uma tūvayani. Pep tsaykitiwni, pu tama ṅuritiwni.
Pay as k̇aysiwhqam wáṅwayniwya; nīk̇aṅw pay híkiyom namorstiwya.
Pahsat pu Pharisee‐sinom ahpiyyaqe, hin as put lavayiyat akw núansanyaniqey ōviy namivavasiwnaya.
Nihqe puma hakimuy pumuy amumi nánatuwnayaqamuy pu Herod aṅqw wīsiwtaqamuy Jesus aw hōnayaqw, puma paṅqaqwa: Tūtutuqaynaqa, itam ūmi navoti’yuṅqw, um pas qaatsatnihqat hintsaki; nihqe um God tuwiyat suan tūtutuqayna; pu um qa sinonuiña, ispi um sinmuy wuwniyamuy qa k̇aptsi’taqee.
Um kurs ōviy itamuy āawnani, Ya um hin wūwanta? Ya pay itam hihta aṅ sivit Caesar aw ōoyyaniqw pam súanta? Sen qa súanta?
Noqw Jesus pumuy nukpantunatyayamuy tuway’taqe, amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hinoqw nuy unaheptota, nawip’ew hintsatsk̇aqamu?
Kurs tax ep sīvat inumi mahtaknayaa. Noqw puma put aw put mahtaknaya.
Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: Ya i’ hakiy taywaata? Pu hakiy tuṅwniat aṅ pey’ta?
Noqw puma put aw paṅqaqwa: Caesar hapi. Pahsat pu pam amumi paṅqawu: Panta hápiniqw; ōviy uma Caesar himuyat Caesar aw noayani; pu uma God himuyat God aw noayani.
Noqw puma yan nanaptaqe, kurs hiṅqaqwaqe, k̇ātayuṅt, put mātapyat, ahpiyya.
Noqw pay put tālat ep hakim Sadducee‐sinom, yaw so’pum pay ahoy qa yesvaniqat paṅqaqwaqam, put aw ökihqe tūviṅtotaqe,
Aw paṅqaqwa: Tūtutuqaynaqa, ura Moses hapi paṅqawu: Kurs tāqa qa tímuy’k̇aṅw mokq, put pāvaat, sen tupkoat put nȫmayatniṅwuqat amum qatupte’, put eṅem tíoymantani.
Noqw ura as hakim tsáṅe’nihqam nānatupkom yēse. Noqw amuṅaqw suspavaam as nȫmatat, qa tímuy’vat, pay mōki; nihqe tupkoy aw nȫmay mātavi.
Noqw aṅknihqa pay piw anhti; noqw pu amuṅknihqa pay piw amunhti. Noqw puma as tsáṅe’nihqam put nȫmatotaqw, qa hihtawat eṅem wuhti ti’va.
Noqw nuhtuṅk pu’ wuhti tuwat mōki.
Noqw ya ōviy sinmuy ahoy yesvaqw, pam hihtawat pumuy tsáṅe’nihqamuy nȫmaatni? Pi puma sohsoyam put nȫmatota.
Noqw Jesus amumi paṅqawu: Suyan pi uma tutuvenit‐nik̇aṅw pu God öqalayat qa tuwi’yuṅwa. Nihqe paniqw hapi ōviy uma qa suan wūwaya.
Pi sinom ahoy yesve’, soon nȫmalalwani, piw soon puwsuṅwlalwani; pas puma ōveqatsit ep God hoṅviaymuyatuy amunyuṅwni.
Noqw kurs uma so’qam ahoy yesvaniqat ep tūviṅtotaqw‐ya uma qa hisat tutuvenit aṅ it tuṅwáya: Ura God umumi paṅqawu:
Nu hapi Abraham, pu Isaac, pu Jacob, pumuy Tutuyqawhqaamu, it’a? (Noqw ōviy puma nāto yēse.) Oviy pi God qa so’pumuy amumi tutuyqawi, pi yesqamuy amumii.
Noqw sinom it nanaptaqe, put tutuqayhpiyat ep k̇ātayuṅwa.
Noqw yaw pam Sadducee‐sinmuy moavöltaqat Pharisee‐sinom nanaptaqe, puma sumitsovalti.
Noqw pumuy amuṅaqw suhk̇a tutavot aw tuvoti’taqa put unahepqe, tūviṅtaqe aw paṅqawu:
Tūtutuqaynaqa, ya tutavot ep himuwa pas suspavani?
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Um God Uhtutuyqawhqay aw sohsok uh’unaṅway akw unaṅway’tani, pu sohsok uhhikwsiy akw’a, pu sohsok uhwuwniy akw’a.
I’ hapi susmohti‐nik̇aṅw pu suswuyoq tutavo.
Noqw aṅknihqa pay piw put anta: Um pas nāmi hin unaṅway’taqey pan uhsinosṅway aw unaṅway’tani.
Pi sohsoy tutavo pu Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymuyatuy lavayiam imuy lȫqmuy tutavot hapi ahpiy’o.
Noqw nāt Pharisee‐sinom tsovawtaqw, Jesus pumuy tūviṅtaqe,
Amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hin Christ aw wūwantota? Ya pam hakiy tíata? Noqw puma put aw paṅqaqwa: David hapi pam tíata.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Noqw pantaqw hinoqw David Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit ahpiy put Moṅwílawu? Oviy pi paṅqawu:
Tutuyqawhqa Imoṅwiy aw paṅqawu: Um hāk iputvaqewat qátuni, hisat nu uhtuwqamuy áṅwutaqw, puma ūmi maqaptsi’yuṅwniqat pahsavoo.
Noqw kurs David put Moṅwílawhq, hin pam put tíatni?
Noqw soon kurs hak put hu’wani. Piw pāpu qa hak pahpiy put hihta tūviṅtaniqey aw unasaki.
Pahsat pu Jesus sinmuy‐nik̇aṅw pu put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi lavayhtiqe,
Paṅqawu: Tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam Pharisee‐sinmuy amumum Moses qeniyat ep hōñi.
Paniqw ōviy uma pumuy lavayiyamuy aw tūqayyuṅwi, pu umuy hinhtotiniqat umumi paṅqaqwaqw uma panhtotimantani; nīk̇aṅw uma pumuy qa tututsk̇anayani. Taq puma as nuhtumi yuaatiwisk̇ahk̇aṅw, lavayiy qa an hinwisa.
Taq puma soñawnen hihta s’nö putut mok̇ahtotat, hakiy īkwiltoynayaṅwu; nīk̇aṅw soon ṅas’ew put paaṅwayaṅwu.
Nihqe nāp hihta hintsatsk̇aqey mahtakni’yuṅwniqey ōviy pantsatsk̇a. Puma God lavayiyat hihta aṅ pey’yuṅqat put qötösosomhpi’yuṅṅwu, pu may aṅ pīwu, pu yuwsiy wupatsamimhtoynaya.
Pu haqe’ nōviwhqat aṅ mohk̇aqe qeqnit tuṅlay’yuṅṅwu, pu tsotsvalkiva qenit pas pávanyaqat pīwu.
Pu sinom kīsonva pumuy pas hihtay’yuṅwniqat nānawakna, pu Tutuqaynaqa yan túṅwantiwyaniqey tuṅlay’yuṅwa.
Noqw uma hapi Tutuqaynaqa qa yan túṅwantiwyani; pi sūk̇a umuy tutuqaynaqa, Christ; noqw uma sohsoyam nānatupkomu.
Pu uma tūwaqatsit ep qa hakiy nálalwani; pi sūk̇a Umunaa, ōveqatsit ep qátuhqa.
Pu piw uma Tūtsami’wisqey qa yan túṅwantiwyani; pay pi sūk̇a umuy tsāmi’maqa, Christ.
Pay umuṅaqw pas suspavannihqa umuy tumalay’mani.
Haqawa pavan nāhihtataqa hapi qahimuniwhtini; pu nāqahihtataqa hapi a’nö hímuniwhtini.
Nīk̇aṅw is ohi uma tutavot tutuqaynayaqamu, pu Pharisee‐sínomu, nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! pi uma ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatyat aw sinmuy uhtsi’yuṅwa; uma as qa aw yuṅtak̇aṅw, aw yuṅniqamuy qa nakwhantoynaya.
Is ohi uma tutavot tutuqaynayaqamu, pu Pharisee‐sínomu, nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! uma koṅnanalvutuy kīkiyamuy nawhkilalwa; pu uma nawip’ew nānawakne’, sutsépyuaaykuyaṅwu. Paniqw hapi ōviy uma pas pavan qalomáyukuniwyaniqey aqw hoyta.
Is ohi, uma tutavot tutuqaynayaqamu, pu Pharisee‐sínomu, nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! Pas pay uma hakiy umuhtuptsiwniy aw tuptsiwnayaniqe ōviy pātuwaqatsit, pu tūwaqatsit aṅ ahsupoq nankwusaṅwu. Noqw uma put aw tuyqawvayaqw, pam umuhpenihqe pas qalomáhintsakṅwu. Noqw ōviy God nawus maskive qȫhit aqw put sivintoynani, umuhpenihqe hóyokiwtaqata.
Is ohi uma tūtsamyaqam qapostalyaqamu! Oviy pi uma paṅqaqwa: Hak lavayhte’: Nam ilavayi God kīyat hin hūrs wúnuhqat pan wúnuni kite’, pam soñawnen qa hinwat lavayhtiṅwu. Nīk̇aṅw kurs pam Ilavayi it sik̇avalasivat God kīyat epnihqat an pasiwtani kite’, pam nawus lavayiy kurs hin qa anhtini.
Uma ṅasta wuwni’yuṅqamu qapostalya! Ya himuwa pas pávanniqw ōviy’o? sen sik̇avalasiva? sen God kīata? Pi put kīat hapi sik̇avalasivat pas hihtataṅwu.
Uma piw pan tūtutuqaynaya: Hak lavayhte’: Nam ilavayi God kīyat ep hom’oyvihk̇at an pasiwtani, kite’, pam soñawnen qa hinwat lavayhtiṅwu. Nīk̇aṅw hak lavayhte’: Nam ilavayi hom’oyvihk̇at ep kuwahtiput an pasiwtani, kite’, nawus pam lavayiy kurs hin qa anhtini.
Uma núanhihtu qapostalyaqamu! Ya himuwa pas pávanniqw ōviy’o? sen kuwahtipu? Sen hom’oyvihk̇a? Pi pam hapi kuwahtiput pas hihtataṅwu.
Paniqw ōviy hom’oyvihk̇at akw öqalat lavayiy pasiwnaqa piw kuwahtiput pep oyiwhqat akw pan lavayhtiṅwu.
Piw God kīyat akw öqalat lavayiy pasiwnaqa piw God pep ki’taqat akw pan lavayhtiṅwu.
Pu hak ōveqatsit akw öqalat lavayiy pasiwnaqa hapi God moṅw’atsvewayat akw pan lavayhtiṅwu, pu put ep tsokiwtaqat akw’a.
Is ohi uma tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqamu, pu Pharisee‐sínomu, nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! uma pi umuh’uyiy aṅqw nēnevenit pakwút‐sikivo sun oyit God aw noayaṅwu; nīk̇aṅw soq God tutavoyat pas pávanyaqat uma ayo yuykuya; uma sinmuy amuṅem suan hin yukuyaniqey qe’toti; uma ṅasta núokway’yuṅwa; uma qa suan hinwisa. Uma as pávanyaqat tutavot aṅ ahsupoq hinwisnik̇aṅwo, pu it qa pas qatuvosnihqat aṅ pīwu.
Uma hihtu qapostalk̇ahk̇aṅw tūtsamyaqamu! pas uma totophohyat ōviy kūyit tsahkwakink̇ahk̇aṅw, it himuvohkot pȫlay’taqat kwukwú’ya.
Is ohi uma tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqamu, pu Pharisee‐sínomu, nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! Uma kuyapkuyit, sen tsaqaptat ōvaqe‐sa kwaṅw’ewakwnihqat anyuṅwa, nīk̇aṅw soq hihta tukwhanayaniqey‐sa tunatyawyuṅwa, Pu uma qanamítuyqawi’yuṅṅwu.
Um qapostal Pharisee‐sino, um mohti uhkuyapiy ahsonṅaqw kwaṅw’ewakwtaqw, pam ōvaqe piw kwaṅw’ewayni.
Is ohi uma tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqamu, pu Pharisee‐sínomu, nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! Uma tūtuamit qötsálwiwyuṅqat anyuṅwa. Pay as antsa pi pam ōvaqe lomasosniwa; noqw pi ahsonve sinmuy ȫqaam aṅ opom’iwyuṅwa, pu sohsoy himu toyoy’eway’o.
Noqw pan uma suovaam pay suan hinyuṅqey nuhtumi namtaknaya; nīk̇aṅw uma pan atsáy’k̇ahk̇aṅw qa súanhinwisa.
Is ohi uma tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqamu, pu Pharisee‐sínomu, nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! Uma pi Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymuyatuy amuṅem tuamhqölöt lomahinyuṅqat yuykuya, pu aṅ hakimuy súanyuṅqamuy haqe’ tūam’iwyuṅqat aṅ aw nukwáṅwsonilantotaqe,
Paṅqaqwaṅwu: Pas as itam itanamuy qatsíyamuy ep yēse’, soon amumum Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymuyatuy qöqyani.
Yan uma Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymuyatuy qöqyaqamuy tímatnihqey nāsuhputsni’yuṅwa.
Taay! Huvam umunamuy hihta yayhnayaqat aw antsatsnaa.
Uma lölöqaṅhtuy amunyuṅqamu, uma tsūtsu’tuy aniwnimatu! ya uma hin qȫhit aqw maspiwyaniqey aṅqw ayo nöṅakni?
Pantaqw ōviy meh! Nu hapi umumi lavay’a’yatuy hōnani, pu suan wuwni’yuṅqamuyu; pu tūtutuqaynayaqamuy nu umumi ayatani. Noqw haqawatuy uma qöqyani; pu haqawatuy nahoylehtsit aw múayani; pu haqawatuy uma umuhtsotsvalkiy aṅ a’nö wuvahtotani, nen aṅ aqwhaqami kitsókinawit pumuy okiwsahsanyani.
Noqw God umuy hapi tukopani, sohsokmuy suan hinwisqamuy umunam qöqyaqat ahpiy’o, it súantaqat Abel qatsíyat ep’e, pu aṅk yesqamuy pīwu, pu Barachias tiyat Zacharias yan mātsiwhqat qatsíyat ep’e. Ura uma God kīyat‐nik̇aṅw pu hom’oyvihkat pumuy amuhtsave put nīnaya.
Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: God pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqamuy amumi sohsok it yantaqat ep nāoyni.
Is ohi úmaa, Jerusalem ep sínomu! Is ohi umuṅemi! Uma Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymuyatuy qöyantotaqamu, pu umumi ayatiwyaqamuy tatatupqöyantotaqamu! Pas as nu hihsakishaqam umuy tsovalani, kowakowuhti timuy masay atpik̇aqe taṅataṅwuqat pan’i; noqw uma qa nānakwha.
Meh! God umuhkiy pay tatamhta.
Pi nu umumi paṅqawni: Pay uma yahpiy haqahpiy soon inumi yórikyani. Nīk̇aṅw ason hisat aw pituqw, uma paṅqaqwani: Tutuyqawhqat natṅwaniyat aṅ pitutoqa nam tayawintiwaa, uma kitotani; nen pep pu’ uma inumi piw yórikyani.
Pu Jesus paṅqw yamakt, God kīyat aṅqw ahpiy’o; noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam God kīyat ep aṅ kīiwyuṅqat put aw mahtaknayaniqe put aw öki.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma sohsok it aṅ qa tāyuṅwa? Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Pay nāt pas qa haqam i’ owa nāp qeniy epni. Pas sohsoy sahpukniwni.
Noqw pam tsomot Olivet epeq qatuqw, put aw nánatuwnayaqam pay nanalt put aw ökihqe aw paṅqaqwa: Um itamuy āawnani: Ya īi hisat yaniwhtini? Pu uṅ hisat pítuniqat himu put tuawi’tani, pu qatsit sohtiniqata?
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma tunatyaltotini; noqw qa hak umuy ūnatoynani.
Taq nāt k̇aysiwhqam inatṅwaniy aw yank̇ahk̇aṅw ök̇e’, paṅqaqwani: Nu’ hapi Christ kitotani, nen k̇aysiwhqamuy ūnatoynayani.
Pu uma nāqöyiwuy yāvaqnihqat nanvotyani, pu umuhhayhk̇e’ nāqöytaqw uma nanaptani. Nīk̇aṅw uma qa hin unaṅwtotini. Pi pay pam pāvantaqa pas soon qe’ni. Nīk̇aṅw pay hapi nāt qa pep so’ṅwamiq pítuni.
Pi aṅqe’ hihtuwat sinom hihtuywatuy sinmuy amumi wuṅkuyamantani. Pu moṅwtunatya sukw moṅwtunatyat ehpewhtimantani. Pu hāhaqe’ tsöṅösqatsini, wukotuyhqatsini, pu tutskwa tayayaykuni.
Ii hapi hīhihta k̇ānanvotpit yayhniata.
Noqw sinom sohsoyam umumi qa suhtaq’ewyani, uma isinomniqw ōviy’o. Noqw puma umuy okiwsahsanyat, umuy qöqyani.
Noqw pahsat pu k̇aysiwhqam tuptsiwniy aṅqw lasye’, nānami qa suhtaq’ewyani. Noqw sūk̇a sukw momṅwituy aw mātapni.
Noqw k̇aysiwhqam hoṅve’, Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymatnihqey atsáy’k̇ahk̇aṅw k̇aysiwhqamuy ūnatoynayani.
Ephaqam qaanhtipu tūwaqatsit aṅ ahsupoq kúrukiwmani, noqw ōviy k̇aysiwhqam nami’naṅway aṅ peveltotini.
Noqw pay yūmosa aṅ kuytaqa hapi ayo yámakni.
Noqw isinom tūwaqatsit aṅ ahsupoq it lomatuawit yuaatotaqw, sinom sohsoyam nanaptani. Noqw pep pu’ so’ṅwamiq pítuni.
Ura Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat Daniel yan lavayhti: Hak nuhtsel’ewaynihqa tūkiqötaniqa wunuptuni. Aṅ túṅwantaqa māmatsni. Noqw ōviy ason uma put God kīyat pas himunihqat ep wúnuhqat aw yórikyaqw,
Pep pu’ ima Judeat aṅ yesqam tuhtukwimiq watqani.
Pu i’ hak kits’oveqnihqa paṅqw hāwe’, nawus soon hihta ōviy ahpami papkini, súwayaniqe ōviy’o.
Pu i’ hak pasve hinnumqa soon yuwsiy ōviy kīmini.
Noqw hisat aw pituqw, pep hapi pu’ haqawat aṅ nö’yiwyuṅqamuy, pu yōyoṅnayaqamuy kurs hin watqaniqamuy amuṅem pas is óhini.
Noqw pas pay okiw uma qa tömö’ watqaniqey ōviy Umunay aw tūviṅlalwani, piw qa nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep’e.
Taq pep aw pituqw, qaan’ewakw k̇ānavotpini, pas tūwaqatsit hisat yukiltiqat aṅqw pew pahsavo qa hisat pan hiniwhtiqat pan’i, pas qae, piw soon hisat pāpu paniwhtini.
Noqw as talöṅwintiwhqa qa pelvotiqw, soon hak ayo yámakni. Noqw pay hapi Tutuyqawhqat namoramuyatuy amuṅem tunatyat ahpiy pam pelvotini.
Pep pu’ ason kurs hak umumi, Meh, yep Christ kitaqw, sen Ayamo, kitaqw uma qa tūtuptsiwani.
Taq nāt hakim Christ‐nihqey nātsok̇ani’yuṅqam mātaqtotini; pu Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymatnihqey nātsok̇ani’k̇ahk̇aṅw hoṅvani, qa púmayak̇aṅwo; nen hīhihta k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’taqat hintsatsk̇ani, pas qaöwíhintaniqw ōviy kurs as hin pasiwtaniqw hikis pi aṅ Tutuyqawhqat namoramuyatuy ūnatoynayani.
Noqw meh, uma hapi pay nanapta, ispi nu aṅwu pay umuy put āawnaq’ö.
Paniqw ōviy kurs puma umumi Meh, taq pam qayēsiwhpuve qatu, kitotaqw, uma qa awhaqamiyani; sen Meh, pam yūpaveq qatu, kitotaqw, uma qa tūtuptsiwani.
Pi hōpaq talwihpiki tēveṅehaqami mātaqtiṅwu; noqw pay hapi pantani hisat Nu, Sinot Tiat, pítuniq’ö.
Pi haqam himu mokput tokoatniqw, paṅso wiwsokt tsovaltiṅwu.
Noqw pahsat put k̇ānavotpit atsve āpiy pay tāwa qa tālawvani, pu mūyawuy aṅqw qa talni, pu sōtu tokpelat aṅqw löhöhöykuni, pu ōvaqe hīhimu öqala tayayaykuni.
Noqw pahsat pu himu tokpelat epeq mātsiltini, nuy Sinot Tiyat pítuniqat tuawi’taniqee. Noqw pahsat pu tūwaqatsit ep sohsoyam nanāpwat sinom tsaykitani; noqw pu Nu, Sinot Tiat, öqalat yank̇aṅw, qaan’ewakw son’iwk̇aṅw, ōvaqe ōomawhtuy akw hawtoqw, puma nuy tutwani.
Noqw itötöqpi a’nö töqtiqw, nu ihoṅviaymuy aṅqe’ ayatani; noqw puma inamoramuy tūwaqalvoqhaqami yesqamuy nānan’ivaqw tsovalayani.
Taay, kurs uma nönvospaltsokit hihta tuawi’taqat nanaptani. Put nantaqaat palmokte’ sákwawsate’, nahpi’wisq, kurs tal’aṅwhayiṅwtiqat uma nanaptaṅwu.
Noqw pan hapi uma sohsok īit hihta aw yórikye’, soon pas nu hisat pítuniqat uma nanaptani. Pep hapi nu soñawnen hötsíwhpeq wúnuhqat uma nanaptani.
Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Soon nāt ima sinom tūtuwayaqw, pay īi sohsoy yaniwhtini.
Pay tokpela, pu tūwaqatsi tūwayani; nīk̇aṅw ilavayi hapi pas soon tūwayani.
Nīk̇aṅw hisat aw pítuniqat, pu haqe’ qalawmaqwhaqamniqat hapi qa hak navoti’ta. Pas qae, ōveqatsit ep hoṅvia’yam hikis qa navoti’yuṅwa. Pas Ina nāla put navoti’ta.
Noqw ura Noet qatsíyat ep hin hiniwhtiqat pay hapi piw pantani hisat Nu, Sinot Tiat pítuniqat ep’e.
Pay ura nāt qa pātsikq, sinom nōnova, pu hīhikwya; nȫmalalwa, pu puwsuṅwlalwa, hisat Noet pākihut aqw pákihqat aw pahsavoo.
Nihqe puma qanavoti’yuṅqe pātsikq, puma sohsoyam súlawhti. Noqw pay piw hapi pantani hisat nu’ Sinot Tiat pítuniqat ep’e.
Pep pu’ hakim lȫyöm haqam pasveni; suhk̇a wīkiwhq, suhk̇a akwsiṅwni.
Pu hakim lȫyöm wuhtit ṅúmantani; suhk̇a wīkiwhq, suhk̇a akwsiṅwni.
Pantaqw ōviy uma tunatyawyuṅwni, taq Umuhtutuyqawhqa hisat pítuniqat uma qa navoti’yuṅwa.
Noqw uma it navoti’yuṅwni: Pi as ki’taqa uyiṅwut hísatniqw pítuniqat navoti’te’, soon qa tūwalani, nen soon put kīyat haqe’ aw pákiniqw pam pánani.
Paniqw ōviy uma pās moṅwvas’iwyuṅwni; taq uma nāt qa pan wūwantotaqw, nu’, Sinot Tiat pítuni.
Taa. Ya hak haqam hihta aṅ suan hinmaqa suan wuwni’taqa tumal’aya? Put hapi moṅwi tumalsuṅwamuyatuy amumi moṅwtapq, pam pumuy aṅsakis tunöshuylawni.
Kurs moṅwi hisat ahoy pite’, put nāt suan tumalay’maqat aw yorikq, pam hahlayhpit epni.
Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Put moṅwíat pas soon put qa sohsok hihta himuy aw moṅwtapni.
Nīk̇aṅw kurs as pam tumal’aya qahopinen, pam unaṅwpeq paṅqawni: Imoṅwi pítuniqey pas nāt haqami tavi’ma, kítani.
Nen pu’ tumalsuṅwamuy wuvahtivak̇aṅw, pu honaqkuyit akw hōnaq’iwyuṅqamuy amumum tūmoyk̇aṅw, pu hīhikwni.
Pu pam qa hin pan wūwank̇aṅw, moṅwiy qa nuhtay’taqw,
Pam pite’ put pavan pas a’nö sivintoynani. Noqw pam nawip’ew hinyuṅqamuy amumum nātuwiwni. Pep a’nö tsaykitiwni, pu tama ṅuritiwni.
Pahsat pu ōveqatsit aṅqw moṅwtunatya hakimuy pakwtnihqamuy mámanhtuy amuntani. Puma wihqöhiy ömahtota, möönaṅwhtiniqat ahsawvawisa.
Noqw pumuy amuṅaqw tsívotnihqam wuwni’yuṅqw, pu tsívotnihqam qa wuwni’yuṅwa.
Qa wuwni’yuṅqam wihqöhi’wisk̇ahk̇aṅw, tövukuyit qa mask̇ay’wisa.
Noqw wuwni’yuṅqam wihqöhi’wisk̇ahk̇aṅw, tövukuyit hihta aṅ kūyi’wisa.
Noqw möönaṅw nawutsnaqw, puma sohsoyam puwso’qe tokva.
Noqw suhtokihaq hak a’nö paṅqawu: Meh, möönaṅw aṅq’ö, huvam ahsawvawisaa.
Pahsat pu puma mamanht sohsoyam hoṅvaqe, wihqöhiy aw hintsatsna.
Noqw qa wuwni’yuṅqam wuwni’yuṅqamuy amumi paṅqaqwa: Itamuy umuhtövukuyiy aṅqw maqayaa, taq itahwihqöhi tōkiwwisa.
Noqw wuwni’yuṅqam lavayhtotiqe paṅqaqwa: Sóoni, taq k̇a itamumi nan’ivo qa aptsiwtani, tis pi uma huhyayaqamuy amumiye’, nenṅem tuiyani.
Noqw pumuy nāt tuiwisq möönaṅw pitu; noqw ima moṅwvas’iwyuṅqam put amum nāṅuiwniqat ep nōviwhqat aw yuña, noqw ihpoq uhtsilti.
Atsve pu’ mimawat mamanht piw tuwat ökihqe, paṅqaqwa: Moṅwi, Moṅwi, itamuṅem hötaa.
Noqw pay pam lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Nu umuy hakimuy qa tuwi’ta.
Yantaqw ōviy uma tunatyawyuṅwni, pi uma hisat talöṅvaqat, pu haqe’ qalawmaqw nu’ Sinot Tiat pítuniqat qa navoti’yuṅwa.
Pi nu hakiy haqami yāvoqnihqat antani. Pam hak tumal’aymuy wáṅwayhqe, amumi hihta himuy noa.
Nihqe sukw aw tsivót‐sikip sōmorit sīvat oya, nit pu sukw aw lȫp sōmorit sīvata, nit pu sukw aw sūp sōmorit sīvata, hin nanāpwat akw moṅwvastotiniqat pan pakwámna; nit pahsat pay haqami nakwsu.
Pahsat pu i’ tsivot‐sikip sōmorit sīvat ömahtaqa ahpiynihqe, put akw huhyaqe, put aw tsivót‐sikip sōmorit sīvat hóyokna.
Pu i’ lȫp sōmorit sīvat ömahtaqa piw put anhtiqe, lȫp sōmorit sīvat put aw hóyokna.
Noqw pu sūp sōmorit sīvat ömahtaqa ahpiynihqe, tutskwave haṅwat, paṅsoq moṅwiy sīvayat tupk̇a.
Pu ahpiy wūyavotiqw, pumuy moṅwíam pítuhqe, pumuy amumi put ep pohta.
Noqw ōviy i’ tsivót‐sikip sōmorit sīvat ömahtaqa pituhqe, piw tsivót‐sikip sōmorit sīvat kívahqe, paṅqawu: Moṅwi, ura as um tsivót‐sikip sōmorit sīvat inumi noa, noqw meh, nu put aw tsivót‐sikip sōmorit sīvat hóyokna.
Noqw put moṅwíat aw paṅqawu: Um súanhti, um lolma qa paysoq hintsakqa tumal’aya, um tsa’ tuwanit ep qa paysoq hintsaki. Noqw ōviy nu uṅ pavan wūhaq tuwanit aw moṅwtapni. Um uhmoṅwiy amum hahlayni.
Pu tuwat i’ lȫp sōmorit sīvat ömahtaqa pítuhqe aw paṅqawu: Moṅwi, ura as um lȫp sōmorit sīvat inumi noa; noqw meh, nu lȫp sōmorit sīvat put aw hóyokna.
Noqw put moṅwíat aw paṅqawu: Um súanhti, um lolma qa paysoq hintsakqa tumal’aya; um tsa’ tuwanit ep qa paysoq hintsaki. Noqw ōviy nu uṅ pavan wūhaq tuwanit aw moṅwtapni. Um uhmoṅwiy amum hahlayni.
Pahsat pu i’ sūp sōmorit sīvat ömahtaqa pituhqe, paṅqawu: Moṅwi, nu ūmi navoti’taqw, um a’nö unaṅway’ta; nihqe um haqam qa uyht ep höqṅwu, pu haqe’ poshumit qa tsalakin’uyht aṅ hihta tsovalaṅwu.
Noqw nu uṅ mamqasqe, ōviy ahpiynihqe, uhsivay tutskwave tupk̇a; noqw meh, yep uhsiva.
Noqw put moṅwíat lavayhtiqe put aw paṅqawu: Is okiw um hak qahopi, naöntumal’aya! Pas as um inumi navoti’taqw, nu haqam qa uyht ep höqṅwunik̇aṅw, pu haqe’ poshumit qa tsalakin’uyht paṅ tsovalaṅwu.
Himu pi um sīvat aw tunatyawyuṅqamuy amumi isivay óyanik̇aṅwo; noqw nu hisat pite’, isivay ep sivit enaṅ ömahtani.
Pahsat pu tumal’aymuy amumi paṅqawu: Huvam sīvat nawhkiyaa, nen pakwút‐sikip sōmorit himuy’taqat put maqayaa.
Pi hakiy himuy’taqat aw himu noiwmantani, noqw pam hihta nihti’tamantani; nīk̇aṅw hihta öwihimuy’taqw, hikis pam put nawhkiwni.
Pu uma it ṅasta apit tumal’ayat ihpo qatālat awhaqami tūvayani; pep tsaykitiwni, pu tāma ṅuritiwni.
Ason nu’ Sinot Tiat sohsokmuy ihoṅvia’yamuy tsamk̇aṅw, lolma tālawṅway’k̇aṅw pite’, pep pu’ nu pas k̇aptsi’tiwk̇aṅw, imoṅw’atsveway ep qatuptuni.
Noqw sohsoyam hihtu nanāpwat sinom inutpipo tsovaltini; noqw nu pumuy pep nāhoy tsīk̇ani, lālayhqa kanelmuy kakapirstuy amuṅaqw tsīk̇aṅwuqat pan’i.
Nen nu kanelmuy iputvaqewat óyani, pu kakapirstuy isuyvaqewata.
Nen nu iputvaqewat tsovawtaqamuy amumi paṅqawni: Huvam pewyaa, Inay aṅqw hahlaywaqamu; nen uma umuhmoṅwiy umeṅem hihta na’sastaqat makiwyani, tūwaqatsit hisat yukiltiqat aṅqaqw umuṅem na’sastiwhqat put’a.
Pi ura nu tsöṅmokiwtaqw, uma nuy nopnaya; nu pānaqmokiwtaqw, uma nuy hikwnaya; nuy kurs hákiyniqw, uma nuy pās taviya;
Nuy qa yuwsi’taqw, uma nuy yuwsinaya; nuy tūtuyhq, pu sivikive pakiwtaqw, uma nuy pohtaya.
Pahsat pu ima suan hinyuṅqam lavayhtote’, paṅqaqwani: Moṅwi ya hisat uṅ tsöṅmokiwtaqw, itam uṅ tutwaqe nopnaya; uṅ pānaqmokiwtaqw, itam uṅ hikwnaya?
Ya hisat um kurs hákiyniqw, itam uṅ tutwaqe pās taviya, uṅ qa yuwsi’taqw, uṅ yuwsinaya?
Pu ya hisat um tūtuyhq, pu sivikive pakiwtaqw, itam uṅ tutwaqe uṅ pohtaya?
Noqw nu lavayhte’, amumi paṅqawni: Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Pay uma imuy itupkomuy amuṅaqw hihtawat sushin’ewakw aw pan unaṅwtapye’, uma inumi unaṅwtapyaṅwu.
Pahsat pu nu imuy isuyvaqewat tsovawtaqamuy amumi paṅqawni: Huvam inuṅaqw ahpiyaa, uma God itsivuyat akw nankiwakw hinhtotiqamu. Qȫhit qa tsohtso’ṅwuqat aqw uma maspiwyani, it qȫhit Nukpanat éṅem‐nik̇aṅw pu hoṅviaymuyatuy amuṅem na’sastiwhqat aqw’a.
Pi ura nu tsöṅmokiwtaqw, uma nuy qa nopnaya; nuy pānaqmokiwtaqw, uma nuy qa hikwnaya.
Ura nu kurs hákiyniqw, uma nuy qa pās taviya; qa yuwsi’taqw, uma nuy qa yuwsinaya; nuy tūtuyhq, pu sivikive pakiwtaqw, uma nuy qa pohtaya.
Pahsat pu puma tuwat lavayhtote’, paṅqaqwani: Moṅwi, ya hisat um tsöṅmokiwtaqw, pu pānaqmokiwtaqw, sen kurs hákiyniqw, sen qa yuwsi’taqw, sen tūtuyhq, sen sivikive pakiwtaqw, itam uṅ tutwak̇aṅw ūmi qa unaṅwtapya?
Pahsat pu nu lavayhte’, amumi paṅqawni: Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Pay uma imuy amuṅaqw sushin’ewakw aw qa unaṅwtapye’, uma inumi qa unaṅwtapyaṅwu.
Noqw ima hapi sivihpit sútsepniqat aqwyani; noqw suan hinwisqam qatsit qaso’taqat awyani.
Noqw Jesus yan lavayiy yúkuhqe, pahsat pu pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu;
Uma navoti’yuṅqw lötok hapi ura amutsva‐yūmosanihqat ep nōviwniqat aw pítuni. Noqw ep hapi nu’ Sinot Tiat momṅwituy amumi mātaviwhq, puma nahoylehtsit aw nuy muayani, kita.
Noqw ephaqam hakim pavansinom hakiy Caiaphas kīyat ep tsovalti, God awwat susmohpeq moṅwit kīyat ep’e‐ímaa: God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu tutavot tutuqaynayaqam‐niqw, pu sinmuy amuṅaqw wukw’a’yamu.
Nihqe hin as puma nanauyve Jesus ṅuaye’ nīnayaniqey pavasiwnaya.
Nit pay paṅqaqwa: Pay qa nōviwhqat epni, taq k̇a sinom qaunáṅwtalawvayani.
Noqw Jesus Bethany ep hakiy tokoplelet tūtuyṅwuqat Simon kīyat epniqw,
Pumuy nōnovaqw, hak wuhti wihkuyit kwaṅwáhovaqtuqat a’nö hihk̇ay’taqat hihta aṅ kūyiwtaqat yawk̇aṅw ep paki, wikorot hihta owat alabaster aṅqw yukiwtaqa aṅ kūyiwtaqata; nihqe wikorot yōhaqe, Jesus qötöyat aw wihkuyit wūta.
Noqw Jesus aw nánatuwnayaqam aw yórikyaqe, qayan unaṅwtotiqe paṅqaqwa: Ya i’ wihkuyi hinoqw paysoq hovalniwa?
Aṅwu k̇a as pam wūhak ōviy huyiwe’, aṅ ōokiwyuṅqamuy amumi noiwnik̇aṅwo.
Noqw Jesus hiṅqaqwaqat navoti’taqe, ōviy pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hinoqw wuhtit unaṅwmokintota? Pam inumi lolmat tumalta.
Uma pi pay ōokiwyuṅqamuy sutsep oyi’yuṅwa; nīk̇aṅw uma nuy qa sutsep tavi’yuṅwni.
Pam nuy ásnaniqe ōviy it wihkuyit itokoy aw wūta, nuy tūamiltiniqat ōviy’o.
Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Tūwaqatsit aṅ ahsupoq haqam i’ lomatuawi yuaatiwhq, pep i’ wuhti yep hinhtiqw pam piw yuaatiwni. Sinom it akw put u’ni’yuṅwni.
Pahsat pu pakwt löq sihk̇ay’taqam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amuṅaqw suhka, Judas Iscariot yan mātsiwhqa, God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy amumii,
Nihqe amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma nuy hihta maqayani, nu put umumi mātapq’ö? Noqw puma sunat pakwt sihk̇ay’taqat qötsásivat put maqayaniqey aw pasiwnaya.
Noqw pahpiy pu’ pam put amumi mātapniqey qenihevi’ta.
Noqw qapek̇en’oyvut pölavikit nōviwniqat sūs talöṅni’taqw, Jesus aw nánatuwnayaqam put aw ö́kihqe aw paṅqaqwa: Ya itam haqam aw hintsatsnaqw, um pep ura Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwniqat nösniqey nāwakna?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Uma kīminen it hakiy tāqat aw paṅqawni: Tūtutuqaynaqa yan lavayhti: Ituwaniy aw pitu. Noqw nu as uhkiy ep amutsva‐yūmosanihqat ep nōviwniqat inumi nánatuwnayaqamuy amumum nösni.
Noqw lȫyöm put aw nánatuwnaqam awnihqe, Jesus amumi hin tutaptaqat anhti; nihqe puma ura Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep hintsatskiwhqat pās aw hintsana.
Noqw tapkiqw, pam pakwt löq sihk̇ay’taqamuy put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumum tunösvoñat aw qatuptu.
Noqw pumuy nōnovaqw, pam paṅqawu: Nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Uma haqawa nuy momṅwituy amumi mātapni.
Pahsat puma pas qahahlayhtotiqe, nanāp put aw paṅqaqwa: Tutuyqawhqa, ya nu’ni?
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Inumum tsaqaptat aqw may morstoynaqa hapi nuy momṅwituy amumi mātapni.
Pi tutuveni Sinot Tiyat hin lalvayhqat nu pan yep qatsit aṅqw ahpiyni. Noqw pay i’ hak momṅwituy amumi nuy mātapniqat eṅem pas is óhini. Pay pi as tatam pam qa tihtiwhq put eṅem lolmani.
Noqw i’ Judas put momṅwituy amumi mātapniqa lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Tūtutuqaynaqa, ya nu’ni? Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Um súaṅqawu.
Noqw pumuy nōnovaqw, Jesus pölavikit kwusut, put ep hahlayhtit, yoṅoytat, aw nánatuwnayaqamuy put huytat paṅqawu: Huvam īt ömahtote’ nȫnösaa; i’ hapi itoko.
Pu pam kuyapkuyit kwusut, ep hahlayhtit, pumuy amumi put tavi, nihqe amumi paṅqawu: Uma sohsoyam it aṅqw hikwyani.
I’ hapi iuṅwa; pam k̇aysiwhqamuy amuṅem puhuvasiwnit pasiwnaniqe munvaniwa, pu pumuy qaanhtipuyamuy ayo yúkuniqee.
Nīk̇aṅw nu umumi paṅqawni: Pas nu soon yep qatsit ep ovauyit aniwniyat aṅqw hikwni. Nīk̇aṅw qatsit nātoniqat aw pituqw, Inay moṅwtunatyayat ep nu umumum puhuovavalat aṅqw hikwni.
Noqw puma tayawinpit tawlalwat, paṅqw nöṅa, Olivet tsomot aqwyaniqee.
Pahsat pu Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pu’ tōkilat ep uma sohsoyam inutsviy unaṅwso’ni; pi ura Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat yan put eṅem pēna. Nu kanelmuy tumalay’taqat nīnani; noqw kanēlom ahtsavalni, yan’i.
Nīk̇aṅw ason nu ahoy tātaye’, aṅwu pay umuhsavo Galileet aqwni.
Noqw Peter lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Pay nāmahin sohsoyam utsviy unaṅwso’q, pas nu’ soon panhtini.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Nu ūmi pas antsa paṅqawni: Pay pu’ tōkilat ep nāt taqakowāko qa töqtiqw, um nuy qa tuwi’taqey pāyis paṅqawni.
Noqw Peter put aw paṅqawu: Nāmahin pi nu umum mokni nu uṅ qa tuwi’taqey pas soon paṅqawni. Noqw sohsoyam Jesus aw nánatuwnayaqam put an lavayhtoti.
Noqw pam pumuy tsamk̇aṅw, haqami Gethsemane yan mātsiwhqat aw pitu, nihqe pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma hāk inuhsavo yep yesq, nu ayohaqaminen Inay aw nāwaknani.
Pu pam Peter‐nit, pu Zebedeet tiyotimuyatuy tsamk̇aṅw, ahpiynihqe, pahsat pu pas qa hahlay’iwmak̇aṅw, pavan putuiwma;
Nihqe pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pas iunaṅwa qahahlayi, pas mómokqat pan’i. Uma hāk yepye’, inumum tunatyawyuṅwni.
Pu pam ahpiy híhin yūmonit, pep tayway aqw tutskwani yēvat, nāwaknaqe paṅqawu: Taay, Inaa, kurs pay hin pasiwtaniqw, pay i’ k̇ānavotpi inuhpiy ayoni. Nīk̇aṅw pay qa nuy hin nāwaknaqw pantani; pay uhtunatya antani.
Pu pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amuminihqe, pumuy tokqamuy tuwa; nihqe Peter aw paṅqawu: Is ohi! Ya pas uma soon tāwat aṅqe’ sūs qöniltiqat pahsavo inumum tunatyawyuṅwni?
Uma tunatyawk̇ahk̇aṅw nānawaknani, nen qa unaheviwyani. Pay as hakiy tunatyaat pas antsa su’qawtaṅwu; noqw pay tokoat nánahtsovi.
Pu pam paṅqw ahpiynihqe, nāwaknaqe paṅqawu: Kurs i’ k̇ānavotpi pas soon inuhpiy ayoniniqw, nuy put aṅ kuyvaniqat um pan nāwaknaqw, pay nam uhtunatya antani.
Pu pam amumi pituqw, pay piw tōk̇a, pumuy pōsiam putuiwyuṅqw ōviy’o.
Noqw pam pumuy mātapt, piw ahpiynihqe, pāyisni’mak̇aṅw nāwaknaqe, pay piw án lavayhti.
Pahsat pu pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amuminihqe, amumi paṅqawu: Pay pi uma tōk̇e’, nānasuṅwnani. Pay aw pitu; noqw nu’ Sinot Tiat qaanhinwisqamuy amumi mātaviwni.
Huvam hoṅvaa; itam áṅwuyani; meh, nuy momṅwituy amumi mātapniqa pitu.
Noqw nāt pam yuaataqw Judas, imuy pakwt löq sihk̇ay’taqamuy amuṅaqw suhk̇a pitu; noqw sinom qaan’ewakw hintaqam sipwuvahpi’k̇ahk̇aṅw, pu murikhoy’k̇ahk̇aṅw put amum öki, God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw pu sinmuy amuṅaqw wukw’a’yam pumuy ayatotaq’ö.
Noqw i’ hak pumuy amumi put mātapqa pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu hapi hakiy tsohtsonaqw, pam hápini. Uma put hūrs ṅuayani, kita.
Nit pahsat pay pam Jesus awnihqe aw paṅqawu: Tūtutuqaynaqa, kitat put tsohtsona.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Ikwatsi, ya um hinoqw aṅqö’? Pahsat pu puma Jesus awyaqe, put hūrs ṅuaya.
Noqw meh, imuy Jesus ámumyaqamuy amuṅaqw haqawa sipwuvahpi’k̇aṅw, put aw yohtokqe, put hóroknat, God awwat sus mohpeq moṅwit tūwikiyat aw sáviknaqe, naqvuyat ayo tuku.
Noqw pahsat pu Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Uhsipwuvahpiy tukpuyat aqw pánaa; taq hakim sipwuvahpit akw hintsatsk̇aqam sipwuvahpit akw súlawhtotini.
Nuy pan Inay aw tūviṅtaqw, pam āpiy pay pakwt löq sihk̇ay’tasikip sōmorit amuhpenihqe hóyokiwtaqamuy hoṅviaymuy inumi óyani. Ya um it pēvewna?
Nīk̇aṅw kurs nu panhtiniqw, tutuveni hin aw antsaniwni?
Noqw pahsat pu Jesus sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hakiy uyiṅwut awyaqe ōviy pas piw sipwuvahpi’k̇ahk̇aṅw, pu murikhoy’k̇ahk̇aṅw nuy ṅuawisa? Ura nu nāqavo God kīyat ep tūtutuqaynaqw, uma nuy qa ṅuaya?
Noqw Tutuyqawhqat lavay’aymuyatuy pēniam soon qa antaniqw, ōviy sohsoy īi yaniwhti. Pahsat pu put aw nánatuwnayaqam sohsoyam put tatamhtotat watqa.
Noqw Jesus ṅuayaqam God awwat susmohpeq moṅwit, Caiaphas yan mātsiwhqat, aw put wikya. Noqw tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam‐niqw pu wukw’a’yam piw pep tsovawta.
Noqw Peter yāvaqw Jesus aṅk hinma, God awwat susmohpeq moṅwit kīyat aw pahsavoo; nihqe hoṅvia’yatuy amumum ihpovewat qatuptu, hin hintaniqat yórikniqee.
Noqw ima God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu wukw’a’yat‐niqw, pu sohsoyam pep tsovawtaqam Jesus nīnayaniqey anyuṅwa; nihqe ōviy as put hihta atsátoynayaniqey hevi’yuṅwa,
Nihqe qa hihta tutwa. Pi as k̇aysiwhqam put hihta atsátoynayaniqe ökik̇aṅw, qa sun lavayhtoti. Noqw nawis’ew hakim lȫyöm put hin atsátoynaniqe pitu;
Nihqe paṅqawu: I’ hapi paṅqawu: Nu God kīyat sahpuknat, pāyis tālat aṅ ahoy put aw yúkuni, kita.
Pu God awwat susmohpeq moṅwi wunuptuqe, put aw paṅqawu: Ya pay um qa hin it ep lavayhtini? Ya ima hihta uhpewi yuaata?
Noqw pay Jesus qa hiṅqawu. Noqw God awwat susmohpeq moṅwi lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Nu hapi ūmi pas paṅqawni: Um pas God Qátuhqat atpip itamumi súaṅqawni: Ya uma pas antsa Christ God Tíata, i’ moṅw’asi’taqa?
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Pay um súaṅqawu. Noqw nu ūmi paṅqawni: Yahpiy pu’ nu Sinot Tiat Sus’öqaltutuyqawhqat putvaqewat qatuptuni, pu tokpelat aṅ ōomawhtuy akw nu hawhtoqw uma inumi yórikyani.
Pahsat pu God awwat susmohpeq moṅwi itsivutiqe, yuwsiy tsīk̇at paṅqawu: Pam Hakiy pas k̇aptsitiwhqat aqw qalomáhiṅqawuy! Ya hinoqw pas piw nāt hak hin yuaatani? Meh, uma qalomálvayhtiqw aw tūqayyuṅwa.
Uma hin wūwaya? Noqw puma lavayhtotiqe paṅqaqwa: Pam mokiwuy hihk̇ay’ta.
Pahsat pu puma put taywami töhtota, pu may pölölni’k̇ahk̇aṅw wuvalalwa; noqw pētu mapqölöy akw put wuvalalwak̇aṅw,
Aw paṅqaqwa: Taay, um Christ, um itamuy āawnani, Ya hak uṅ wuvahta?
Noqw Peter moṅwkit ihpaq tukwṅöyakiwtaqat ep qatu; noqw hak māna tumal’aya put aw pítuhqe, aw paṅqawu: Um pi piw Jesus Galilee aṅqwnihqat ámuma.
Noqw pam sohsokmuy amutpik qa nakwhaqe paṅqawu: Kurs um hiṅqawlawu.
Pu pam tuhööt aw yamakq, piw suhk̇a māna put túwahqe, pep yesqamuy amumi paṅqawu: I’ pi piw Jesus Nazareth aṅqwnihqat ámuma.
Noqw piw pay pam qa nakwhaqe, pas öqalat lavayit akw paṅqawu: Pay nu pas put tāqat qa tuwi’ta.
Pu ahpiy hihsavoniqw, put aqlaq hoṅqam Peter awyaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Pay pi um pas suyan piw pumuy amumuma, ōviy pi uhlavayiy uṅ suhputsni’ta.
Pahsat pu Peter pas öqalat lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay nu pas put tāqat qa tuwi’ta, kita. Noqw pahsat pay taqakowāko töqti.
Noqw Peter Jesus lavayiyat u’na; ura pam put aw paṅqawu: Nāt taqakowāko qa töqtiqw, um pāyis nuy qa tuwi’taqey paṅqawni. Nihqe pam paṅqw yámakqe, nāp hin nāvak’öyna.
Noqw qavoṅvaqw, sohsoyam God awwat mohpeq momṅwit, sinmuy amuṅaqw wukw’aymuyatuy amumum Jesus ankiwakw yuaatota, put nīnayaniqee.
Noqw puma put somyaqe, pahpiy wikyaqe, pep tutskwat aw moṅwit, Pontius Pilate yan mātsiwhqat, aw put noaya.
Pahsat pu Judas, momṅwituy amumi put mātapqa, Jesus tūviwhq pan yórikqe pi ason qahahlayhtiqe, God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy amumi‐nik̇aṅw pu wukw’a’yamuy amuminihqe, sunat pakwt sihk̇ay’taqat qötsásivat ahoy kívaqe,
Amumi paṅqawu: Pas kurs nu hakiy qa hihta ep hinhtiqat umumi mātapqe qaanhti. Noqw puma paṅqaqwa: Noqw hinhtini? Pam pi pay uhpee.
Noqw pam God kīyat ep qötsásivat tsálaknat, ahpiynihqe, haqam nāhaya.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit qötsásivat aṅ pohpoñaqe paṅqaqwa: Itam sivatataṅpimiq put taṅatote’, qa súanhtotini, taq ura itam hakiy qatsíyat put akw tuiya.
Nihqe puma put yuaaykuyaqe, haqe’ tutskwat Tsaqavotlawhqat Tutskwaat yan túṅwantiwhqat sīvat akw tuiya, pep hakimuy qa pep sinmuy ōoyyaniqe ōviy’o.
Noqw ōviy pam tutskwa Uṅwat akw Tuiwhpu nāto yan túṅwantiwa.
Noqw yan hapi Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayayat Jeremyt lavayiyat aw anhti; ura pam paṅqawu: Pu puma sīvat ömahtota, it pakwt sunat sihk̇ay’taqat qötsásivat hakiy qatsíyat ep sisviyaqeyu. Pan hapi ima Israel‐sinom put qatsíyat hihkatoynaya.
Nihqe put akw hakiy tsaqavotlawhqat tutskwayat tuiya, Tutuyqawhqa inumi hin tutaptaqat pan’i. Yan ura pey’ta.
Noqw Jesus pep tutskwat aw moṅwit atpip wunuwta. Noqw moṅwi put tūviṅtaqe aw paṅqawu: Ya um Jew‐sinmuy moṅwiamu? Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Um súaṅqawu.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw pu wukw’a’yam put hin nēveltoynayaqw, pam qa hiṅqawu.
Pahsat pu Pilate put aw paṅqawu: Ya ima hihsa’ hihta uṅ tsotsk̇anayaqw, um qa navota?
Noqw pay pas pam qa hiṅqawu. Noqw ōviy moṅwi put ep pas hin kurs wūwa.
Noqw put nōviwhqat aw pituqw moṅwi sinmuy amumi hakiy sivilawhqat mātapṅwu, hakiy nānawaknaqw put’a.
Noqw piw ép puma hakiy pas qahopímataknihqat sivivani’yuṅwa, hakiy Barabbas yan mātsiwhqata.
Noqw ōviy puma sumitsovaltiqw, Pilate pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya nu hakiy umumi mātapniqat uma nānawakna‐sen Barabbas, sen it Jesus, Christ yan túṅwantiwhqata?
Suyan pi puma qatsutsúyhqe ōviy put aw Jesus noayaqw, pam mātsi’taqe ōviy paṅqawu.
Noqw pam Jesus eṅem hin yúkuniqey wūwank̇aṅw, moṅw’atsveway ep qatuqw, put nȫmaat put aw hakiy ayataqe paṅqawu: Um put tāqat súantaqat qa aw hintsakni; taq nu tōki tūmoklawhqe, put atsviy hīhihta k̇ānavota.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit wukw’a’yamuy amumum sinmuy pan unaṅwtoynayaqw, puma Barabbas tuhtui’ya, pu Jesus nīnayaniqat paṅqaqwa.
Noqw moṅwi lavayhtiqe, pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Noqw nu hihtawat imuy lȫqmuy amuṅaqw umumi mātapniqat uma nānawakna? Noqw puma paṅqaqwa: Barabbas awúy!
Noqw Pilate amumi paṅqawu: Noqw nu panhte’, Jesus Christ yan túṅwantiwhqat hintsanni? Noqw puma sohsoyam sáakmaqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Nahoylehtsit aw múaa!
Noqw moṅwi paṅqawu: Ya hínoq’ö? Ya hihta qalomáhinhtiqw ōviy’o? Pahsat pu puma pas sáakmaqe paṅqaqwa: Nahoylehtsit aw múaa!
Noqw pay Pilate pumuy kurs hintsanniqw, nuṅwu pay sinom pas qa unaṅwtalawvayaqw, pahsat pu pam kuyht, sinmuy amutpik mävaqtat, paṅqawu: Nu hapi it tāqat qa hintaqat qatsíyat ep qa tukopniwtani. Uma pi put hin yukuyani.
Noqw pahsat pu sinom sohsoyam lavayhtotiqe paṅqaqwa: Pay pi ason itam put qatsíyat ep tukopniwyani, pu itahtimu.
Noqw ōviy pam pumuy amumi Barabbas mātavi. Nīk̇aṅw pam solāwat aw Jesus mātapq, pam put qa sūs wuvahta. Noqw pahsat pu Pilate put nahoylehtsit aw muiltiniqat ōviy pumuy amumi put mātavi.
Pahsat pu moṅwit solāwamat pavasiwhkimi Jesus wikyaqe, sohsokmuy suṅwámuy put aw tsovalaya.
Nihqe puma put yuwsiyat nawhkiyat, palausimnit put usihtoynaya.
Pu puma hihta kūtay’taqat ṅölatotaqe, put qötösomtoynaya; nit pu putvaqw hopaqat matsvoṅtoynayat, put aw tamötshoṅvank̇aṅw, tututsiwyaqe, put aw paṅqaqwa: Öqawmaṅwu Jew‐sinmuy moṅwíamu!
Pu puma put aw töhtota, pu hopaqat kwusuyaqe, put akw put qötöyat wuvalalwa.
Yan puma put aw tututsiwyat, put usimnit nawhkiyat, nāp yuwsiyat put yuwsinayat, put nahoylehtsit aw muayaniqe ōviy ahpiy wikya.
Noqw puma kīṅaqw nöṅakwisk̇ahk̇aṅw, hakiy Cyrene aṅqw tāqat Simon yan mātsiwhqat tutwa; noqw pam Jesus nahoylehtsiyat īkwiwtaniqat puma put tusoq’ayatota.
Pu puma haqami Golgotha yan túṅwantiwhqat aw öki. Pam Masqötvihk̇a i’nihqe pam’i.
Noqw puma pep ökiqw, solāwam wine hihta a’nö tsīvot enaṅ namiqwriwtaqat put hikwnayaniqw, pam put aṅqw yúkuhqe, hikwniqey qa nakwha.
Pep puma put nahoylehtsit aw muaya; pu puma yuwsiyat ōviy nanavö’ya. Yan Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayaat hin lavayhtiqat aw antsaniwa; ura pam paṅqawu: Puma iyuwsiy nāhuyva, pu iusimniy ōviy nanavö’ya.
Pahsat puma pep yesvaqe put tūtuwala.
Nihqe put hin nēveltoyniwhqat pey’taqat put qötöyat atsve tsok̇aya. Noqw yan hapi pey’ta: I’ HAPI JESUS, JEW‐SINMUY MOṄWIAMU.
Noqw puma piw lȫqmuy uyiṅwutuy put ahsaq nīnaya, nānap nahoylehtsit aw muayaqee. Suhk̇a putvaqeniqw, pu suhk̇a suyvaqee.
Noqw aṅ sasqayaqam put aw tututsiwya, qötöy wīlank̇ahk̇aṅwo;
Nihqe paṅqaqwa: Taay, um God kīyat sahpuknat, pāyis tālat aṅ ahoy aw kītaniqa, ayo nātavii! Pas pi um antsa God Tíatnen nahoylehtsit aṅqw hawni.
Noqw amún God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam‐niqw, pu wukw’a’yam put aw tututsiwyaqe paṅqaqwa:
Pas as pam pētuy ayo oyat, kurs hin ayo nātapni. Pas pi antsa pam Israel‐sinmuy moṅwíamnen, nahoylehtsit aṅqw hawhq, itam aw tūtuptsiwani.
Kurs pi pam God aw yanta; pay pi God putnik, put ayo távini; himu pi paṅqawu: Nu God Tíata.
Noqw ima uyiṅwut put amum nahoylehtsit aw muiltiqam pay piw amún put aw hiṅqawlawu.
Noqw tāwanasaptiqw, aṅ ahsupoq qatālawva, tāwat atvelpetiqw aw pahsavoo.
Pu tāwat atvelpetiqw, Jesus pas tönay aṅqe’ a’nö paṅqawu: Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani! Pam God, Itutuyqawhqa, ya um hinoqw nuy tatamhta? i’nihqe pam’i.
Noqw haqawat pep hoṅqam put nanaptaqe paṅqaqwa: Taq pam Elias wáṅwaylawu.
Noqw pahsat pay pumuy amuṅaqw haqawa wárikqe, hihta söyatkoy’taqat (sponge) vinegar akw tsehkweknat, hopaqat epeq söṅnat, put hikwniniqw maqa.
Noqw pay haqawat paṅqaqwa: Pay pantani; mātaqpi kurs Elias put ayo távinik pítuni.
Pu Jesus piw a’nö hiṅqawht, sohsok hikwsu.
Noqw meh, God kīyat ep mötsáp’uhtsi ōṅaqw atk̇amiq tsīki, noqw tutskwa tayayayku, pu o’wa kwanamhti.
Pu tūtuami hötsiltotiqw, k̇aysiwhqam God sinomat so’qam ahoy yesvaqe, tūamit aṅqw nöṅa.
Nihqe Jesus ahoy tātayhq, put atsve puma pas āantsawat kitsókit aw yuṅqw, sinom k̇aysiwhqam amumi yórikya.
Noqw solāwamoṅwi‐niqw pu ima put amum Jesus tūtuwalaqam tutskwat tayayaykuqw, pu hin hiniwhtiqat aw yórikyaqe, pavan pas tsātsawnaqe, paṅqaqwa: Pas antsa kurs as i’ God Tíata.
Noqw k̇aysiwhqam momoyam pep yāvaqw aw tāyuṅwa. Puma Galileet aṅqw Jesus aṅk hinnumyaqe, eṅem hihta hintsatsk̇a.
