Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe put aw paṅqawu: Martha, Martha, pas um hīhihta pis’oqhintaqe qa suyan unaṅway’ta.
Pay hak sūkw hihta aw tunatyaltimantani. Noqw Mary put nukṅwat namorsta. Soon pam put nawhkiwni.
Noqw hisat pam haqam nāwaknaqe yukuqw, suhk̇a put aw nánatuwnaqa aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, um as itamuy hin nāwakintotaniqat itamuy tutuwnani, ura John put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy hin tutuwnaqat pan’i.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma nānawakne’, kitotamantani: Itanaa, ōveqatsit ep qátuhqa, nam uhnatṅwani pas k̇aptsi’tiwaa. Nam uhmoṅwtunatyay aw pítuu. Nam uhtunatya tūwaqatsit ep pasiwhtii, ōveqatsit ep hin pasiwhtiqey pan’i.
Um okiw nāqavo itamuy itahtunösmakiway huylawni.
Pu um okiw itahqaanhtipuy itamuhpiy ayo yúkuni; pay itam sohsokmuy itamuhpewi qaanhtotiqamuy amuhpiy put ayo yuykutiwisa. Pu um okiw itamuy unaheppit qa aṅ tsāmi’mat, hakiy qalolmat aṅqw itamuy ayo ōoyhtimani, pay yan’i.
Pu pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: As kurs haqawa umuṅaqw kwātsi’te’ suhtokihaq put awnen, aw paṅqawni: Ikwatsi, um as payhkomuy pölavikit nuy nasimokmaqani.
Taq ikwátsi waynumqe inuhpe pituqw, kurs nu hihta put nopnani, kítani.
Noqw pam ahpaṅaqw lavayhte’ paṅqawni: Um nuy qa soontsahtsanni. Pay ikiy uhtsiwta; noqw itim inumum tōk̇a. Kurs nu hin uṅ máqaniqe ōviy qaqtuptuni, kítani.
Nu umumi paṅqawni: Pay soq pi pam put kwātsiatniqw, pam put qa máqani. Nīkaṅw pam put aw qatūqayhq, nawus pam qatupte’, put hihsa’haqam hintsanniqat pahsa’ put máqani.
Noqw nu umumi paṅqwni: Uma hihta ōviy tūviṅtotani; nen uma put makiwyani. Uma hihta hepyani; nen tutwani. Uma pöṅö́ṅöykinayani; noqw umumi hötsíltini.
Pi hak hihta tūviṅtaqa hihta makiwṅwu; pu hepqa túwaṅwu; pu pöṅö́ṅöykinaqat aw hötsíltimantani.
Sen uma haqawa hakiy náatniqw, uhti ūmi pölavikit tūviṅtaqw, ya sen um put owat máqani? Sen pākiwuy ōviy tūviṅtaqw, ya sen um tsūat put máqani?
Hal sen pi pam nöhut ōviy tūviṅtaqw, sen um putskohmoktaqat put āawnani?
Noqw kurs pay as uma qalomáhink̇ahk̇aṅw umuhtimuy hihta nukṅwat huytotaniqey tuwi’yuṅwa. Noqw tis pas Umuna ōveqatsit ep qátuhqa put aw Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit ōviy tūviṅtotaqamuy soon qa máqani.
Noqw Jesus nukpanhikwsit hakiy lavayiyat nawhkiṅwuqat put aṅqw hórokna. Noqw nukpanhikwsi put aṅqw yamakq, qayuáataṅwuqa yuaayku; noqw sinom k̇ātayyuṅwa.
Noqw pay pumuy amuṅaqw haqawat paṅqaqwa: Pam nukpanhihikwsimuy moṅwíyamuy Beelzebub aw yank̇aṅw nukpanhihikwsimuy ipwanta.
Noqw pētu put aw tuwantotaqw, pam k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’taqat ōṅaqw pumuy amumi mahtaknaniqat put aw nānawkna.
Noqw pay pam pumuy tunatyayamuy mātsi’taqe amumi paṅqawu: Haqam moṅwtunatya nehpewhtiqa soon qa kīqötini; pu kīvit nehpewhtotiqam nātsik̇e’, soon haqami ö́kini.
Noqw ōviy kurs Satan nehpewhtiqw, ya hin put moṅwtunatyaat wúnuni?
Noqw kurs nu Beelzebub aw yank̇aṅw nukpanhihikwsimuy ipwantaqw, ya umumi nánatuwnayaqam hakiy aw yank̇ahk̇aṅw pumuy ipwantota? Ason puma umuy atsáṅhkiye’, umuy suhputsnayani.
Nīk̇aṅw kurs pay nu God öqalayat akw nukpanhihikwsimuy ipwantaqw, suyan hapi God moṅwtunatyaat umumi pitsíwiwta.
Pi tāqa hoṅvi tunipi’k̇aṅw kiy tūwale’, hihta himuy pās oyi’taṅwu.
Nīk̇aṅw ason put epnihqe pavan hoṅvi pite’, put aṅwute’, pam sohsok naqöyyuwsiyat aw taqa’naṅwayat nawhk̇e’, hihta himuyat kwatsmuy huytaṅwu.
Qa inumumnihqa hapi inuhpewiwta; pu qa inumum tsovalantaqa tatslakinta.
Tuyoy’eway hikwsi sinot aṅqw yámak̇e’, haqe’ qa pay’taqat aṅ hinnumṅwu, haqam nāsuṅwnaniqe ōviy’o; nit qa tuwe’ paṅqawṅwu: Han pi pay nu ikiy aṅqw yámakqey aw áhoy’i, kítaṅwu.
Pu pam ep pite’, pās maspiwk̇aṅw lomahintaqat túwaṅwu.
Pahsat pu pam ahpiynen tsáṅe’nihqamuy hīhikwsimuy nahpenihqe pas núnukpantuy aw tsamṅwu. Noqw puma aw yuñe’, ep ki’yuṅṅwu. Noqw hakiy qatsíat aṅknihqa mohtiwat epnihqe pu’ pas qalomáhintaṅwu.
Noqw pam yan yuaataqw, hak wuhti sinmuy amuṅaqw k̇ēew hiṅqawhqe aw paṅqawu: Ṅaspi hak uṅ tihta. Piw pīhuy akw uṅ yōyoṅna.
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: As um yan lavayhtinikaṅwo: Ṅaspi hakim God lavayiyat aw tūqayk̇ahk̇aṅw aṅ hinwisa, puma hapi hahlayhpit epyani, um kítanik̇aṅwo.
Noqw pan sinom sūmi hūrs tsovawmaqw, Jesus yuaativaqe amumi paṅqawu: Ima pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqam nukpansinomu. Puma k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’taqat aw yórikyaniqey nānawakna, Nīk̇aṅw puma soon k̇ātatayhpit aw yórikyani, hal pas sūkw k̇ātatayhpit‐saa. Pam Tutuyqawhqat lavay’ayayat Jonas qatsíyat ep hiniwhtiqat an aw yukiltini.
Pi ura Nineve‐kitsókit ep sinom Jonas qatsíyat ep hiniwhtiqat akw hihta tuwi’vaya. Noqw pay ōviy hapi piw pan nu’ Sinot Tiat pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqamuy amumi hihta tuawi’tani, iqatsiy ep hiniwhtiqat akw’a.
Hisat hin yukiltiniqat aw pituqw, tatk̇aqw moṅwi‐wuhti pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqamuy amumum wunupte’, pumuy qatuptsiwniyamuy ep suhputsnani. Ispi pam Solomon wuwniyat aw tūqaytaniqe ōviy pas tūwaqalṅahaqaqw pítu. Noqw meh, hak Solomon epnihqe pas pávannihqa yep’e.
Ason hin yukiltiniqat aw pituqw, Ninevet ep sinom pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqamuy amumum hoṅve’, pumuy qatuptsiwniyamuy ep suhputsnayani; ispi puma Jonas lavayiyat nanaptaqe nāp tunatyay aṅqw lasyaqee. Noqw meh, hak Jonas epnihqe pas pávannihqe yep’e.
Qa haq pi hak wihqöhit úwiknat, haqam qamātaqpuve put tavi, sen hihta sīvut akw put kuhta. Pi pam put tsotsókpiyat ep tsok̇aqw, ep yuṅtaqam tālat tāyuṅṅwu.
Hakiy pōsiat tokoyat aw talni’taṅwu. Noqw ōviy kurs hakiy pōsiat pasiwtaqw, pay tokoyat aṅ ahsupoq talṅwu; pu kurs hakiy pōsiat qa pasiwtaqw, pay tokoyat aṅ ahsupoq qatalṅwu.
Oviy um tunatyaltiqw, uhpe tāla qa qömawvani.
Paniqw ōviy kurs uhtokoy aṅ ahsupoq talq, qahaqam qatālaniqw, pam sohsoy ahsupoqhaqami talni, wihqöhi suyan tālat talni’te’, ūmi talni’taṅwuqat pan’i.
Noqw pam yuaataqw, hak Pharisee‐sinom put tūtsama. Noqw pam kīyat ep pákihqe, qatuptu.
Noqw pam mohti qa māvaqtat tūmoytaqw, Pharisee‐sino put aw tātayhqe, aw hin wūwa.
Noqw Tutuyqawhqa put aw paṅqawu: Uma Pharisee‐sinom kukyapit, pu tsatsqaptat anyuṅwa. Uma suovaam kwaṅw’ewayhtotit tukwhanayaniqey‐sa tunatyawyuṅwa, pu qalomáhintsatsk̇aniqeyu.
Uma núanhihtuu, puyaw ōvaqenihqat yúkuhqa ahsonṅaqwnihqat qa enaṅ yukuqw ōviy’o?
Tis pi uma hihta himuy’yuṅwe’, put akw tūookwatuwyanik̇ahk̇aṅwo; noqw pep pu’ amuhpa’ ahsupoq kwaṅw’ewayni.
Nīk̇aṅw is ohi uma Pharisee‐sínomu! uma pi umuh’uyiy aṅqw nēnevenit pakwút‐sikivo sun oyit God aw noayaṅwu; nik̇aṅw uma soq sinmuy amuṅem suan hin yukuyaniqey qe’toti; uma God qa aw unaṅway’yuṅwa. Uma as pávanyaqat tutavot aṅ ahsupoq hinwisni; pu it qa pas qatuvosnihqat aṅ pīwu.
Is ohi uma Pharisee‐sínomu! Uma pi tsotsvalkiva mohk̇aqe tsotsókpit pas hahlayya, pu sinom kitpik umuy k̇aptsi’k̇ahk̇aṅw umumi yuaatotaniqata.
Is ohi uma tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam, pu Pharisee‐sínomu! nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu! Uma pi tūtuamit qa mātaqyaqat anyuṅwa; noqw sinom put atsva yaktaqam pumuy paṅyaqw qa tuway’numya.
Pahsat pu haqawa tutavot aw tuvoti’taqa lavayhtiqe, put aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, um paṅqawhqe itamumiq enaṅ hiṅqawu.
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pay panta. Is ohi uma tutavot aw tuvoti’yuṅqamu! uma pi soñawnen hihta a’nö putut mok̇ahtotat, hakiy īkwiltoynayaṅwu; nīk̇aṅw uma soq soon ṅas’ew pumuy paaṅwayaṅwu.
Is ohi úmaa! Uma pi God lavay’aymuyatuy tūamiyamuy aw pūhulalwa; noqw pi umanam pumuy qöqya.
Pas pi ōviy uma umunamuy hiniwhtipuyamuy navoti’k̇ahk̇aṅw amún unaṅway’yuṅqey mahtakni’yuṅwa, ispi puma pumuy qöqyaq’ö; noqw uma pumuy tūamiyamuy aw pūhulalwa.
Paniqw hapi ōviy God suan wuwni’k̇aṅw yan lavayhti: Nu pumuy amumi ilavay’aymuy hōnani, pu ituaw’a’yatuyu. Noqw puma pētuy yūyuyhnaye’ qöqyani.
Noqw God pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqamuy hapi tukopnani, sohsokmuy put lavay’aymuyatuy tūwaqatsit yayhniwhqat aṅqaqw qöyaniwyaqat ahpiy’o,
It Abel qatsiyat ep’e, pu aṅk yesqamuy qatsíyamuy ep pīwu, nit pu Zacharias qatsíyat ep’e. Ura pam God kīyat‐nik̇aṅw pu hom’oyvihk̇at amuhtsave nīniwa. Nu umumi súaṅqawni: God umuy put sohsok ep tukopnani.
Is ohi uma tutavot aw tuvoti’yuṅqamu! Uma pi navotit aw hötahpit yawwisa. Uma aw qa yuṅk̇ahk̇aṅw, aw yuṅtaqamuy aw u’taya.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi yan lavayhtiqw, tutavot tutuqaynayaqam Pharisee‐sinmuy amumum put aw pās ö’qaltivayaqe, pam hīhihta lavayhtiniqat ōviy aw qa tūtuqayya.
Hísatniqw unahiṅqawhq nanapte’, put nēveltoynayaniqe ōviy moqmani’yuṅwa.
Noqw aṅwu sinom pas qaan’ewakw hintaqam sūmi tsovaltiqe nuṅwu pay nānami wukukutotaqw, Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi mohti paṅqawu: Uma Pharisee‐sinmuy pēk̇eniyamuy nawip’ew hintsakpit ep qa ūnaiwyuṅwni.
Pi qa himu āmiwtaqa qa mātaqtini, piw tupkiwtaqa qa nanaptiwni.
Pantaqw ōviy hihta qamātakpuve haqawa lavayhtiqw, pam tālat ep nanaptiwmantani; pu uma hihta yūyupavaqe hakiy naqvumiq sawiwiykuyaqw, pam kihkits’ova tsa’lalwiwni.
Noqw nu umumi paṅqawni ikwátsimu: Uma qa sinmuy mamqasyani. Puma pi pay hakiy tokoyat‐sa nīnayaṅwu; pu pahpiy kurs hinhtotiṅwu pīwu.
Nīk̇aṅw uma hakiy mamqasyaniqat nu umuy āawnani. Uma God hapi mamqasyani. Pi pam hakiy nīnat, hakiy qȫhit aqw tūvaniqey aw öqalay’ta. Noqw nu’ piw umumi paṅqawni: Uma put hapi mamqasyani.
Puyaw qa tsivot kwekwévewhyam lȫq palavotōnat ōviy huyiwyaṅwu? Noqw qa himuwa God ahpiy suhtokiwṅwu.
Hikis pi pas umuhqötöva umuhhömi sohsoy pohtoylaniwta. Oviy uma qa nalmamqasyani; God kwekwévewhyamuy k̇aysiwhqamuy amuhpenihqe umuy pas k̇ahk̇awna.
Pu nu piw umumi paṅqawni: Hak isinonihqey nuhtumi paṅqawhq, nu’ Sinot Tiat tuwat put isinonihqat God hoṅviaymuyatuy amumi paṅqawni.
Nīk̇aṅw hak qa isinonihqey nuhtumi paṅqawhq, nu tuwat put qa isinonihqat God hoṅviamuyatuy amumi paṅqawni.
Ason kurs hak nuy Sinot Tiyat ehpewi lavayhtiqw, pam pantaqa put ahpiy ayo yukiwmantani. Nīk̇aṅw ason kurs hak Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit ehpewi qak̇aptsilavayhtiqw, pam pantaqa soon put ahpiy ayo yukiwmantani.
Pu ason sinom umuy tsotsvalkiva, sen momṅwituy, sen öqalat pasiwyuṅqamuy amumi tsamvayaqw, uma hin yuaatotaniqey, sen hihta lavayhtotiniqey qa wūwantotamantani.
Pay ason aw pituqw, Qahováriwtaqa Hikwsi umuy hin lavayhtotiniqat umuy tutuwnamantani.
Noqw haqawa sinmuy amuṅaqw put aw paṅqawu: Tutuqaynaqa, um as ivavay aw paṅqawhq, pam hihta itahmakiway aṅqw nuy máqani.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Tāqa, ya hak nu hihta ep hin yúkuniqat, pu sen umuy hihta namqananiqat aw nuy tavi?
Pu pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma tunatyaltote’, hihta qa umuhhimuy tuṅlay’yuṅwniqey qe’yani. Pay sino hihta nihti’taniqe qa paniqw ōviy qatu.
Pu pam hihta tūwutsit akw pumuy amumi yuaaykuqe paṅqawu. Hakiy k̇ahaktaqat pāsaat a’nö hihta aniwna.
Noqw pam unaṅwpeq wūwantaqe paṅqawu: Ya sen nu hinhtini? Kurs nu haqami inatwaniy koyotani.
Pu pam paṅqawu: Han pi yanhti: Nu hāhaqe’ ikoyokiy tsawimnat, pas wūkoq kītani. Pu nu paṅso sohsok inatwaniy, pu hihta ihimuy taṅatani.
Nit pu iunaṅway aw paṅqawni: Iunaṅwa, um hihta nihtiwtaqat wūhak yahsaṅwuy aqw pitsíwtaqat taṅata. Taa, um nāsuṅwni’k̇aṅw, tūmoytani, hīhikwni; nen um hahlayni.
Noqw pay God put aw paṅqawu: Um núanhimu ṅasta wuwni’taqa, it tōkilat ep nu uhhikwsi ūmi tuhtuy’ni. Noqw pahsat pu himu uhpiy na’sastiwhqa hakiy himuatni?
Noqw pan hapi i’ hak nēṅem‐sa hihta tsovalantaqa hintani. Yep qatsit ep k̇a hihta nihti’tani, nīk̇aṅw ōveqatsit ep God atpip pas ōokiwni.
Pu pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Paniqw ōviy nu umumi paṅqawni: Uma hin yesniqey qa nānaphin wūwantotani, hihta nȫnösaniqeyu, piw umuhtokoy éṅem’i, hihta yuwsiyaniqeyu.
Pi hakiy qatsíat nȫsiwhqat epnihqe pas pavan hihk̇ay’ta, pu hakiy tokoat yuwsit epnihqe pas pavan hihk̇ay’ta.
Kurs huvam aaṅwustuy amumi wūwayaa. Puma qa ūuyyaṅwu, piw qa höqyaṅwu. Puma qa koyoki’yuṅwa, piw qa tuoyhki’yuṅṅwu. Noqw God pumuy nōnopna. Nihqe tis pi pam masay’yuṅqamuy amuhpenihqe umuy pas k̇ahk̇awna!
Ya sen hak pan tunatyawtaqa hin nāwuṅwnaniqey tuwi’ta?
Noqw kurs uma hihta sus’öwihintaqat kurs panhtotinik, ya uma hinoqw pas piw ahpiy pēhut hinyaniqey tunatyawyuṅwa?
Kurs huvam sishut hin wuṅw’iwwisqat aw wūwayaa. Puma qa tumalay’yuṅwa; qa tontotaṅwu. Noqw nu umumi paṅqawni: Solomon sohsok hihta nukṅwat yuwsi’k̇aṅw qa ṅas’ew imuy amumi hayawtaqat yuwsi’ta.
Sumataqpi God tūsaqat pās yūyuwsina, nāmahin pi pam pay hihsavo tayta. Pu’ pam tutskwavanik̇aṅw, qāvo pam qöpqömiq maspiwni. Noqw ya pam tis umuy qa pavan pas yūyuwsinani, uma öwituptsiwni’yuṅqamu?
Oviy uma hihta nȫnösaniqey, pu hihta hikwyaniqey qa tunatyawyuṅwni, piw uma qa wiwsiyani.
Pi sinom yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqam sohsok īit hihta tunatyawyuṅwa. Noqw Umuna umumi navoti’ta, uma sohsok īit hihta haqni’yuṅq’ö.
Nīk̇aṅw tis pi uma God moṅwtunatyayat tunatyawyuṅwni; noqw sohsoy īi himu umumi noiwni.
Uma qa tsawiniwyuṅwni tōnawhohyamu; pi Umuna umuy moṅwtunatyat máqaniqey moṅwvasi’ta.
Uma hihta himuy’yuṅwe’ put huyayani; nen akw sinmuy ōokwatuwyani. Uma umuhk̇ahakiwuy ōveqatsit aw taṅatotani. Pan uma soñawnen umuhsivamoktukpuy qa sakwíiwṅwuqat nenṅem tutwani. Pi ōveqatsit aw uyiṅwu qa pákiṅwu, piw kwahya qa hihta hovalaṅwu.
Pi hakiy k̇ahakhimuat háqamniqw, hakiy unaṅwaat piw pepniṅwu.
Hakim tahtaqt moṅwiy haqam nāṅuiwhqat aṅqw áhoyniqat nuhtayyuṅqamuy amún uma kwewk̇ahk̇aṅw, umuhqöhiy úwikni’yuṅwni. Noqw ason pam ahoy pite’, pöṅö́ṅöykinaqw, puma nuhtayyuṅwe’, eṅem súhötaye’, pas hahlayhpit epyani. Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Soon pam qa hihta akw namuptat, amumi tunösvoñahtat, pumuy nopni’tani.
<range>
<range>
Noqw kurs pam suhtokilnasavehaqam, sen talhahayiṅqw pite’, puma put nuhtayyuṅqat tuwaqw, pas puma tumal’a’yat hahlayhpit epyani.
Pu meh yanta, pi as ki’taqa hísatniqw uyiṅwu pítuniqat navoti’te’, soon qa tūwalani, nen soon put kīyat aw pákiniqw, pam pánani.
Pantaqw ōviy uma piw pās moṅwvas’iwyuṅwni. Taq uma nāt qa pan wūwantotaqw, nu’ Sinot Tiat pítuni.
Pahsat pu Peter put aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawha, ya um it lavayit itamumi‐sa lavayhti, sen pay pas sohsokmuy amumii?
Noqw Tutuyqawhqa paṅqawu: Noqw ya sen hak hakiy tumal’ayaat suan hinmaqat suan wuwni’taqa? Put moṅwíat haqaminiqe sohsok hihta himuy aw tunatyawtaniqat aw put tavit, tumalsuṅwamuyatuy aw put moṅwtapq, pam pumuy aṅsakis tunösmakiwayamuy pumuy huytani.
Noqw kurs put moṅwiat pite’, put nāt suan hinmaqw put tuwaqw, pam tumal’aya pas hahlayhpit epni.
Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Pas soon put moṅwíat qa sohsok hihta himuy aw put moṅwtapni.
Nīk̇aṅw kurs pam tumal’aya moṅwiat qa īts pítuniqat unaṅwpeq paṅqawe’, pahsat pay tumalsuṅwamuy, tahtaqtuy, pu momoymuy wuvahtivani; pu tūmoyk̇aṅw, hīhikwtive’, honaqkuyit akw hōnaq’iwtani.
Pu pam qa hin pan wūwank̇aṅw, moṅwiy qa nuhtay’taqw, pam pite’, put tumal’ayay ayo tūvani. Noqw pam nawus qatuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy amumum k̇ānavotni.
Pi i’ tumal’aya moṅwiy tunatyayat as navoti’k̇aṅw, hintaniqey qa pantsakt, piw tunatyayat qaan hintsak̇e’, hapi nawus wūhakis wuvahtiwmantani.
Nīk̇aṅw i’ hak put tunatyayat qa navoti’k̇aṅw, qaan hinme’, pay qa wūhakis wuvahtiwmantani. Pi i’ hak wūhaq hihta makiwhq, sinom tuwat put aw wūhaq tuṅlay’yuṅwni. Pu sinom hakiy aw hihta wūhaq noaye’, put aw wūhaq tuhtuiyamantani.
Soñawnen nu tūwaqatsit aw qȫhit tūvaniqe pitu. Noqw is as pay pam uwiwitani!
Nīk̇aṅw nawus nu nāt soñawnen hihta akw tuvoylatiwni. Nīk̇aṅw nu nāt put qa aṅ kuyve’, pas pavan sóontsaniwni.
Ya uma inumi yan wūwantota: Pam k̇a sinmuy qa hin unaṅwat yesniqat ōviy pitu, pan’i? Uma qa pan wūwantotani. Pi sinom qa súnahpa’yaniqat ōviy nu pitu.
Pi yahpiy haqahpiy hapi haqam sūkw kīve tsívotnihqam nātsikiwtamantani. Pahyom lȫqmuy amuhpewiniqw, pu lȫyöm payhkomuy amuhpewii.
Hakiy naat tiy ehpewhtimantani; pu tiat nay ehpewhtimantani. Yuat tiy mānat ehpewhtimantani; pu māna yuy ehpewhtimantani. Pu mö’wi’taqa mö’wiy ehpewhtimantani, pu’ mö’wi puwsuṅway yuyat ehpewhtimantani.
Pu piw pam sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma tāvaṅqw ōmawuy kuyvaqw tutwe’, āpiy pay paṅqaqwaṅwu: Aṅqw yōyaṅ’u, kitotaṅwu; noqw antsa pantaṅwu.
Pu tatk̇aqw hūhukq uma paṅqaqwaṅwu: Kurs utuhuuni, kitotaṅwu; noqw antsa pantaṅwu.
Uma nawip’ew hinyuṅqamu, pay as uma tokpelat aṅ‐nik̇aṅw, pu tūwaqatsit aṅ hin sóniwhqat māmatsyaṅwunik̇aṅw, ya hintaqw ōviy haqe’ qalawmaqat uma qa māmatsya?
Pu ya hinoqw uma hihta umuhhintsakpiy qa aw suan wūwaya?
Um hakiy uhpew’iwtaqat amum moṅwit awnen, nāt umuy awniqw um hin put amum namivöhikniqey qanātusi’tamantani; taq k̇a pam hakiy hin yukunaṅwuqat aw uṅ lölökintaqw, pam uṅ solāwamoṅwit aw noaqw, pam uṅ sivikimi pánani.
Nu ūmi paṅqawni: Pas um soon paṅqw yámakni; pas ason um hisat uhpöiy sohsok ep sisve’, pep pu’ paṅqw yámakni.
Noqw ephaqam hakim Jesus awyaqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Yaw hakim Galileet aṅqw God eṅem kanēlot nīnayaqw, Pilate solāwamat pumuy qöqyaqw, uṅwaam kanēlot uṅwáyat enaṅ namiqwrilti.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma wūwantotaqw, ima Galileet aṅqw sinom sohsokmuy Galileet aṅqw sinmuy amuhpenihqe pas sus qaanhinwisqe, ōviy pas panhaqam hintsaniwya?
Nu umumi paṅqawni: Qae. Pi uma umuhtunatyay qa aṅqw lasye’, soon qa sohsoyam pumuy amún súlawhtini.
Ura Siloam ep wupaki sahpukqe, hakimuy pakwt nanal sihk̇ay’taqamuy sinmuy qöya. Noqw ya úmuyniqw puma Jerusalem ep ki’yuṅqamuy sohsokmuy amuhpenihqe pas sus qaanhinwisa?
Nu umumi paṅqawni: Qae. Pi uma umuhtunatyay qa aṅqw lasye’, soon qa sohsoyam pumuy amún súlawhtini.
Pu Jesus piw tūwutsit hihta tuawi’taqat lavayhtiqe nuhtumi paṅqawu: Hak tāqa ūyiy ep nönvospaltsokit ūyi’ta. Nihqe pam as aw sipalat hept, qa hihta tuwa.
Nihqe pam ūyit aw tunatyawtaqat aw paṅqawu: Meh, pu’ hapi pāyis yahsaṅwuy aṅ nu it nönvospaltsokit aw sipalhept, qa hihta tuwa. Tsahqaa. Pam paysoq tutskwat hovalni’ta.
Noqw ūyit aw tunatyawtaqa lavayhtiqe put aw paṅqawu: Moṅwi, pay hāk pam piw it yahsaṅwuy ep pantani. Noqw nu aṅhqe haṅwe’, aṅhqe kwitatoynani.
Noqw ason kurs pam himuy’vaqw, pay lolmani. Kurs qa hihta himuy’vaqw, pay pi nu tsahqani, kita.
Noqw Jesus nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep háqamwat tsotsvalkive tūtutuqayna.
Noqw meh, hak wuhti himu hikwsit hakiy ȫputaṅwuqat akw tuyqawiwtaqa pep nuhtuma. Okiw pam pakwt nanal sihk̇ay’taqat yahsaṅwuy aṅ tūtuyhqe, hūrs moto’taqe pas kurs hin kwuhpukni.
Noqw Jesus put túwahqe, put wáṅwayhqe, aw paṅqawu: Wuhti, pay um uhtuyay aṅqw mātaviwni, kita.
Noqw pam may akw put aw toṅokq, pahsat pay wuhti tsikqe, pas God hihtata.
Noqw Jesus nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep put qalaptsinaqw, ōviy tsotsvalkive moṅwi itsívutiqe, sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Sinom hapi navaysikis talöṅnit aṅ tumalay’yuṅwni. Oviy uma put aṅ pewye’, qalaptuyani; nen qa nasuṅwintalöṅvaqat epyani.
Noqw Tutuyqawhqa pahsat put aw lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Um nawip’ew hintaqa! Ya uma qa nanap nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep umuhwakasvohkoy, sen umuhmoropkoy haqam pakiwtaqat aṅqw mātapye’, put hikwnawisṅwu?
Noqw meh, Satan it wuhtit, Abraham tíyatnihqat pay pakwt nanal sihk̇ay’tasikis yahsaṅwuy aṅ it tūyat akw sōma. Noqw puyaw nu nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep put mātapqe, ōviy pas qalomáhinhti?
Noqw pam yan lavayhtiqw, put ehpew’iwyuṅqam sohsoyam hamanhtoti. Noqw sinom sohsoyam pas hinhaqam hahlayhtoti, pam sohsok hīhihta qaöwítumaltaqat ep’e.
Pu Jesus paṅqawu: Ya God moṅwtunatyaat hihta anta? Ya sen pam hihta antaqat nu paṅqawni?
Pam mustard‐ūyit pōsiyat anta. Put hak tāqa kwúsuhqe, pāsay ep ūya. Noqw pan wuṅwqe, pas wukotskiniwhti. Noqw masay’yuṅqam put nantaqayat aṅ yesva.
Pu piw pam paṅqawu: Ya nu God moṅwtunatyayat hihta antaqat paṅqawni?
Pam pēk̇enit anta. Put hak wuhti kwúsuhqe payhp tuwanit ṅumnit enaṅ namiqwrilaqw, pam sohsoy pēk̇e, kita.
Pu pam kitsókinawit hinmakaṅw, sinmuy tutuqaynatima, Jerusalem aqw hoyhtak̇aṅwo.
Pahsat pu hak put aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, ya pay pas híkiyom ayo nö́ṅakni? Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu:
Uma hihsa’ qenit hötsiwat aṅ yuṅniqey qa nātusitotani. Taq nu umumi pas paṅqawni: Pay as k̇aysiwhqam aw yuṅniqey tuwantotanik̇aṅw, pay kurs hinyani.
Hisat ki’taqa wunupte’, hötsiwmiq uhtaqw, pahsat pu as uma ihpaqw hoṅk̇ahk̇aṅw, uutspit pöṅö́ṅöytoynayani, paṅqawk̇ahk̇aṅwo: Tutuyqawhqa, Tutuyqawhqa, itamumi hö́taa, kitotani. Noqw pam lavayhte’, umumi paṅqawni: Umuy háqaqwyaqat nu qa navoti’ta.
Pahsat pu uma paṅqawtivayani: Ura itam utpip nȫnösa, pu hikwya; pu um itahkitpik itamuy tutuqayna.
Noqw pay pam paṅqawni: Pay nu umumi paṅqawu: Nu umuy háqaqwyaqat qa navoti’ta. Huvam inuṅaqw ahpiyyaa, sohsoyam nukpantuwit hintsatsk̇aqamu.
Pep pu’ uma tsaykitani, umuhtamay ṅuritotani. Noqw Abraham, pu Isaac, pu Jacob, pu sohsoyam God lavay’aymat, puma God moṅwtunatyayat ep taṅawtaqw uma amumi yórikyani. Nīk̇aṅw úmawat ihpoq maspiwyani.
Pu sinom hōpaqw ö́kini, pu tāvaṅq’ö, pu kwiniṅaq’ö, pu tatk̇aq’ö; nen God moṅwtunatyayat ep yesvani.
Noqw meh, haqawat nuhtuṅkyaqam mohti’wisni, pu mohti’wisqam nuhtuṅkyani.
Noqw ép tāwat ep hakim Pharisee‐sinom Jesus aw ö́kihqe, aw paṅqaqwa: Um yámak̇e’, yaṅqw ahpiyni. Taq Herod uṅ nīnaniqey nāwakna.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Yúpave, awye’ put īsawuy aw paṅqaqwaa: Meh, nu hapi nukpanhihikwsimuy nuhtuṅaqw ipwanta, pu tūqalaptsinta, pūu, pu piw qāvoo, pu pāyis talqat ep imakiway aṅ nu kuyvani.
Nīk̇aṅw pay nu nawus pu’ Jerusalem aqw hoyhtani, pu qāvoo, pu lȫtoki. Ispi soon God lavay’ayaat Jerusalem aṅqw nāp haqam súlawhtini.
Is ohi uma Jerusalem ep sínomu! Is ohi umuṅemi! Uma pi God lavay’aymuyatuy qö́yantota, pu umumi ayatiwyaqamuy tatatupqöyantota. Pas as nu hihsakishaqam umuy tsovalani, kowākowuhti timuy masay atpik̇aqe taṅataṅwuqat pan’i; noqw uma hapi qa nānawakna.
Meh, God umuhkiy pay tatamhta. Noqw nu umumi pas antsa paṅqawni: Pay uma yahpiy haqahpiy soon inumi yórikyani. Nīk̇aṅw hisat aw pituqw, uma paṅqaqwani: Tutuyqawhqat natṅwaniyat aṅ pitutoqa nam tayawintiwaa, kitotani. Noqw pep pu’ uma inumi piw yórikyani.
Pu hisat nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep Jesus Pharisee‐sinmuy amuṅaqw hakiy pas mohpeqnihqat kīyat ep tūmoyta. Noqw puma put aw pās tunatyawyuṅwa.
Noqw meh, hak tāqa pāmoktuyat tūtuyhqa Jesus apyeve qatu.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe tutavot aw tuvoti’yuṅqamuy‐nik̇aṅw pu Pharisee‐sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya pay hak nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep hakiy qalaptsinaniqw pam súanta?
Noqw puma qa hiṅqaqwa. Noqw Jesus put ṅuahqe, qalaptsinat, mātavi;
Nit pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Kurs uma haqawa moropkoy’tani, sen wakasvokoy’tani. Noqw kurs pok’at nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep hötsit aqw posni. Ya sen put pohkoy’taqa qa āpiy pay paṅqw pu hóroknani, nāmahin pi nasuṅwintalöṅniniq’ö.
Noqw puma kurs hiṅqaqwani.
Pu pam tūtsamiwyaqamuy amumi tātayhq, kurs puma núnukṅwat qenit namorstotaqw, pam amumi tutaptaqe, amumi paṅqawu:
Ason hak nāṅuiwhqat ep nōviwhqat ep uṅ tūtsamq, um qa pas susnukṅwat qenit ep qátuptuni, taq nāp hisat pi sen uṅ tūtsamqa uhpenihqe hakiy pas pavan sinot tūtsamht,
Uminen ūmi paṅqawni: It qenitoynaa, kítani. Noqw pahsat pu um hamanhtini, susqalaveq qatuptuniqee.
Um qa panhtiqw, ason hak uṅ tūtsamq, um susqalaveq qatuptumantani. Noqw uṅ tūtsamqa pite’, ūmi paṅqawni: Ikwatsi, um pavan ayo nukṅwat aw hóyokni, kítani. Noqw pep pu’ umum nōnovaqam uṅ k̇aptsi’yuṅwni.
Taq haqawa pavan nāhihtataqa hapi qahimuniwhtini; pu nāqahihtataqa hapi a’nö hímuniwhtini.
Pu Jesus piw put tūtsamqat aw paṅqawu: Um wukonovate’, qa uhkwatsmuy tūtsammantani, piw uhsinomuyu, piw uqlaq k̇ahaksinmuyu; taq k̇a puma soon qa uṅ tūtsamyaqw, pay pam ūmi ahoytiwni.
Ason um tūnopnanik, aṅ ōokiwyaqamuy tūtsammantani, pu qapasiwyuṅqamuyu, pu qayaktaqamuyu, pu qapostalyaqamuyu.
Nen um hahlayhpit epni. Pi puma kurs hin ūmi put aṅ ahoytotaniq’ö. Pay ason aṅ súanyuṅqam ahoy yesvaniwhq, pep pu’ God ūmi put ep ahoytani.
Noqw put amum nōnovaqamuy amuṅaqw haqawa it navotqe, put aw paṅqawu: Pas hak God moṅwtunatyayat ep nösniqa hahlayhpit epni.
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Hak tāqa wukonovataqe, k̇aysiwhqamuy tūtsama.
Nihqe nonopsattiqw, tūtsamiwyaqamuy amumi tumal’ayay hōnaqw, pam amumi paṅqawu: Huvam pewyaa; pay sohsoy himu yukiwta.
Noqw puma sohsoyam sun hihta akw qe’yaniqey pan unaṅwtoti. Noqw mohti’maqa put aw paṅqawu: Piw nu hihsaq tutskwat túihqe, pas soon qa aw kuyvatoni. Himu nu as pay qa awni.
Noqw suhk̇a paṅqawu: Piw nu tsivót‐sikip nanasṅwamuy tumalwawakastuy túihqe, pas piw soon amumi qa pohtani. Himu nu as pay qa awni.
Noqw suhk̇a paṅqawu: Piw nu nȫmataqe, ōviy kurs hin awni.
Noqw ōviy pam tumal’aya pítuhqe, īit moṅwiy āawna. Pahsat pu ki’taqa itsívutiqe, tumal’ayay aw paṅqawu: Yupa k̇aktayii, kīmii, kihkisonva, pu kīkisk̇at aw’i; nen um aṅ ōokiwyaqamuy, pu hihta akw qapasiwyuṅqamuy, pu qayaktaqamuy, pu qapostalyaqamuy aṅqw tsamni.
Noqw tumal’aya panhtiqe paṅqawu: Moṅwi, pay um hintaniqat paṅqawhq, nu as anhti; noqw pay nāt ep qeni.
Noqw moṅwi tumal’ayay aw paṅqawu: Yupa, kurs pö́nawita, pu kwiyauy’uhtsit aw’i, nen um aṅqw sinmuy tusoqtsamhq, ikiy ep ohpokni.
Pi nu ūmi paṅqawni: Imuy tahtaqtuy as tūtsamiwyaqamuy amuṅaqw qa haqawa inovay aṅqw nösni.
Noqw sinom qaan’ewakw hintaqam Jesus ámumya. Noqw pam namtökqe amumi paṅqawu:
Inuminihqa nawus nay, pu yuy, pu nȫmay, pu timuy, pu pāvamuy, pu tupkomuy, pu qȫqamuy, pu siwamuy, pu hikis pas nāp qatsiy enaṅ aw qa suhtaq’ewni. Hak qa panhtinik, soon inuṅk wīsiwtani.
Pu nahoylehtsiy qa yank̇aṅw inuṅknihqa pas soon inuṅk wīsiwtani.
Kurs uma haqawa ōmi wupakitaniqey tunatyawte’, ya sen pam qa mohti qatupte’, hin hihk̇ayat aṅ wūwani, sen aw aptsi’nitaqeyu?
Nāphisat pi pam as qaqatspiyat yukut, pay kurs hin put aw yúkuniniqw, aw yorstotaqam sohsoyam akw tututsiwtivaye’,
Paṅqaqwani: I’ as kītivat, pay kurs hin aw yúkuni.
Hal kurs hak haqam moṅwi sukwat moṅwit aqw kihpokte’, ya sen pam qa mohti qatupte’ aṅ wūwani, sen pay pam pakwút‐sikip sōmorit pahsa’ sinoy’k̇aṅw, put ahsawvatoqat áṅwutaniqeyu, pam sunát‐sikip sōmorit pahsa’ sinoy’taq’ö?
Noqw kurs pay hinniniqw, nāt mi’ pas yāvaqwniqw, pam aqw hakiy tuaw’ayhte’, pay hintaqat akw puma qa nāmi may’taniqat aw tūviṅtani.
Noqw ōviy pay pan hapi kurs uma haqawa sohsok hihta himuy qa tatamhte’, pas soon inuṅk wīsiwtani.
Öṅa as lolma; nīk̇aṅw kurs pam suhuviwe’, sen hihta akw suhutiwni?
Pam tutskwat aw qa nukṅwa, piw kwitatsvalnit aw’i. Pay pánis‐sa pi hakim put maspayaṅwu. Tuqayvastotaa! Uma pi naqvuy’yuṅwa.
Pahsat pu moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalalwaqam, qaanhinwisqamuy amumum sohsoyam put aw tūqayyuṅwniqe aw hóyokya.
Noqw Pharisee‐sinom, tutavot tutuqaynayaqamuy amumum Jesus aw qayan unaṅway’yuṅqe paṅqaqwa: Tuwat i’ tāqa qaanhinwisqamuy pas amu’puñalk̇aṅw, amumum tunöshomhta.
Noqw pam tūwutsit hihta tuawi’taqat akw amumi lavayhtiqe paṅqawu:
As kurs umuṅaqw haqawa tsivót‐sikip sunat kanelvokmuy’taqw suhk̇a kurs haqamini. Ya pam nālöp sunat pakwt pept sihk̇ay’taqamuy haqam tutskwave qa mātapt, pu haqaminihqat heptoni, pas túwaniqe pahsavoo?
Pu pam put tuwe’, hahlayk̇aṅw sukpa’ tsoki’k̇aṅw,
Kiy ep pite’, kwatsmuy, pu kisṅwamuy tsovale’, amumi paṅqawni: Huvam inumum hahlayyaa, nu ikanelvohkoy kurs haqaminihqat tuwa, kitani.
Nu umumi paṅqawni: Noqw pan hapi hak sūk̇a qaanhinmaqa tunatyay aṅqw lasq, put ep ōveqatsit ep yesqam hahlayhtotiṅwu; sinom nālöp sunat pakwt pept sihk̇ay’taqam súanhinwisqam kurs hihta aṅqw lasyaniqw, puma pumuy amuhpe qa pan hahlayhtotiṅwu.
Pu sen kurs hak wuhti pakwt qötsásivat himuy’k̇aṅw, sukw haqami hintsanni. Puyaw pam wihqöhit qa úwiknat, ahpave maspe’, pās hepni, pas ason put túwaniqey pahsavoo.
Pu pam put tuwe’, kwatsmuy, pu kisṅwamuy tsovale’, paṅqawni: Huvam inumum hahlayyaa; nu sīvat haqami hintsanqey ahoy tuwa, kítani.
Nu umumi paṅqawni: Noqw pan hapi hak suhk̇a qaanhinmaqa tunatyay aṅqw lasq, put ep God hoṅviaymat pas hahlayhtotiṅwu.
Pu pam paṅqawu: Hak tāqa lȫqmuy tiyotimuy’ta.
Noqw tsāywa nay aw paṅqawu: Inaa, as um hihta úhimuy aṅqw imakiway nuy máqani. Noqw pam hihta akw qátuhqey tiyotimuy namqana.
Noqw ahpiy qa wūhakis talq, pay tsāywa sohsok hihta himuy tsovalat, yāvoqhaqamii; nihqe pepehaq qahopqatuhqe, hihta himuy paysoq hintsana.
Nihqe pam put sohsokq, pep tutskwat ep wukotöṅösti; noqw put ahpa’ himu súlawhti.
Noqw pam pep tutskwat ep hakiy sinot aw nātuwikta. Noqw pam haqe’ pāsay aw put hōnaqw, pam pitsōtivokmuyatuy lālayi.
Noqw pitsōtim hihta pahpuyat nōnovaqw, as pam put öyniqe amumi kwaṅwáy’tuswaqw, pas qa hak put hihta maqa.
Noqw pam unaṅwtalawvaqe paṅqawu: Istáthihi! K̇aysiwhqam inay eṅem hihta ōviy tumalay’yuṅqam nȫsiwhqat qarūrumnayaqe, akwsiṅwni’yuṅqw, nu yephaqam tsöṅmomoki.
Han pi inay aqwnen, aw paṅqawu: Inaa, pas nu Oveqatsit ep Qátuhqat ehpewi qaanhti, piw uhpewii.
Nihqe soon nu yan’ewaynīkanw uhtinihqey pan túṅwantiwni. Pay um nuy tumal’ayatani, nu kítani.
Pu ōviy pam wunuptut, nay aqw’a. Noqw pam nāt yāvaqniqw, naat put túwahqe, ehpewi wárikqe, kwapk̇aqe súmavoktat, put tsohtsona.
Noqw tiat put aw paṅqawu: Inaa, pas nu Oveqatsit ep Qátuhqat ehpewi qaanhti, pu uhpewii, nihqe soon nu yan’ewaynīk̇aṅw uhtinihqey pan túṅwantiwni.
Noqw pay naat tumal’aymuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma pew yuwsit susnukṅwat yawwise’, put yuwsinayani. Pu uma taṅapsomnayat, totsvaknayani.
Nen uma wakashoyat wívakiwtaqat pew wikye’, nīnayani; noqw itam nōnove’, hahlayyani.
I’ iti as soñawnen mokt ahoy tātayi; i’ as kurs haqaminit ahoy nātuwiwa. Noqw pahsat pu puma hahlayhtivaya.
Noqw tiat wūyoqwa pasvehaqam tumalay’ta. Nit pam kīmi hayiṅwnaqw, ep lēlenyaqat, pu tīvaqw, pam navota.
Nihqe pam sukwat tumal’ayat wáṅwayhqe, puma hinoqw pantsatsk̇aqat put tūviṅta.
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Uhtupko pitu; noqw una wakashoyat wívakiwtaqat put eṅen nīna, pam put qahintaqat suphelawtaqat pitsínaqe ōviy’o.
Noqw pay pāvaat itsívutiqe, aw pákiniqey qa nakwha. Noqw ōviy naat aw yámakqe, aw kuwawayku.
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe nay aw paṅqawu: Istáthihi! Nu hihsa’haqam yahsaṅwuy aṅ uṅem tumalay’ta; piw nu qa hisat uhtutavoy hihtawat qaanhti. Noqw nu ikwátsmuy amumum hahlayniniqw, um qa hisat nuy kapirshoyat maqa.
Noqw i’ uhti tuwat nāhuhyayaqamuy amuhpa’ uṅ hihta akw qátuhqat sohsok’o. Noqw pam ahoy pituqw, āpiy pay um put eṅem wakashoyat wívakiwtaqat nīna.
Noqw naat put aw paṅqawu: Itii, pay pi um sutsep inumum yanta; noqw sohsok himu ihimu úhimuu.
Pay pi tatam itam qatsítote’, hahlayyani. Pi i’ uhtupko as soñawnen mokt, ahoy tātayi, kurs haqaminit ahoy nātuwiwa.
Pu piw pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Hak k̇ahaktaqa hakiy put eṅem hihta himuyat aw tunatyawtaniqat aw tavi. Noqw yaw put himuyat aw tunatyawtaqa put himuyat hovalantaqat moṅwíyat āawnaya.
Noqw pam wáṅwayhqe, put aw paṅqawu: Ya nu it hihta navota? Um hin hihta ihimuy as tunatyawtaqey nuy āawnani; pay um soon pāpu hihta ihimuy aw tunatyawtani.
Pu pahsat pam hak hihta aw tunatyawtaqa unaṅwpeq paṅqawu: Ya sen nu hinhtini? Imoṅwi itumalay nuy nawhkiniq’ö. Kurs nu hin pasva tumalay’tani; nu hihta tuṅlay’taniqey hahmana.
Hal kurs nu yanhtini. Noqw hisat nu itumalmakiway aṅqw ayo tūviwhq, sinom nuy kiy ep pās taviyani.
Kítahqe, ōviy pam moṅwíyat aw pöiwyuṅqamuy nānap wáṅwayhqe, mohti’maqat aw paṅqawu: Um hihsa’haqam imoṅwiy aw pöiwta?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pay tsivót‐sikip sunat tuwanit wihkuyita. Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Uhpöiy pey’taqat kwusut, ayam suqtuptut, lȫq sunat pakwt sihk̇ay’taqat pēnaa.
Pahsat pu pam piw sukwat aw paṅqawu: Noqw umwa hihsa’haqam pöiwta? Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pay tsivót‐sikip sunat tuwanit söhövosita. Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Uhpöiy pey’taqat kwusut, nālöp sunat pēnaa.
Noqw put moṅwíat put ep put aw tayawinlavayhti, pas pam tuhishinhtiqw ōviy’o, nāmahin pi as pam qa súan hinhtiq’ö. Pi yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqam nāp sinomuy amumiwat pas qa ūunatu. Noqw pay tālat aṅ hinwisqam qa pumuy amún tutuhistu.
Noqw nu umumi paṅqawni: Uma yep qatsit ep hihta umuhimuy akw nenṅem tūkwatslalwani; noqw ason umuhimu súlawhtiqw, puma umuy haqam sutsep yesniqat aw ökinayani.
Hak sustsa’ ep qa paysoq hintsakqa piw nihtiwtaqat ep qa paysoq hintsakṅwu; pu sustsa’ ep paysoq hintsakqa piw nihtiwtaqat ep paysoq hintsakṅwu.
Paniqw ōviy kurs uma yep qatsit ep hímuy’tiwhqat paysoq hintsatsne’, ya sen hak hihta hihk̇ay’taqat pas antsanihqat umumi nóani?
Pu uma hihta qa umuhimuy aw qa suan tunatyawwisq, ya sen hak hihta pas umuhimuyniniqat umumi nóani.
Kurs hin tumal’aya lȫqmuy moṅwímuy amuṅem tumalay’tani; ispi soon pam qa sukwat aw pay qa yan unaṅway’k̇aṅw, súkwat‐sa pas hahlayni; sen pay hihtawat‐sa aw pas yuki’k̇aṅw, pu sukwat pay qa hímuni. Kurs hin uma k̇āhakiwuy ōviy tumalay’k̇ahk̇aṅw, piw God eṅem tumalay’yuṅwni.
Noqw Pharisee‐sinom sīvat tuṅlay’yuṅqam sohsok it nanapta; nihqe put aw tututsiwya.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma pi sinmuy amumi lolmat nālavaytaṅwu; noqw pi God umumi umuh’unaṅway navoti’ta. Pi himu sinmuyniqw pas hímunihqa God‐niqw tuyoy’eway’o.
Hisat John pítuhqat aw pahsavo hin hinwisniqa tutavo yuaatiwa, pu God lavay’aymuyatuy lavayiam pīwu. Noqw pahpiy pu’ God moṅwtunatyayat yuaatiwhq, sinom sohsoyam aqw nānaqasya.
Pay tokpela, pu tūwaqatsi tūwayaniqw, pam pantaqa qa pas hinta; noqw pay tutavot ep sushihsay pey’taqa alöṅtiniqw, pam pantaqa pas qatuvosi.
Nȫmay mātapqa piw sukw amum qatupte’, tokot sokoptaṅwu; pu puwsuṅway aṅqw mātaviwhqat amum qatuptuqa tokot sokoptaṅwu.
Hak k̇ahaktaqa tsatsákwmötsaput a’nö hihk̇ay’taqat yuwsi’k̇aṅw, nāqavo hihta nasani’taṅwu.
Noqw pu piw hak okiw hihta nuhtumi tuṅlay’taqa, Lazarus yan mātsiwhqa put hötsíwat epeq taviwa, u’yasanīk̇aṅwo.
Nihqe pay okiw as ṅas’ew pam k̇ahaktaqat nönöspiyat aṅqw hihta piṅput tūmoytaniqey nāwakna. Noqw popkot ök̇e’, okiw put uyayat aṅ leñitsmitotaṅwu.
Noqw ahpiy pantaqw, i’ okiwsino mōki, Noqw God hoṅviaymat put ōmiq wikyaqw, pam Abraham aqlap qatuptu. Noqw pu tuwat k̇ahaktaqa mokqe āmiwa.
Nihqe maskiveq k̇ānavoti’k̇aṅw, kwuhpukqe, Abraham yāvoq tuwa, pu Lazarus put aqlap qátuhqata.
Pu pam tsa’lawhqe paṅqawu: Inaa, Abraham, um okiw nuy ōkwatuwe’, peqw Lazarus hōnaqw, pam malatsiy tsukuyat kūyit aqw móroknat, ileñiy huk̇anani; taq nu yepeq ūwiṅwuy ep pas okiw k̇ānavoti’ta.
Noqw Abraham paṅqawu: Itii, pay ura um uhqatsiy ep hihta úhimuy lolmat ömahta; noqw pu pan piw Lazarus hihta qalolmat ömahta. Nit pu’ pam suyan unaṅwtiqw, umwa tuwat k̇ānavoti’ta.
Pu piw pi itamuhtsave a’nö tupqa yukilti; pantaqw ōviy as yaṅqw umumiqyaniqam kurs hinyani; pu piw as umuṅaqw peqwyaniqam kurs hinyani.
Pahsat pu pam paṅqawu: Inaa, um as turs inay kīyat aw put hōnani.
Taq nu tsivot tupkomuy’ta. Noqw pam hin yórikqey pumuy āawnaqw, puma qa tuwat peqw k̇ānanvotpit aqwyani.
Noqw Abraham put aw paṅqawu: Pay pi puma Moses‐nik̇aṅw pu God lavay’ayamuyatuy lavayiyamuy oyi’yuṅwa. Pay ason pumuy amumi tūqayyuṅwni.
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Qae, Ina Abraham, pay hak so’pumuy amuṅaqw amuminiqw, soon puma tunatyay aṅqw qa lasyani.
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Pay pi puma Moses‐nik̇aṅw pu God lavay’aymuyatuy lavayiyamuy qa aw tūqayyuṅwe’, nāmahin pi hak so’pumuy amuṅaqw ahoy tātayhq soon tūtuptsiwani.
Pahsat pu Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Pas soon sinmuy lomavöhut aṅqw lasnayaqam haqami peveltini. Nīk̇aṅw pumuy amuṅem pas is’óhini.
Kurs hak imuy tsātsakwmuy hihtawat ayo lasnaqw, put eṅem pas is’ohini. Pay pi tatam māta put kwapk̇aqe hāyiltiqw pam wuhkovatuphamiq tūviwhq, pam put eṅem lolmani.
Uma nānami tunatyaltotini, kurs uhpava, sen uhtupko ūmi qaanhtiqw, um put u’nanani. Noqw kurs pam qaanhtipuy ep qahahlayhtiqw, pay um put pantaqat put ahpiy ayo yúkuni.
Pu kurs pam tāwat ep tsaṅe’sikis ūmi qaanhte’ put tāwat ep tsaṅe’sikis ūminen, qahahlayhtiqey paṅqawhq, um hapi put pantaqat put ahpiy ayo yúkumantani.
Noqw ayaiwyuṅqam Tutuyqawhqat aw paṅqaqwa: Um okiw itahtuptsiwniy aw hóyoknani.
Noqw Tutuyqawhqa paṅqawu: Kurs uma pay hihin tuptsiwni’yuṅwe’, nāmahin pi pam mustard‐uyit pōsiyat an tsāyniqw, uma it sycamine‐tsokit ṅáipwaniwe’, wuhkovatuphaveq kwihpiwniqat paṅqaqwaqw, soon pam umuhlavayiy qa anhtini.
Kurs uma haqawa tumal’ayay’taqw pam haqam tutskwat qöritani, sen wāwakastuy nopni’tani. Ason pam pasṅaqw pituqw, ya um put aw yan lavayhtini: Taay, um tunösvoñat aw qatuptuni, aw kítani?
Sóoni. Um yanwat put aw layayhtini: Um namuptat inuṅem nōvatat, nuy nopnani. Noqw nu tūmoytani, pu hikwni. Ason pay um inuṅk nösni, pu hikwni, kítani.
Ya sen um put aw kwakwhatani, pam hin ayatiwhqey anhtiqat ep’e? Pay k̇a sóon’i.
Noqw pay pan hapi ōviy piw uma tuwat hin ayatiwye’, sohsok anhtote’ paṅqaqwani: Pay itam okiw qa hihta apitoti. Pi pay itam itah’ayaway‐sa anhtoti, kitotani.
Noqw pam Jerusalem aqwnihqe, Samaria‐tutskwat, pu Galileet‐tutskwat paṅ qaqlavaqa paṅsoq’a.
Nihqe pam haqam kitsókimi pituqw, hakim pakwt tahtaqt tokoplelet tūtuyyaqam put ahsawvayaqe yāvaqw hōñi.
Nihqe puma paṅqw tsa’lalwaqe paṅqaqwa: Jesus, Moṅwi, um okiw itamuy ōkwatuwni.
Noqw pam pumuy túwahqe, amumi paṅqawu: Huvam God awwat momṅwituy amumi nāmahtaknawisaa. Noqw puma nāto aqwyak̇ahk̇aṅw, pay powaltoti.
Noqw pumuy amuṅaqw sūk̇a qalaptuqey navotqe, ahoy namtökt, pu pas tönay aṅqe’ God pas hihtata.
Nihqe pam Jesus kukmiq nātuvaqe put aw put ep hahlayhti. Noqw pam hak Samariat aṅqw sino.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Ya qa pakwtnihqam powaltoti? Noqw ya ima peptnihqam haqamiya?
Ya pay qa hak God pas hihtataniqe pitu, hal pay i’ qa‐Jew‐sino‐saa? kita.
Pu pam put aw paṅqawu: Wunuptut, aqwhaqamii. Pay um qapēvewnaqe qalaptu.
Noqw hisat God moṅwtunatyayat aw pítuniqat ima Pharisee‐sinom Jesus tūviṅtota. Noqw pam umumi paṅqawu: Pi God moṅwtunatyaat qa susmataqpuva pítuni.
Soon hak paṅqawni: Meh, pam ep’e, sen Meh, pam ayamo, kítani. Ispi meh, God moṅwtunatyaat yep umuhsonveniq’ö.
Pu pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay uma nāto nuy Sinot Tiyat as ṅas’ew sūs talöṅvaqat ep umumumniqat nānawaknaniqw, soon pam antani.
Noqw ephaqam sinom umumi paṅqaqwani: Meh, pam yep’e! sen Meh, ayamo! kitotani. Noqw uma hapi qa aqwyani; piw qa amuṅkyani.
Pi talwihpiki tokpelat aṅ ahsupoq tālawvaṅwu. Noqw pay hapi pan piw nu Sinot Tiat italöṅiy ep hinhtini, hisat pítee.
Nīk̇aṅw pay mohti pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqam nuy hīhihta akw okiwsasnayani, pu nuy tūvayani.
Noqw ura Noat qatsíyat ep hin yēsiwhq, pay hapi pan piw hintani, hisat nu’ Sinot Tiat ahoy pítuq’ö.
Ura puma nōnova, hīhikwya, nȫmalalwa, puwsuṅwlalwa, hisat Noa pākihut aqw pákihqat aw pahsavoo. Noqw pātsikq, puma sohsoyam súlawhti.
Pu pay ura piw pan Lot qatsíyat ep hinta. Sinom nōnova, hīhikwya, hihta tuhtuy’ya, hihta huyalalwa, uylalwa, pu kīlalwa.
Noqw ura hisat Lot Sodom aṅqw ahpiyniqw, ep tāwat ep ūwiṅw hihta sik̇ahpik owat enaṅ ōṅaqw löhöhöykuqe sohsokmuy kīqöta.
Noqw nāt hapi pantani, hisat nu’ Sinot Tiat mātaqtiq’ö.
Put talöṅvaqat ep kits’oveqnihqa paṅqw hāwe’, nawus soon hihta himuy ōviy ahpami papkini, súwayaniqe ōviy’o. Pu piw pasvenihqa qa kīmii.
Uma Lot nȫmayat u’ni’yuṅwni.
Qatsiy ayo táviniqey tunatyawtaqa put kwayhni; pu qatsiy kwayhqa hapi put ayo távini.
Nu umumi paṅqawni: Put tōkilat ep hakim lȫyöm sūkw puvuwhpit aṅ qatsni. Suhk̇a wīkiwhq, suhk̇a akwsiṅwni.
Hakim lȫyöm wuhtit nāma ṅúmantani. Suhk̇a wīkiwhq, suhk̇a akwsiṅwni.
Hakim lȫyöm pasve hinnumni. Suhk̇a wīkiwhq, suhk̇a akwsiṅwni.
Noqw puma lavayhtotiqe put aw paṅqaqwa: Háqamni, Tutuyqawhqa? Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay haqam himu mokputniqw, paṅso hapi wiwisokt sumitsovaltiṅwu.
Noqw sinom sutsep nānawakne’, qa naṅ’eknayaniqat Jesus pumuy tutuqaynaniqey nāwakna. Nihqe ōviy pam it tūwutsit akw umumi lavayhtiqe,
Paṅqawu: Haqam kitsókit ep hak tāqa qatu. Pam hak sinmuy amuṅem hin yuykuṅwu; nīk̇aṅw God qa mamqasi, piw sinmuy qa k̇aptsi’ta.
Noqw pu piw pay pep hak koṅnalavu qatu. Noqw pam hak wuhti tāqat aw pítuhqe aw paṅqawu: Um inuṅem ituwqay aw nāoyni.
Noqw pay as pam hihsavo qa nakwha; nit pay unaṅwpeq paṅqawu: Pay as pi nu God qa mamqasi, piw sinmuy qa k̇aptsi’ta.
Noqw i’ koṅnalavu inumi sus’itsq, pay ōviy nu eṅem nāoyni. Taq pam aṅk sasqe, nuy puhtsemoknani, kita.
Pu Tutuyqawhqa paṅqawu: Taay, kurs huvam sinmuy amuṅem hin yuykuṅwuqa qa súanhinmaqa hin lavayhtiqat nanaptaa.
Noqw puyaw God pas aṅ nāp namoramuy put aw tālö’nik̇aṅw, pu tōkilat aṅ tsaykitaqamuy amuṅem qa nāoyni? Ya pam sȫwuni?
Nu umumi paṅqawni: Pas soon pam pumuy amuṅem qa súnaoyni. Noqw pay pi as pantaqw ason nu’ Sinot Tiat hisat pite’, ya nu sinmuy qapēvewni’yuṅqamuy túwani?
Noqw haqawat suan hinyuṅqey qanāvevewnayaqam ayam pētuy qahihtay’yuṅwa. Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi it tūwutsit lavayhti:
Hakim lȫyöm tāqat nāwaknaniqe God kīyat aw paki. Suhk̇a Pharisee‐sínoniqw, pu suhk̇a moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalawhqa.
Noqw Pharisee‐sino wunuwk̇aṅw, nāwaknaqe yan nāyuaata: Kwakwhay God. Kwakwhat pi nu sinmuy qa amunta‐hihta tukwhantota, qa suan hinyuṅwa, qa nāp himuy amum hinwisa, hal hikis yep moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalawhqat an’i.
Nu tsaṅe’sikis talöṅwintiwhqat aṅ lȫs napwalaṅwu. Nu sohsok hihta ihimuy pakwút‐sikivo sun oyiwtaqat aṅqw sūp oyit ūmi nóaṅwu, kita.
Noqw moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalawhqa pay ayam haqam wunuwk̇aṅw, soon ṅas’ew ōmi kwuhpukniqe okiw tawitsqay wuvahtik̇aṅw paṅqawlawu: God, um okiw nuy qaanhinmaqat ōkwatuwni, kita.
Nu umumi súaṅqawni: I’wa qenive wunuwk̇aṅw, nima; noqw mi’wa qa pank̇aṅw ahpiy’o. Pi nāhihtataqa qahimuniwhtini; noqw nāqahihtataqa pas pavan hímuniwhtini.
Noqw sinom Jesus aw titipostuy tsamvaya, pam amumi tóṅokniqat ōviy’o. Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam amumi yórikyaqe, pumuy mēwa.
Noqw pay Jesus pumuy wáṅwayhqe paṅqawu: Uma tsātsakwmuy inumiyaniqat nakwhanayani, nen qa mēwantotani. Pi puma hapi God moṅwtunatyayat aw yuṅni.
Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Pas God moṅwtunatyayat tsākw qa an kwúsuhqa soon paṅso pákini.
Noqw hak pavansino Jesus tūviṅtaqe aw paṅqawu: Lolma Tutuyqawhqa, ya nu hihta hinhte’, qatsit qaso’taqat himuy’vani?
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Ya hinoqw um nuy lolmalawu? pi qa hak lolma, pas sūk̇aa, God.
Pay um hin hinwisniqat tutavot navoti’ta: Um tokot qa sokoptani; um qa hakiy nīnani; um qa hihta ūuyni; um hakiy qa atsátoynani; um unay, pu uṅuy pumuy k̇aptsi’tani, it’a.
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pas nu itsákoy aṅqaqw īit aṅ ahsupoq hinma.
Noqw Jesus it navotqe, put aw paṅqawu: Nīk̇aṅw um sūpwat qaanma. Um hihta úhimuy sohsok huye’, aṅ ōokiwyaqamuy put huytani. Nen um ōveqatsit ep hihta nukṅwat soon qa himuy’vani. Nit um aṅqwnen inuṅkni.
Noqw pam it navotqe, pas qahahlayhti, pas pam qaan’ewakw k̇āhaknihqe ōviy’o.
Noqw Jesus put pas qahahlayhtiqw navotqe paṅqawu: Pas aṅ hihta akw k̇āhak’iwyuṅqam God moṅwtunatyayat aw yuṅwniniqw amuṅem qa tūvoshinta.
Pay himu pohko pȫlay’taqa tsakomostat aṅ pórokput aṅ pákiniqw, pam pantaqa pas qa tūvosi. Nīk̇aṅw k̇ahaktaqa God moṅwtunatyayat aw pákiniqw, pam put epnihqe pas qa tūvosi.
Noqw hakim put nanaptaqam paṅqaqwa: Noqw pantaqw hak sen ayo yámakni?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pay aṅ himu sinmuyniqw pas kurs hin pasiwtaniqa pay God‐niqw pasiwta.
Pahsat pu Peter paṅqawu: Meh, itam hapi sohsok hihta tatamhtotat uṅk nankwusa.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Pas qa hak haqam paysoq God moṅwtunatyayat ōviy kiy, sen nay, sen yuy, sen pāvamuy, sen tupkomuy, sen qȫqamuy, sen siwamuy, sen nȫmay, sen timuy tatamhta.
Pi pam yep qatsit ep pay a’nö hóyokput ömahtani, pu qatsit nātoniqat ep qatsit qaso’taqata.
Pahsat pu pam pakwt lȫq sihk̇ay’taqamuy nāmi tsovalaqe, amumi paṅqawu: Meh, itam hapi Jerusalem aqwya. Noqw God lavay’aymat Sinot Tiyat hin pēnayaqw, pam pantaqa sohsoy aw antsaniwni.
Pi nu qa‐Jew‐sinmuy amumi mātaviwhq, puma nuy tututsiwnayani; nuy okiwsasnani; pu inumi töhtotani;
Pu puma nuy wuvahtotani; pu nuy nīnani. Noqw pāyis talq nu ahoy tātayni.
Noqw pam hiṅqawhqat puma qa mātsi’yuṅwa, put lavayiat pumuy amumi tupkiwtaqw ōviy’o. Pu pam hihta paṅqawhqat puma qa māmatsya.
Pu ahpiy pantaqw pam Jericho‐kitsókit aw hayiṅwnaqw, hak qapostalqa pöhut qalave qatuk̇aṅw, okiw hihta nuhtumi tuṅlay’ta.
Noqw sinmuy qaan’ewakw hintaqamuy paṅ haqamiyaqe mowawatiwisq, pam navotqe, put tūviṅta.
Noqw yaw Jesus Nazareth aṅqw sínonihqa haqaminihqat puma put āawnaya.
Noqw pam tsa’lawhqe paṅqawu: Jesus, um David Tíat, um okiw nuy ōkwatuwni.
Noqw ima mohti’wisqam put mēwayaqe, pay qa hiṅqawlawniqat aw paṅqaqwa. Noqw pahsat pu pas pam tuwat pavan k̇ēew paṅqawu: Um David Tiat, um okiw nuy ōkwatuwni.
Noqw Jesus huruhtiqe puma put aw wikyaniqat paṅqawu. Noqw pam put aw pituqw, Jesus put tūviṅtaqe,
Aw paṅqawu: Ya nu uṅ hintsanniqat um nāwakna? Noqw pam paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, um as okiw ivosiy tālawnani.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Pay nam uhposiy tālawnaa. Pay um qapēvewnaqe ayo taviwa.
Noqw pahsat pay pam pōsiy tālawna; nihqe Jesus aṅki, God pas hihtatimak̇aṅwo. Noqw sinom sohsoyam put aw yórikyaqe, God pas tayawnaya.
Noqw Jesus Jerichot aw pítuhqe, aṅ yámakto.
Noqw hak tāqa Zacchaeus yan mātsiwhqa pep qatu. Pam hak moṅwit eṅem sīvat ömalalwaqamuy amuṅaqw mohpeq’a; nihqe k̇āhak’i.
Noqw pam Jesus hákiynihqat as aw yórikniqey tuwanta; noqw sinom hūrs hintaqw, pay pam kurs hin aw yórikni, hak tsāvanihqe ōviy’o.
Nihqe ōviy pam amupyeve wárikqe, pas pay aw yórikniqe sycamore‐tsokit aṅ wūvi, pam paṅniniqw ōviy’o,
Noqw Jesus put háqamniqw aw pítuhqe, ōmi tātayht, put túwahqe, aw paṅqawu: Zacchaeus, pis’oqtit hāwii, taq nu pu’ pas pay soon uhkiy ep qa huruhtini.
Pu pam pis’oqtiqe, paṅqw hawht, hahlayk̇aṅw, kiy aw put pitsína.
Noqw sinom put aw yórikyaqe, sohsoyam qayan unaṅway paṅqaqwa: Yaw pam hakiy tāqat qaanhinmaqat kiyavaqwviatniqe ōviy ámumnihqat paṅqaqwa.
Noqw Zacchaeus wunuptuqe, Tutuyqawhqat aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, nu hihta ihimuy nāsamiq yantaqat ōokiwyaqamuy huytani. Pu kurs nu hakiy sivit ep hihta paysoq nawhk̇e’, nu nālös hóyokiwtaqat put aw ahoytani.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Pu’ hapi it talöṅvaqat ep um, pu umum yesqam ayo nöṅa, pay pi um Abraham ahpiy aniwhtiqw ōviy’o.
Pi nu’ Sinot Tiat haqami hiniwhtotiqamuy hēve’, ayo óyaniqe pitu.
Noqw pumuy īit nanaptaqw, Jesus qa lavayyukut, pumuy amumi hihta tūwutsit akw yuaayku, pam Jerusalem aqw pitutoqe ōviy’o. Noqw k̇a God moṅwtunatyaat āpiy pay mātaqtiniqat sinom pan wūwantota.
Noqw ōviy pam paṅqawu: Hak pavansino moṅwtunatyat makiwniqe ōviy yāvoqhaqamii, pay nāt piw ahoy pítunikaṅwo.
Nihqe pam tumal’aymuy pakwtnihqamuy wáṅwayht, amumi pakwút‐sikip sunat sīvat oyat, amumi paṅqawu: Uma inuhsavo it apitoyni’yuṅwni.
Noqw put amum sinoiwtaqam put aw qa suhtaq’ewyaqe aṅk hakiy hōnaqe paṅqaqwa: Itam it itamumi moṅw’iwtaniqat qa nānawakna.
Noqw ahpiy pantaqw pam moṅwtunatyat makiwhqe, ahoy pitu. Nihqe pahsat pu imuy tumal’a’yatuy amumi sīvat óyahqey pumuy wáṅwayniwyaniqat pam paṅqawu, puma huhyayaqw, hihsa’haqam pi hak aw hóyoknaṅwuqat navotniqe ōviy’o.
Noqw pahsat pu mohti’maqa pítuhqe aw paṅqawu: Moṅwi, ura um inumi sunat sīvat noaqw, nu put aw pakwút‐sikip sunat sīvat hóyokna.
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Um súanhti, lomatumal’aya. Um hihta qa hímunihqat ep qa paysoq hintsana, ōviy um pakwút‐sikip wuhkokitsokit aw moṅw’iwtani.
Pahsat pu aṅknihqa pítuhqe aw paṅqawu: Moṅwi, ura um inumi sunat sīvat noaqw, nu put aw tsivót‐sikip sunat hóyokna.
Noqw moṅwi put aw piw an lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay ōviy piw um tsivót‐sikip wuhkokitsokit aw moṅw’iwtani.
Pu piw suhk̇a pítuhqe put aw paṅqawu: Moṅwi, taay, yep uhsiva. Nu uṅ mamqasqe, ōviy nu it höhönpit ep put mōki’ta. Um pi a’nö unaṅway’taqe, haqam hihta qa tavit ep kwúsuṅwu; pu um hihta qa uyht put höqṅwu.
<range>
Noqw moṅwi put aw paṅqawu: Nu nāp uhlavayiy akw uṅ hin yukunani, um nukpantumal’aya. Kurs um nuy a’nö unaṅway’taqw put navoti’ta. Kurs nu haqam hihta qa tavit ep kwúsuṅwu, pu hihta qa uyht put höqṅwu.
Ya hinoqw um nuy pantaqw tis nāpi isivay sivakimi qa pana? Pi um panhtiqw, nu pite’, ihimuy‐nik̇aṅw pu put ep ahsatit enaṅ ömahtani.
Pu pam aqlaq hoṅqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma put sīvayat nawhkiyat pakwút‐sikip sunat sīvat himuy’taqat put maqayani.
Noqw puma put aw paṅqawu: Moṅwi, pay pam pakwút‐sikip sunat sīvay’ta.
Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: Nu umumi paṅqawni: Aṅ himuy’yuṅqam piw hihta makiwyani. Pu ṅastanihqa hikis as pay hihta himuy’taqey kwayhni.
Pu imuy ituwqamuy nu amumi moṅw’iwtaniqat qa nānawaknaqamuy uma pew tsamye’, inutpip qöqyani,
Noqw Jesus yan lavayhtit, sinmuy amupyeve Jerusalem aqwat nakwsu.
Nihqe pam haqam tsomot, Olivet yan mātsiwhqat, aw pitu, Bethphage‐kitsókit‐nik̇aṅw, pu Bethanyt‐kitsókit, pumuy hayiṅwnaqee. Nihqe pam lȫqmuy put aw nánatuwnaqamuy ayataqe,
Amumi paṅqawu: Uma umupyeve kitsókit awni. Nen uma ep pak̇e’, morohyat sómiwtaqat túwani. Nāt pas qa hisat hak aqw wūvi. Uma put ṅaht, aṅqw wikni.
Noqw ason kurs hak umuy hinoqw put ṅáṅahqat tūviṅtaqw, uma yan lavayhtini: Tutuyqawhqa it nāwaknaqw ōviy’o.
Noqw ima ayaiwhqam ahpiynihqe, hin pam pumuy amumi lavayhtiqat an yori.
Noqw puma morohyat ṅaṅahq, pohkoy’yuṅqam amumi paṅqaqwa: Ya uma hinoqw morohyat ṅáṅaha?
Noqw puma paṅqawu: Itahtutuyqawhqa it nāwaknaqw ōviy’o.
Nihqe puma put Jesus aw wikvaqe, yuwsiy morohyat aqw ahpatat, put aqw Jesus tsok̇a.
Pu pam paṅ nakwsuqw, sinom pö́nawit yuwsiy ahpatota.
Pu ōviy pam kitsókimi hayiṅwnaqe, pāpu pay tsomot Olivet aṅ pihpoqniqw, pahsat pu sohsoyam put aṅk wīsiwtaqam pas tönay aṅqe’ God tayawintivaya, pu pam sohsok hihta qaöwítumaltaqw, put ep puma put pas hihtativaya;
Nihqe paṅqawtiwisa: Nam Moṅwi, Tutuyqawhqat natṅwaniyat aṅ pitútoqa tayawintiwaa. Nam ōveqatsit ep kwakwhat yēsiwaa. Nam Sus’ovenihqa, k̇aptsitiwaa.
Noqw haqawat Pharisee‐sinom sinsonṅaqw Jesus aw paṅqaqwa: Tutuqaynaqa ūmi nánatuwnayaqamuy mēwaa.
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe amumi paṅqawu: Nu umumi súaṅqawni: Pas imuy qa hiṅqaqwaniqw, soon yaṅ o’wa qa sáakmani.
Noqw pam Jerusalem aw hayiṅwnaqe aw tātayhqe, put ep paklawu, paṅqawkaṅwo:
Is as uma yepehaq pu’ kwakwhat yēsiwniqat haqe’ qatsqat māmatsyani! Noqw núṅwupi umuhposi qatālawva.
Pi nāt hisat aw pituqw, umuhtuwqam namurulnit akw umuhkitsokiy póṅokni, nānan’ivaqw put uhtayani.
Nen put tutskwami sahpuknayani, uma pep ki’yuṅqamuy énaṅa. Noqw pep qa haqam owa nāp qeniy ep akwsiṅwni, ispi Sus’oveqnihqa umumi pohtaqw, uma put qa mātsi’yuṅq’ö.
Pu pam God kīyat aw pákihqe, pep hihta huhyayaqamuy, pu tuhtuy’yaqamuy paṅqw ipwanva;
Nihqe amumi paṅqawu: Ikiy ep nāwakintotamantani. Noqw uma soq put uuyiṅtuy kivatoynaya.
Pu pam nāqavo God kīyat ep tūtutuqayna. Noqw pay God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam‐niqw, pu sinmuy amuṅaqw pavansinom, puma hin as put nīnayaniqey hēvi’yuṅwa;
Nit hinhtotiniqey qa tutwa, sinom sohsoyam put aw pās tūqayyuṅqw ōviy’o.
Pu hisat pam God kīyat ep sinmuy tutuqaynaqe lomatuawit yuaata. Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqam, wukw’a’yatuy amumum put aw ö́kihqe,
Aw paṅqaqwa: Kurs itamuy hihta āawnaa. Ya um hihta öqalat aw yank̇aṅw īit hintsaki? Ya hak uṅ it öqalat maqa?
Noqw pam lavayhtiqe amumi paṅqawu: Kurs nu tuwat umuy sūkw hihta tūviṅtani. Noqw uma nuy āawnayani.
Ura John kūyit akw tūtuvoylalawu. Ya pam haqaqw put makiwa? Sen ōveqatsit aṅqö’? Sen sinmuy amuṅaqö’?
Noqw puma put nānami yuaatotaqe paṅqaqwa: Ya sen itam Oṅaq’ö, kitotani? Soon qa pam itamumi paṅqawni: Noqw hinoqw uma put aw qa tūtuptsiwa?
Ya sen itam Sinmuy amuṅaq’ö kitotani? Noqw soon sinom sohsoyam itamuy qa tatatupqöqyani. Pi púmuyniqw John pas antsa God lavay’ayaata.
Noqw ōviy puma lavayhtotiqe aw paṅqaqwa: Pay kurs pi hin put háqaqwnihqat itam paṅqaqwani.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay ōviy nu piw soon hihta öqalat aw yank̇aṅw īit hintsakqey umuy āawnani.
Pahsat pu pam tūwutsit hihta tuawi’taqat sinmuy amumi yuaativaqe amumi paṅqawu: Hak tāqa ōvat uyht, tumalay’yuṅqamuy amumi put mātapt, wūyavo yāvoqhaqamii.
Pu ōvat kwaṅwtinisavotiqw, pam ovauyit tumalay’yuṅqamuy amumi hoṅviayay hōna, puma aniwniyat aṅqw put maqayaniqat ōviy’o. Noqw tuwat soq ovauyit tumalay’yuṅqam put wuvahtotat, qa hihta hintaqat paṅqw hōnaya.
Pu piw pam sukw hoṅviayay pumuy amumi hōna. Noqw pay puma piw put wuvahtotat, hamanhintsatsnat, qa hihta hintaqat paṅqw lālayya.
Pu amuṅk pu’ pam piw sukw pumuy amumi hōna. Noqw piw pay puma put ȫputotat, qalavohaqami tūvaya.
Pahsat pu ovauyit himuy’taqa paṅqawu: Ya sen nu hinhtini? Han pi amumi pas aw iunaṅway itiy tavi. Pay k̇a as puma put aw yórikye’, k̇aptsitotani.
Noqw ovauyit tumalay’yuṅqam put tutwaqe, nānami lavayhtotiqe paṅqawa: I’ hapi nay akpetani. Taay, itam nīnayaqw, himu himuatniqa itahhimuniwhtini, kitota.
Pu ōviy puma ovauyit aṅqw qalavohaqami put wikyat, nīnaya. Taay, noqw ya ovauyi’taqa it ep sen pumuy hintsanni?
Pam pite’, imuy tumalay’yuṅqamuy qöye’, pas pētuy amumi ovauyit noani, pam kita. Noqw puma put nanaptaqe paṅqaqwa: Soon pantani.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi tātayht, paṅqawu: Ura yan pey’ta: Owa kīlalwaqamuy amuhpiy qalavo tūviwhqa hapi tuyqaatniwhti, yan’i. Noqw ya pam lavayi hihta lavayhti?
Put owat ep yēvaqa yoyhni. Nīk̇aṅw ason pam hakiy aw yēve’, tostani.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit, tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqamuy amumum put lavayiyat māmatsya, suyan pi pam pumuy amunkiwakw sōmokyuaaykuq’ö; nihqe ōviy puma āpiy put ṅuayaniqey anhtotik̇aṅw, sinmuy mamqastoti.
Noqw ōviy puma put aw pās tūqayyuṅwa, piw hakim put mokmani’yuṅwniqat put aw hōnaya, puma hakim suan hinyuṅqey as nawip’ew hinyuṅq’ö. Nen puma put lavayiyat unahepye’, pep tutskwat ep öqalayat, pu tunatyayat aw put mātapyani.
Noqw puma put tūviṅtotaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Tutuqaynaqa, itam ūmi navoti’yuṅqw, um suan yuaatak̇aṅw hihta súantaqat sinmuy tutuqayna. Pu um qa hakiy pas hihtay’k̇aṅw, pas qa atsat God tunatyayat tūtutuqayna.
Ya pay itam hihta aṅ sivit Caesar aw ōoyyaniqw, pam súanta, sen qa súanta?
Noqw pay pam pumuy unatwiyamuy māmatsqe, amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hinoqw nuy unaheptota?
Kurs inumi votōnat mahtaknayaa. Ya i’ hakiy pitsáṅwaat ep pey’ta? Pu hakiy tuṅwniat aṅ pey’ta? Noqw puma lavayhtotiqe, paṅqawu: Caesar pitsaṅwaata.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Turs uma hihta Caesar himuyat Caesar aw noayani. Pu God himuyat uma God aw noayani.
Noqw pay puma kurs hin sinmuy amutpip put lavayiyat ep hintsatsnani. Nihqe puma put lavayiyat ep k̇ātayuṅqe, pay qa hiṅqaqwa.
Pahsat pu hakim Sadducee‐sinom, yaw so’pum pay ahoy qa yesvaniqat paṅqaqwaqam put aw öki; nihqe put tūviṅtotaqe,
Aw paṅqaqwa: Tutuqaynaqa, Moses itamumi tutaptaqe yan pēna: Kurs tāqa nȫmay’taqa qa tímuy’k̇aṅw mokq, put pāvaat, sen tupkoat put nȫmayatniṅwuqat amum qatupte’, put eṅem tíoymantani.
Noqw ura as hakim tsáṅe’nihqam nānatupkom yēse. Noqw amuṅaqw suspavaam as nȫmatat, qa tímuy’vat pay mōki.
Noqw aṅknihqa put nȫmayatniṅwuqat amum qatuptut, tuwat qa tímuy’k̇aṅw mōki.
Noqw pu amuṅknihqa pay piw amunhti. Noqw puma as tsáṅe’nihqam put nȫmatotaqw, qa hihtawat eṅem wuhti ti’va.
Noqw nuhtuṅk pu’ wuhti tuwat mōki.
Noqw ya ōviy sinmuy ahoy yesvaqw, pam hihtawat pumuy tsáṅe’nihqamuy nȫmaatni? Pi puma sohsoyam put nȫmatota?
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe amumi paṅqawu: Sinom yep qatsit ep nȫmalalwa, piw puwsuṅwlalwa.
Noqw pay ima hakim mokiwuy aṅqw ahoy yesve’, qatsit nātoniqat ep ö́kiniqey pay ep pávanyaqamuy qa nȫmalalwani, piw qa puwsuṅwlalwani.
Piw soon puma pāpu so’ni. Pi puma God hoṅvi’aymuyatuy pas amunyuṅwni. Puma ahoy yesve’, God tímatni.
Noqw kurs uma so’qam ahoy yesvaniqat ep tūviṅtotaniqw‐ya Moses himutskit lavayhtiqe hin pēnaqe hihta lavayhti? Ura God Abraham Tutuyqawhqaatnihqat paṅqawu, pu Isaac Tutuyqawhqaata, pu Jacob Tutuyqawhqaata,
Ispi pam qa so’pumuy Tutuyqawhqaamu, pi yesqamuyu; pi putniqw sohsoyam yēse.
Pahsat pu tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqamuy amuṅaqw haqawa lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, pas um súaṅqawu.
Pahpiy pāpu puma put hihta tūviṅtotaniqey aw qa unahintsatsk̇a.
Pu pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya hintaqw ōviy uma Christ David tíatnihqat paṅqaqwa?
Noqw pi David Tātawit pey’taqat ep nāp paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, Imoṅwiy aw paṅqawu: Um hāk iputvaqewat qatuqw
Nu uhtuwqamuy áṅwutaqw, puma ūmi maqaptsi’yuṅwniqat pahsavoo.
Noqw ōviy hapi David put Moṅwílawu; noqw hin pam put tíata?
Pahsat pu sinom sohsoyam tūqayyuṅqw, pam put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi paṅqawu:
Uma tutavot tūtutuqaynayaqamuy amuhpe qa nāunay’yuṅwni. Puma wupausit usnumyaniqey nānawakna, pu kitpik amumi hahlaykwa yuaatiwniqata; pu tsotsvalkiva mohk̇aqe tsotsókpit tuṅlay’yuṅwa, pu nōviwhqat aṅ nukṅwat qeqnita.
Ima hapi koṅnanalvutuy kīyamuy tusoqkwahanni’yuṅwa. Puma nawip’ew hink̇ahk̇aṅw, nānawakne’ sutsépyuaativayaṅwu. Puma hapi pas pavan qaöwíhintsaniwyani.
Pu pam kwuhpukqe k̇ahksinmuy kuwahtipuy sivatataṅpit aqw taṅalalwaqamuy amumi yori.
Noqw pu piw pam hakiy ōokiwhqat koṅnalavut paṅsoq lȫqmuy palavotōnat pahpaṅqw tuwa.
Nihqe pam paṅqawu: Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: I’ ōokiwhqa koṅnalavu imuy sohsokmuy amuhpenihqe hóyokiwtaqat paṅsoq pana.
Ima pi pay sohsoyam qarūrumnayak̇ahk̇aṅw, hihta akwsiṅqat aṅqw God eṅem kuwahtiput paṅsoq taṅatota. Noqw i’ pi okiw hihta rūrumnak̇aṅw, pas hihta akw qátuhqey sohsok paṅsoq pana.
Noqw haqawat God kīyat yuaatotaqe paṅqaqwa: Is uti! pam lomao’wat akw lomasniwa, pu hīhihta kuwahtiput akw’a. Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu:
Ya uma īit yaṅ o’wat aw tāyuṅwa? Pay nāt hisat aw pituqw, pep pu’ qa haqam owa nāp qeniy ep akwsiṅwni. Pam sohsoy sahpumhtini.
Noqw puma put tūviṅtotaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Tutuqaynaqa, noqw ya īi hisat yaniwhtini? Pu hisat paniwhtiniqw himu put tuawi’tani?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Uma tunatyaltote’ qa ūnatoyniwyani. Taq k̇aysiwhqam inatṅwaniy aṅ ök̇e’ paṅqaqwani: Nu’ Christ, kitotani; pu piw Aw hayiṅwti, kitotani. Noqw ōviy hapi uma qa amuṅkyani.
Sinom nāqöytivayani, piw qanamítuqayvahsi’yuṅwni. Noqw pay uma put nanapte’ qa tsawiniwyuṅwni. Pi īi yantaqa pas soon qa mohti yaniwhtini. Nīk̇aṅw hapi pay nāt qa pep so’ṅwamiq pítuni.
Pahsat pu pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Haqam hihtuwat sinom hihtuywatuy sinmuy amumum nehpewi hoṅvani. Pu moṅwtunatya sup moṅwtunatyat ehpewhtimantani.
Pu hāhaqe’ tutskwa a’nö tayayaykuni; pu tsö́ṅöstini; pu hīhimu wukotuyani; pu sinom hīhihta nuhtsel’e’wakw aw yórikyani; noqw tokpelat aṅ hīhimu hihta tuawi’taqat mātaktotini.
Nīk̇aṅw hapi nāt īit qa yayhniwhq, sinom umumi may’yuṅwe’, umuy okiwsahsantivayani, tsotsvalkiva momṅwituy amumi umuy mātaplalwani; pu sivikimi umuy taṅalalwani. Noqw uma kitsókimi moṅw’iwyuṅqamuy amumi‐nik̇aṅw pu tutskwat aw moṅw’iwyuṅqamuy amumi tsamvaniwyani, uma isinomnihqe ōviy’o.
Noqw uma umuhtuptsiwniy tunvotnayaniqat aw umuṅem qenitiwmantani.
Paniqw ōviy uma pep hin lavayhtotiniqey aṅwu pay wūwantotaniqey qe’yaniqey umuh’unaṅwpeq yuki’yuṅwni.
Pay ason nu hapi umuy lavaymaqamantani, pu súanwuwnitoynamantani. Noqw sohsoyam umuhpew’iwyuṅqam soon put ep umuy yumoṅwaltotani, piw áṅwuy’yuṅwni.
Pu umunam, umuṅum, umuhpavam, umuhtupkom, pu umuṅaqwvim, pu umuhkwatsim umuy nuhtumi mātaplalwaqw, puma umuy haqawatuy qöqyani.
Pu sinom sohsoyam umumi qa suhtaq’ewyani, uma isinomnihqat ōviy’o.
Nīk̇aṅw hapi pay pas soon umuhqötöva umuhhömi himuwa súlawhtini.
Uma qa naṅ’eknaye’, qatsit himuy’vayani.
Pu ason Jerusalem solāwamuy akw nö́yakiwtaqw, uma aw yórikye’, pahsat uma put kīqötiwhqat aw hayiṅtiqw uma nanaptani.
Pep pu’ ima Judeat ep yesqam tuhtukwimiq watqani, pu kīveyaqam paṅqw ahpiyyani, pu haqe’ tutskwava hinnumyaqam qa paṅso ahoy yuṅni.
Pi ep hapi God sinmuy amumi nāoyni. Noqw tutuvenit aṅ hin pey’taqat sohsok aṅ aw antsaniwni.
Nīk̇aṅw hisat aw pituqw aṅ nö’yiwyuṅqamuy, pu aṅ yōyoṅnayaqamuy kurs hin watqaniqamuy amuṅem pas is óhini! Taq sinom pavan pas k̇ānanaptani. Pi God itsívuat pumuy amumi hūrs töṅaniwtani.
Noqw puma sipwuvahpit qalayat akw súlawhtini. Noqw tuwqaam pumuy tūwiktote’, hāhaqe’ tutskwat aw pumuy tsamyani. Noqw qa‐Jew‐sinom Jerusalem atsva wukukuykuyani, pumuy paptsiy aṅ kūkuyvaniqat aqw pahsavoo.
Pu tāwat, mūyawuy, pu sōtuy aṅ himu hihta tuawi’yuṅwni. Noqw hīhihtu sinom sóonhtote’, kurs hin wūwantotani, pātuwaqatsi a’nö hoṅvantak̇aṅw sȫykitaqw ōviy’o.
Noqw sinom hihta tūwaqatsit aw pítuniqat aw‐sa tāyuṅwe’, tsawiniwk̇ahk̇aṅw, unaṅwso’ni, pi ōvaqe öqala tayayaykuniqw ōviy’o.
Pep pu nu’ Sinot Tiat öqalat pasiwk̇aṅw, qaan’ewkw tālawṅway’k̇aṅw ōmawuy akw hawtoqw, sinom inumi tātayyani.
Noqw ason īi yantaqa hiniwmaqw, uma kwuhpukye’, ōmiq tāyuṅwni; ispi uma soon pas hisat ayo nö́ṅakiwtaniqee.
Pu pam pumuy amumi himu hihta antaqat lavayit akw yuaaykuqe paṅqawu: Uma nönvospaltsokit aw wūwayani, pu hīhihta himutsotskita.
Puma sipölöy’vayaqw, uma aw tātayye’, pay tal’aṅwhayiṅwiwtaqat nanaptaṅwu.
Noqw pay pan hapi ōviy uma ason īit yantaqat hiniwmaqw aw tātayye’, pay God moṅwtunatyaat aw pitsíwtaqat nanaptani.
Pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Yep sinom pas soon tūtuwayaqw, pay sohsoy it yaniwhtini.
Pay as tokpela, pu tūwaqatsit tūwayani. Noqw ilavayi hapi pas soon tūwayani.
Nīk̇aṅw uma nānami tunatyaltotini. Taq k̇a uma hihta nasani’yuṅwe’, pu honaqkuyit akw hōnaq’iwyuṅwe’, yep qatsit ep hihta tunatyat‐sa aw tunatyawyuṅwe’ qa unaṅwtalawvayani. Nen uma qa navoti’k̇ahk̇aṅw, put talöṅnit aw suy’kini.
Pi sopk̇awtaqam sinom tūwaqalvoqhaqami yesqam put aw ök̇e’, soñawnen wivosit aqw kwisyani.
Paniqw ōviy uma tunatyawk̇ahk̇aṅw, yūmosa nāwakinwisni. Nen uma īit yaniwhtiniqat aṅqw ayo nö́ṅakniqey aw öqawi’k̇ahk̇aṅw, nuy Sinot Tiyat inutpip hoṅni.
Noqw Jesus nāqavo God kīyat ep sinmuy tutuqayna; nit mihikq paṅqw yámak̇e’ tsomot, Olivet yan mātsiwhqat aqwnen, epeq talöṅnaṅwu.
Noqw qavoṅvaqw sinom sohsoyam suits God kīyat ep put aw öki, aw tūqayyuṅwniqe ōviy’o.
Noqw qa pek̇en’oyvut pölavikit nōviwniqat, Amutsva Yūmosanihqa yan túṅwantiwhqat aw pituto.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit tutavot tutuqaynayaqamuy amumum hin as Jesus nīnayaniqey hēvi’yuṅwa, Nīk̇aṅw puma sinmuy mamqasya.
Noqw pahsat pu Satan, Judas Iscariot yan piw túṅwantiwhqat, imuy pakwt lȫq sihk̇ay’taqamuy amumum tōnawtaqat pan unaṅwtoynaqw,
Pam ahpiynihqe, God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy‐nik̇aṅw pu solāwamomṅwituy amumum pasiwna, hin as pam pumuy amumi Jesus mātapniqey ōviy’o.
Noqw puma hahlayhtotiqe, put sīvat maqayaniqey aw pasiwnaya.
Noqw pam panhtiniqey paṅqawhqe, hisat sinom Jesus qa ámumyaqw, momṅwituy amumi put mātapniqey qenihevi’ta.
Pahsat pu ōviy qa pek̇en’oyvut pölavikit ep nōviwniqat aw pitu. Ep hapi pu’ Jew‐sinom Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep mañat nīnayaṅwu.
Noqw Jesus Peter‐nit, pu John, pumuy ayataqe, amumi paṅqawu: Uma ahpiynen, Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwniqat hin hintaṅwuqat itamuṅem aw hintsanni. Noqw itam nȫnösani.
Noqw puma put aw paṅqawu: Ya itam haqam put aw hintsanniqat um nāwakna?
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Meh, uma kīmi pakiqw, pep hak tāqa kuysivut akw kūyi’k̇aṅw umuhsawvani. Uma put haqami kīmi pakiqw, aṅk aw pákini.
Pu ason uma ki’taqat aw paṅqawni: Itamuy tutuqaynaqa ūmi paṅqawu: Ya haqam yeyespi? Pep nu as inumi nánatuwnayaqamuy amumum Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwhqat nösni.
Noqw pam tupatsveq wukoahpavit ep pās himu yukiwtaqat umumi mahtaknani. Pep uma hihta aw hintsanni.
Noqw puma ahpiynihqe, Jesus amumi hin lavayhtiqat an yori. Nihqe puma Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwhqat hin hintaṅwuqat aw hintsana.
Pu ōviy aw pituqw, pam tunösvoñat aw qatuptu; noqw ima pakw lȫq sihk̇ay’taqam ayaiwyuṅqam put ámumya.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu it Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwhqat umumum nösniqey pas nāwakna, nu nāt qa k̇ānavotat’a.
Pi nu umumi paṅqawni. Pay nu soon put aṅqw piw nösni, pay ason pas hisat God moṅwtunatyayat ep pam aw antsaniwhq, pep pu’ nu piw nösni, pam kita.
Pu pam kuyapkuyit kwusut, put ep hahlayhtit, paṅqawu: Huvam it kwusuyat nāhuyvaa.
Pi nu umumi paṅqawni: Pas nu soon pāpu ovauyit aniwniyat aṅqw hikwni, pay ason pas hisat God moṅwtunatyayat aw pítuniqat aw pahsavoo.
Pu pam pölavikit kwusut, put ep hahlayhtit, yōhat, pumuy put maqa paṅqawk̇aṅwo. I’ hapi itoko umuṅem taviwa. Yan uma hintsak‐wise’, akw nuy u’ni’yuṅwni.
Pu pay piw an pumuy nȫnösaqw, pam kuyapkuyit kwusut paṅqawu: I’ kuyapkuyi hapi iuṅwa. Pam umuṅem puhuvasiwnit pasiwnaniqe ōviy munvaniwni.
Nīk̇aṅw meh, hak momṅwituy amumi nuy mātapniqa inumum tunösvoñat aw may’ta.
Noqw pay pi pas antsa Sinot Tiyat eṅem hin yukiwhqat pan nu yaṅqw ahpiyni. Noqw i’ hak momṅwituy amumi nuy mātapniqat eṅem pas is óhini.
Pahsat pu haqawa puma yanhaqam hinhtiniqat puma nātuviṅtivaya.
Noqw puma pi piw nāṅwuy’yuṅwa, haqawa pa pas suspavanniqey mātaqtiniqat ep’e.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Qa‐Jew‐sinmuy moṅwímat pi pumuy amumi pas tutuyqawya; noqw pu ima pumuy amumi moṅw’iwyuṅqam pumuy amumi unaṅwtavi’yuṅqey pan túṅwantiwya.
Noqw uma hapi qa panyuṅwni. Pay umuṅaqw pas suspavannihqa sustsākwnihqat pantani; pu i’ moṅw’iwtaqa suṅwámuy amuṅem tumalay’tani.
Ya himuwa pas pávanniqö’, sen tunösvoñat aw qátuhqa, sen nopni’taqa? Soon qa tunösvoñat aw qátuhqaniṅwu. Noqw pi nu nuhtuṅem hihta hintsakqey pank̇aṅw umumum yanta.
Inumi tuwantiwhq, uma hapi inumum aṅ kūkuyva.
Noqw ōviy nu hapi umuy moṅw’oyni, Ina nuy moṅwtapqat pan’i.
Noqw uma inumum tunösvoñat aw yesve’, inumum nōnovat, hīhikwyani. Pu uma moṅw’atsvewat aṅ yesk̇ahk̇aṅw, Israel‐sinmuy pakwt lȫq sihk̇ay’tasikip sinoiwtaqamuy amumi moṅw’iwyuṅwni.
Pu Tutuyqawhqa paṅqawu: Simon, Simon, meh, Satan as umuy tuṅlayhti, umuy söhövosit an tsātsayaniqe ōviy’o.
Noqw pay nu uṅem nāwakna, uhtuptsiwni qa sóonhtiniqat ōviy’o. Noqw ason um ahoy inumi namtök̇e’, uhtupkomuy öqalani.
Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, pay nu umum sivikimi pákiniqey pas suhtaq’ewa, hikis nu umum mokniqeyu.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Nu ūmi súaṅqawni, Peter: Pay ason pas um pāyis nuy qa tuwi’taqey paṅqawhq, pu’ taqakowāko töqtini.
Pu pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ura nu umuy sīvat‐nit, pu tukput‐nit, pu totsit qa kiwisk̇ahk̇aṅwyaniqat aṅqe’ ayata. Noqw uma hihta haqtota? Noqw puma paṅqaqwa: Qa hihtaa.
Pahsat pu pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Taay, nīk̇aṅw pu’ hapi sivamoktukpuy’taqa put yawmani, pu pay tukpuy’taqa piw put yawmani. Pu sipwuvahpit ṅastanihqa pay pi pösālay huye’, sipwuvahpit túini.
Pi nu umumi paṅqawni: Ura yan pey’ta: Pam qaanhinwisqamuy amumum pohtoylaniwta, yan’i. Noqw soon pam tutuveni qa iqatsiy aṅ aw antsaniwni. Pas antsaa. Noqw tutuvenit aṅ hin nuy lavayhtiqa soon pas hisat yukiltini.
Noqw puma paṅqaqwa: Tutuyqawhqa, itam lȫqmuy sipwuvahpi’yuṅwa. Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pay pahsa’ni.
Pu pam paṅqw yamakt, pay hin hinhtiṅwuqey anhtiqe, tsomot Olivet aqw’a. Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam piw put ámumya.
Pu pam epeq pítuhqe, pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma nānakawne’, qa unaheviwyani.
Pu pam hihsavohaqami hak owat tūvaṅwuniqat, pam pahsavohaqami pumuy amuṅaqw ahpiynihqe, pep tamötswunuptut, nāwaknaqe paṅqawu:
Inaa, pay pi um kurs nāwakne’, um it k̇ānavotpit inuṅaqw ayo távini. Nīk̇aṅw pay qa itunatyay annit, uhtunatyay an um hinhtini.
Noqw ōveqatsit aṅqw hoṅviaya put aw mātaqtiqe, put öqalmaqa.
Noqw pas pam k̇ānavoti’taqe, pahsat pu pas pavan nāwaknaqw, pālaat uṅwat an tutskwami wukotsölölöta.
Pu pam nāwaknaqe, wunuptut, put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi pítu. Noqw puma qahahlayhpit akw māmaṅwuy’qe kurs tokva.
Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hinoqw tōk̇a? Uma yesvat nāwakintotani, taq uma unaheviwyani.
Noqw pam nāt yuaataqw, pay k̇aysiwhqam sinom amumi öki. Noqw i’ hak Judas yan mātsiwhqa sinmuy amutpipo pítuhqe, Jesus awnihqe, tsohtsona. Ura as pam imuy pakwt lȫq sihk̇ay’taqamuy amumum tōnawta.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Judas, ya um nuy tsohtsonaqe, pan nuy Sinot Tiyat nuhtumi mātapni?
Noqw ima Jesus ámumyaqam hiniwhtiqat nanaptaqe, put aw paṅqaqwa: Tutuyqawhqa, ya itam sipwuvahpit akw rohomhtotini?
Noqw pumuy amuṅaqw haqawa God awwat mohpeq moṅwit tūwikiyat wuvahtaqe, putvaqwat naqvuyat tuku.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Hapi, pay pahsa’ni. Pu pam put naqvuyat aw tóṅokqe qalaptsina.
Pahsat pu Jesus God mohpeq momṅwituy amumi paṅqawu, pu God kīyat ep solāwamomṅwituy amumi‐nik̇aṅw, pu wukw’a’yatuy put aw ö́kihqamuy amumii: Ya uma aṅqaqw hakiy uyiṅwut awyaqe, ōviy pas piw sipwuvahpi’k̇ahk̇aṅw, pu murikhoy’wisa? kita.
Himu pi nu nāqavo God kīyat ep umumum hinnumqw, uma nuy qa ṅuaya? Noqw pay pu’ hapi uma qatalpuve hintsatskiwhqat hinhtotiniqw umuṅem qeniti.
Pahsat pu puma put ṅuayaqe, pahpiy wikyaqe, God awwat susmohpeq moṅwit kīyat ep wikvaya. Noqw Peter yāvaq put aṅk hinma.
Noqw puma ihk̇aqe aw nö́yakiwtaqat nāsave qöhyaqe aw yesvaqw, Peter amumum qatuptu.
Noqw hak māna tūwiki put qȫhit aqlap qatuqw túwahqe, put aw taynumt paṅqawu: I’ tāqa piw put ámuma.
Noqw pam put qa nakwhaqe paṅqawu: Wuhti, nu put qa tuwi’ta.
Pu ahpiy hihsavoniqw, piw suhk̇a put túwahqe paṅqawu: Pay um piw pumuy amumi tōnawta. Noqw Peter paṅqawu: Tāqa, qa hin pi.
Noqw ahpiy k̇a tāwat aṅqe’ sūs qöniltiqw, piw suhk̇a pas qa nánahtsopk̇aṅw paṅqawu: Pay pi pas suyan i’ piw put ámuma. Oviy pi pam Galileet aṅqw sino.
Noqw Peter paṅqawu: Tāqa, nu uṅ hiṅqawhq qa māmatsi. Noqw pahsat pay nāt pam yuaataqw, taqakowāko töqti.
Noqw Tutuyqawhqa namtökt, Peter aw tātayi. Noqw Peter Tutuyqawhqat lavayiyat u’na, ura pam put aw paṅqawu: Nāt taqakowāko qa tōqtiqw, um nuy qa tuwi’taqey pāyis paṅqawni.
Noqw Peter paṅqw yámakqe nāvakhuruhta.
Noqw tahtaqt Jesus ṅuy’yuṅqam put aw tututsiwya, pu wuvalalwa.
Pu puma hihta akw put pos’uhtayaqe taywayat wuvalalwak̇ahk̇aṅw, tūviṅlalwaqe paṅqaqwa: Kurs paṅqawuu. Ya hak uṅ wuvahta?
Pu puma hīhin pu ehpewi qalomáyuaatota.
Pu ōviy panis tālawvaqw, sinmuy amuṅaqw wukw’a’yat‐niqw, pu God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu tutavot tutuqaynayaqam sumitsovaltiqw, Jesus pumuy amumi wīkiwa.
Noqw puma put tūviṅtotaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Kurs itamuy āawnaa. Ya um pas antsa God aṅqw moṅw’asi’taqa? Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu umuy āawnaqw, soon uma tūtuptsiwani.
Pu kurs nu as piw tuwat umuy hihta tūviṅtaqw, soon uma nuy āawnayani, piw soon uma nuy mātapyani.
Noqw yahpiy haqahpiy nu’ Sinot Tiat God Sus’öqaltutuyqawhqat putvaqe qátuni.
Pahsat pu puma sohsoyam paṅqaqwa: Um pa God Tíata! Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma súaṅqaqwa.
Pahsat pu puma paṅqaqwa: Ya hinoqw pas nāto piw hak hin hihta tsok̇anani? Pi itam hapi pas nāp moayat ahpiy put nanapta.
Pahsat pu pep tsovawtaqam sohsoyam hoṅvaqe, pep tutskwat ep moṅwi Pilate yan mātsiwhqat aw Jesus wikya.
Pu puma put hīhihta nēveltotoynayaqe paṅqaqwa: Itam it aw nanaptaqw, itamuy Jew‐sinmuy nukushintsahtsana; pu itam hihta aṅ sivit Caesar aw qa ōoyyaniqat itamumi paṅqawlawu, yaw pam pas nāp moṅw’asi’taqey paṅqawlawhqe ōviy’o.
Noqw Pilate put tūviṅtaqe aw paṅqawu: Ya um Jew‐sinmuy moṅwiam? Noqw pam hu’waqe, aw paṅqawu: Um súaṅqawu.
Pahsat pu Pilate God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy‐nik̇aṅw pu sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay kurs i’ qa haqam hihta ep qaanhti.
Noqw pahsat pu pas puma qa tūtuqayyaqe paṅqaqwa: Noqw pi pam sinmuy hin u’naṅwna, nihqe ahsupoq Jew‐sinmuy amuhpa’ tūtutuqaynatinuma, Galileet aṅqw hoyóyoykuk̇aṅw pew pahsavoo.
Noqw Pilate put navotqe, tūviṅta sen pam Galileet aṅqwnihqata.
Noqw kurs pam Herod moṅwvihk̇ayat aṅqwnihqat navotqe, āpiy pay Herod aw put hōna, pam piw ephaqam Jerusalem ep qatuqw ōviy’o.
Noqw Herod Jesus aw yórikqe, pas hinhaqam hahlayhti, pam as hisat put aw yórikniqey nāwaknaqe ōviy’o. Pam pi put hīhihta hintsakq navotqe, sakiqw as pam hihta k̇ātumaltaqw aw yórikniqey wūwanta.
Pahsat pu pam put hīhihta tūviṅlawu. Noqw pay Jesus pas qa lavayhti.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit, tutavot tutuqaynayaqamuy amumum aṅ hoṅk̇ahk̇aṅw, a’nö put hihta nēveltotoynaya.
Noqw Herod‐niqw pu sōlawamat put qahihtatotaqe, aw tututsiwya; nihqe hihta lolmat yuwsinayat, ahoy Pilate aw lālayya.
Noqw ep talöṅnit ep Pilate Herod amum nākwatsta, puma as hihta ep nehpew’iwtaqe ōviy’o.
Noqw Pilate God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy, pu sinmuy amumi moṅw’iwyuṅqamuy‐nik̇aṅw, pu sinmuy sohsokmuy tsovalaqe,
Amumi paṅqawu: Uma as it tāqat inumi wikvaya; nihqe yaw pam sinmuy nukushintsahtsanqat inumi paṅqaqwa. Noqw meh, nu umutpik put puprikq, kurs uma put hīhihta nēveltoynayaqw pas qa panta.
Pas qae, pu Herod pīw pan tuwa. Pi nu umuy put aw hōna. Noqw meh, pay kurs pam qa haqam hihta mokiwuy hihk̇ay’taqat hinhti.
Pay nu ōviy put a’nö wuvahtat, mātapni.
Put nōviwhqat ep pam pas pay soon hihtawat pumuy amumi qa mātapṅwunihqe ōviy pan lavayhti.
Noqw puma sūsaq sáakmaqe paṅqaqwa: It ayo tūvat, itamumi Barabbas mātavii, kitota.
(I’ Barabbas as kīve sinmuy qaunáṅwtalawnaqe, hakiy nīna. Nihqe ōviy sivikimi tūviwa.)
Pahsat pu ōviy Pilate as Jesus mātapniqey nāwaknaqe, piw sinmuy amumi yuaayku.
Noqw puma sáakmaqe paṅqaqwa: Nahoylehtsit aw múaa, nahoylehtsit aw núaa.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi pu’ pāyis paṅqawu: Ya hínoq’ö? Ya pam hihta qalomáhinhtiqw ōviy’o? Pay pi nu qa hihta mokiwuy hihk̇ay’taqat put aw tuwa. Pay nu ōviy wuvahtat mātapni.
Noqw pay puma pas tönay aṅqe’ sa’taqe, pay pam pas nahoylehtsit aw muiwniqat nānawakna. Noqw sinom God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy amumum sáakmaqe, nawis’ew tūtuyqawvaya.
Noqw pahsat pu ōviy pumuy hin nānawaknaqw pantaniqat Pilate pan yuku.
Pahsat pu pam it hakiy sinmuy qaunáṅwtalawnaqe hakiy nīnaqe sivikimi tūviwtaqat mātavi, sinmuy hin nānawaknaqat pan’i. Nit pam Jesus pumuy tunatyayamuy anhtiniqe amumi put noa.
Noqw puma Jesus pahpiy wikk̇ahk̇aṅw, hakiy Simon Cyrene aṅqw sino tutskwaṅahaqaqw pitutoqat ṅuayaqe, put nahoylehtsit īkwiltoynaya, Noqw pam Jesus aṅk put īkwiwta.
Noqw sinom qaan’ewakw hintaqam Jesus aṅkya, pu hakim momoyam put aṅk ókiwa kitiwisk̇ahk̇aṅw, tsaykiwisa.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi namtökt paṅqawu: Uma Jerusalem aṅqw momoyamu, uma qa inuṅem tsaykitani; uma nenṅem, pu umuhtimuy amuṅem tsaykitanik̇ahk̇aṅwo.
Taq meh, nāto aw pituqw, pu’ sinom paṅqaqwani: Naspi haqawat aṅ qa tílalwaqamu; pu ṅaspi haqawat qa hisat nö’yiltotiqamu, pu pīhuy akw qa hakiy yōyoṅnayaqamu.
Pep pu sinom tuhtukwimi paṅqawtivayani: Itamumi sahpukuu; pu tsotsmot aw paṅqaqwani: Itamuy āmaa, kītotani.
Kurs puma soñawnen himutskit nāto qehput yan hintsatsnat, puyaw tis lakput hintsatsnani?
Noqw hakim lȫyöm hihta ep qaanhtiqam nīniwniqe put amum wīkiwa.
Pu ōviy puma haqami, Calvary yan mātsiwhqat, aw ö́kihqe, pep put nahoylehtsit aw muaya, pu hihta ep qaanhtiqamuy pīwu, suhk̇a put putvaqewatniqw pu suhk̇a put suyvaqewata.
Pahsat pu Jesus paṅqawu: Inaa, pay um okiw it yantaqat pumuy amuhpiy ayo yúkuni, puma hintsatsk̇aqey qa mātsi’yuṅqw ōviy’o. Noqw puma put yuwsiyat nāhoy o’yaqe, put ōviy nanavö’ya.
Noqw sinom hoṅk̇ahk̇aṅw aw tāyuṅwa. Noqw momṅwit nuhtum put aqw tutsiwhiṅqaqwaqe paṅqaqwa: Pam pētuy ayo oya, pu’ pi nāp ayo nātapnik̇aṅwo. Kurs pas pay pam God aṅqw moṅw’asi’taqa namorstiwhqanen ayo nātapni.
Noqw solāwam piw nuhtum put aw tututsiwyak̇ahk̇aṅw put awyaqe vinegar put mamqaya,
Paṅqawk̇ahk̇aṅwo: Kurs pay um pas Jew‐sinmuy moṅwíamnen um ayo nātapni.
Noqw put atsva himu pey’ta, Greek‐sinmuy‐nik̇aṅw, pu Latin‐sinmuy‐nik̇aṅw, pu Hebrew‐sinmuy penhtuwiyamuy akw’a. Noqw yan hapi pey’ta: I’ HAPI JEW‐SINMUY MOṄWIAMU.
Noqw qaanhtiqam put amum hāyiwtaqamuy amuṅaqw suhk̇a put aw tutsíwhiṅqawlawhqe paṅqawu: Kurs pay pas um Christ‐nen, um ayo nātapni, pu itamuyu.
Noqw pay suhk̇awa put u’nanaqe aw paṅqawu: Puyaw pay um God pas qa mamqasi? Susmataq pi um pay put an mokniqat uṅem yukuya.
Itam pi pay a’tsipnaqe pay itahhintsakpiy ahsatiyat ömahta. Noqw i’ tāqa pas qa haqam hihta ep qaanhti.
Pu pam Jesus aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, ason um moṅw’iwk̇aṅw ahoy pite’, okiw nuy u’nani.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Nu ūmi pas antsa paṅqawni: Pay pu’ it tālat ep um inumum lomaqatsit ep nātuwiwni.
Noqw tāwanasavehaqam tūwaqatsit aṅ ahsupoq qatālawva, tāwat atvelpetiqat aw pahsavoo.
Noqw tāwa qatālawva, noqw God kīyat ep mötsáp’uhtsi nāsavaqe tsīki.
Noqw Jesus a’nö hiṅqawhqe paṅqawu: Inaa, nu ihikwsiy uhmapqölmiq mātavi. Yan pam hiṅqawht, sohsok hikwsu.
Noqw solāwamoṅwi hin hiniwhtiqat aw yórikqe, God pas hihtataqe paṅqawu: Pay kurs pas as antsa i’ tāqa súanta.
Noqw sohsoyam sinom pep hiniwhtiqat aw yórikyaqe, tawitsqay wuvahtiwisk̇ahk̇aṅw, paṅqw ahoy ninma.
Noqw sohsoyam put tuwimat‐niqw pu momoyam Galileet aṅqw put ámumyaqam yāvaqw hoṅk̇ahk̇aṅw, īit aw tāyuṅwa.
Noqw piw hak tāqa, Joseph yan mātsiwhqa, Aramathaea‐kitsókit ep ki’taqa, sinmuy amumi moṅw’iwta. Pam hak tāqa lolma, piw súantaqe, nuhtum God moṅwtunatyayat kwaṅwtoynak̇aṅw nuhtayta. Pam hak momṅwituy pasiwniyamuy, pu hintsakpiyamuy ep qa amumum pan yuki’ta.
<range>
I’ hak Pilate awnihqe Jesus tokoyat put aw tuhtui.
Nihqe pam put hawnaqe, tusaqtontsatsakwmötsaput akw put mok̇ahta; nit put haqam owatpelpe tuamqölot ep put tavi. Pay qa hak hisat pep tuamhqölöt ep nāto taviwa.
Noqw ep nasuṅwintalöṅnit aw totok̇ay’yuṅwa.
Noqw piw ima momoyam Jesus amum Galileet aṅqw ö́kihqam put aṅkyaqe, tuamhqölöt aw yórikya, pu put tokoyat hin taviwhqata.
Pu puma ninmaqe, hihta hovaqtuqat, pu ṅaṅhut na’sastota; nit nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep nāsuṅwni’yuṅwa, Moses nuhtumi hin tutaptaqat pan’i.
Noqw Sundayt aw pituqw ima momoyam suits talavay tūamit aqwya hīhihta kwaṅwáhovaqtuqat na’sastotaqey kiwisk̇ahk̇aṅwo. Noqw haqawat pumuy amumumya.
Noqw kurs tūamit aṅqw owa ayo mūmaniwhq, puma pantaqat tutwa.
Noqw puma aqw yuṅqe, Tutuyqawhqat Jesus tokoyat qa tutwa.
Noqw puma kurs hinhtotiniqw nāto panyuṅqw, hakim lȫyöm tāqat tālawṅway’taqat yuwsi’k̇aṅw pumuy amuqlap wunuwta.
Noqw puma tsātsawnaqe, tutskwami yōkoltotiqw, tāqat pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hinoqw so’pumuy amuhpa’ hakiy taytaqat hepnumya?
Pam qa yep’e, pam tātayhqe, ahoy qatuptu. Pay ura pam nāt Galileet epnihqe umumi pan lavayhtiqe,
Paṅqawu: Nu’ Sinot Tiat hapi pas pay soon qa qaanhinwisqamuy öqalayamuy aw noiwni, nen nahoylehtsit aw muiltini. Nit pāyis tālat ep nu ahoy tātayni.
Noqw puma put lavayiyat u’naya,
Nihqe tūamit aṅqw áhoyyaqe, pakwt sūkw sihk̇ay’taqamuy Jesus aw nánatuwnayaqamuy sohsok īit āawnaya, pu ahpiy put kwātsmuyatuy sohsokmuyu.
Noqw i’ Mary Magdala‐kitsókit aṅqwnihqa, pu Joana‐niqw, pu James yuat Mary‐niqw pu haqawat momoyam pumuy amumumyaqam ayaiwyuṅqamuy īit āawnaya.
Noqw púmuyniqw pumuy lavayiam an’eway hímuu. Noqw pumuy lavayiyamuy qa tūtuptsiwa.
Pahsat pu Peter wunuptut, tuamit aw wari; nihqe aqw motoltiqe, tusaqtontsatsakwmötsaput pay nāp sup óyihqat tuwa. Nihqe pam paṅqw ahpiynihqe, pep hin hiniwhtiqat aw wūwanma.
Noqw ep talöṅnit ep pumuy amuṅaqw hakim lȫyöm Emmaus‐kitsókit aqw’a. Pam Jerusalem aṅqw navay tutskwatuwanit pahsavohaqamo.
Noqw puma sohsok īit hiniwhtiqat nāmi yuaatima.
Noqw ōviy nāto puma nāmi yuaatimaqe aṅ wūwanmaqw, Jesus pas nāp pumuy amumi pítuhqe, pahpiy pumuy amumuma.
Noqw pay puma put qa māmatsniqat ōviy puma pos’uhtsiltiqat panta.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hihta pas nāmi yuaatimaqe, pas qahahlayk̇aṅw kwilalata?
Noqw suhk̇a, Cleopas yan mātsiwhqa, put hu’waqe aw paṅqawu: Pas um k̇a nāla Jerusalem ep kiyavaqvinihqe pep pu’ hiniwhtiqat qa navoti’ta.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya himu hiniwhti? Noqw puma put aw paṅqawu: Itam hakiy Jesus Nazareth aṅqwnihqat yuaatima. Pas as pam God lavay’ayaata; God atpip‐nik̇aṅw pu sohsokmuy sinmuy amutpik hihta qaöwíhintsaki, piw a’nö lay’taqat lavayi’ta.
Noqw ima God awwat mohpeq momṅwit‐niqw, pu itahmomṅwit put mokiwuy hihk̇ay’taqat paṅqaqwaqe, tutskwat ep moṅwit aw put noayaqw, nahoylehtsit aw put muaya.
Noqw itam put aw yanyuṅqw, sakiqw pay k̇a as pam hak ura Israel‐sinmuy Rome‐sinmuy amuṅaqw mātapniqat itam pan wūwantota. Noqw piw pi it yaniwhtiqat atsva pu’ pāyis tāla.
Pu piw pi ōviy hakim itamuṅaqw momoyam pas itamuy hin unaṅwtoynaya. Puma suits talavay pam haqam taviwhqat ep ö́kihqe,
Yaw put tokoyat qa tutwaqey itamuy āawnaya. Pu yaw puma ōṅaqw hoṅvia’yatuy tūawtotaqw, yaw pam qátuhqat puma pumuy amumi paṅqawu.
Noqw haqawat itamuṅaqw tūamit aw haqamiyaqe momoyam hin lavaytaqat pan yórikya, Nīk̇aṅw Jesus pay puma qa aw yórikya.
Pahsat pu pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Is uma ṅasta wuwni’taqamu. Uma sȫwu God lavay’aymuyatuy lavayiyamuy sohsok tuptsiwni’taniqey qa pan unaṅwti!
Puyaw pay nawus Christ soon qa mohti īit hihta aṅ kānavot, pep pu’ pas hímuniwhtini?
Pu pam Moses lavayiyat aṅqw hoyóyoykuqe, God lavay’amuyatuy lavayiyamuy pumuy navotna. Pu tutuvenit aṅ pam hin lavayhtiwhqey sohsok pam pumuy amumi namtöminta.
Noqw puma haqami kitsókit awyaqey aw hayiṅwnayaqw, pay pam yūmosaniqey anhti.
Noqw puma put aw öqaltiqe, aw paṅqawu: Pay um itamum huruhtinik̇aṅwo. Taq pi pay tapkiwmaqw nuṅwu pay pas hísatniqti. Noqw pam amumum huruhtiniqe aw paki.
Noqw ōviy pam pumuy amumum tunösvoñat aw qatuptut, pölavikit kwusut, put ep hahlayhtit, yōhat, pumuy maqa.
Noqw pumuy pōsiam tālawvaqw, puma put māmatsi. Noqw pay pam pumuy amuhpiy haqami kurs hiniwhti.
Noqw puma nāmi paṅqawu: Pi ōviy itamuy aṅqwyaqw pam itamumi yuaatimaqe, itamumi tutuvenit namtöminmaqw, pas itam hin unaṅway’ma!
Noqw puma pahsat pay wunuptut, ahoy Jerusalem aqwnihqe pakwt sūkw sihk̇ay’taqamuy tsovawtaqw, pumuy amumi pitu, pu hakimuy pumuy amumumyaqamuy amumii.
Noqw puma pumuy amumi paṅqaqwa: Pay kurs Tutuyqawhqa pas antsa ahoy tātayhqe, Simon aw namtakna.
Noqw pahsat pu ima lȫyöm tuwat pumuy Emmaus aqwniqw, hin hiniwhtiqat pumuy āawna, pu hin puma Jesus māmatsqeyu, pam pölavikit yōhaq’ö.
Noqw pumuy nāt yan yuaatotaqw, Jesus pas nāp pumuy amuhsonve wunuptuqe, amumi paṅqawu: Nam uma kwakwhat yēsee.
Noqw puma wuhpukyat, tsātsawnaqe, pay tūawtotaqey wūwaya.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hinoqw hin unaṅway’yuṅwa? Uma hinoqw umuh’unaṅwpeq hin wūwantota?
Huvam imay, ikukuy enaṅ aw yórikyaa. Pi pay nūu. Inumi hintsatsnat nanaptaa. Hakiy hikwsiat pi qa tokoy’taṅwu, piw qa ȫqay’taṅwu. Noqw uma nuy pantaqat aw tāyuṅwa.
Yan pam lavayhtit, amumi lȫvaq may, pu kuhkuy mahtakna.
Noqw nāt puma hahlayhtotiqe qa tūtuptsiwaqe wūwantotaqw, pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma qa hihta yep nōvay’yuṅwa?
Noqw puma hihsakw pakiwhtuhpet momospalat enaṅ put maqaya.
Noqw pam put kwúsuhqe, pumuy amuhpewi put tūmoyta.
Pahsat pu pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ura nu nāto umumumnihqe yan umumi lavayhti: Moses tutavoyat aṅ hin nuy lalvayhqa soon qa antani, pu God lavay’aymuyatuy lavayiyamuy aṅ’a, pu Tātawit aṅ’a, ura nu kita. Noqw yan hapi ilavayi aw antsaniwa.
Pahsat pu pam pumuy wūwniyamuy tālawnaqe, tutuvenit pumuy māmatsna;
Nihqe amumi paṅqawu: Yan hapi pey’ta. Noqw ōviy pay Christ nawus soon qa pan k̇ānavot, pu mokt, pu pāyis talq mokiwuy aṅqw ahoy tātayni.
