Noqw nu yan umumi tutaptani: Uma nānami unaṅway’yuṅwni, pas nuy hin umumi unaṅway’taqat pan’i.
Kurs hak tāqa kwatsmuy amuṅem qatsiy tave’ suyan pi pam pumuy amumi pas pavan unaṅway’taqe ōviy panhtini. Noqw qa hak put tāqat epnihqe pas pavan nuhtumi unaṅway’ta.
Uma nuy umumi hin tutaptaqat aṅ hinwise’ ikwátsimyani.
Yahpiy hapi nu pāpu umuy qa tūwiktuṅwantani, taq tūwiki moṅwiy hihta hintsakq put qa navoti’taṅwu. Nīk̇aṅw nu umuy ikwátsimyaqat pan túṅwanta; pi nu Inay aṅqw hihta navotqey umuy sohsok āawna.
Qa uma hapi nuy namorstota, pi nu hapi umuy namorstaqe umuy sinmuy tsovalayaniqat ōviy ayata; noqw tsovalniwyaqam qa hovalniwyani; noqw uma ituṅwniy aw yank̇ahk̇aṅw Inay aw hihta tūviṅtotaqw pam umuy put máqamantani.
Nu umumi yan tutaptani: Uma nānami unaṅway’yuṅwni.
Kurs yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqam umumi qa suhtaq’ewyaqw pay ura puma inumi mohti qa suhtaq’ewyaqat uma u’ni’yuṅwni.
Pi as uma yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisq, pay put aṅ hinwisqam soon umuy qa hahlayyani; noqw uma pi yep qatsit tunatyayat qa aṅ hinwisq nu umuy put aṅqw namorsta; noqw ōviy yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqam umumi qa suhtaq’ewya.
Ura nu umumi lavayhtiqw uma put u’ni’yuṅwni; pay tūwiki moṅwiy epnihqe qa pavan pasniṅwu; noqw kurs sinom nuy okiwsasne’ soon umuy piw qa okiwsasnani; kurs ilavayiy aṅ hinwise’ pay soon piw umuhlavayiy qa aṅ hinwisni.
Nīk̇aṅw pay uma isinomniqw ōviy puma umuy yan hintsatsnani, nuy aṅqw távihqat qa tuwi’yuṅqe ōviy’o.
Pay nu pítuhqe pumuy amumi yuaaykuqw puma inumi qa tuptsiwyaqe qaanhtoti. Kurs puma ilavayiy qa nanapte’ pay soon pas qaanhtotini. Nihqe pu’ hapi puma kurs hihta akw qaanhtipuy tupk̇ayani.
Inumi qa suhtaq’ewnihqa hapi piw Inay aw qa suhtaq’ewa.
Nu pumuy amutpik nihtiwhtaqat k̇ātutmalat hinhti. Qa hak inuhpenihqe hihta k̇ātumalta. Kurs puma itutmalay aw qa yórikye’ pay soon pas qaanhtotini; noqw pi as puma put aw yórikyak̇ahk̇aṅw inumi qa suhtaq’ewya, pu Inay piw aw’i.
Ura pumuy tutuveniyamuy aṅ yan pey’ta: Nuy qa hinhtiqw puma inumi qa suhtaq’ewya, yan’i. Noqw puma hin pey’taqat anhtoti.
Nīk̇aṅw ason nu umumi unaṅwtavi’taqat Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit Inay aṅqw ayataqw, pam hihta pas antsanihqat umuy tutuqaynat, nuy hákiynihqat sinmuy āawnani.
Pu uma piw pas nāp hihta aw yórikyaqey tuawi’yuṅwni, uma yayhniwhqat aṅqaqw inumum hinnumyaqe ōviy’o.
Uma qa hin unaṅwtotiniqat ōviy nu umumi yan lavayhti.
Nāt sinom hihta aw tōnawyuṅqey aṅqw umuy ayo ipwayani; tis pi nāt ōviy puma umuy qöqyaniqat aw pítuni; noqw panhtiqa God eṅem tumaltaqey wūwamantani.
Puma hapi Inay nuy enaṅ qa tuwi’yuṅqe ōviy umuy panhtotini.
Nīk̇aṅw ason hisat aw pituqw ura nu umuy aṅwu pay put āawnaqat uma u’nayaniqw ōviy nu umumi yan lavayhti, náwuspi nāt nu umumumnihqe ōviy qa mohtihaq umumi īit yuaayku.
Noqw pu’ hapi nu Inay nuy aṅqw távihqat ahoy awni. Noqw uma qa haqawat nuy haqaminiqat tūviṅta.
Noqw pay pi nu umumi īit lavayhtiqw ōviy umuh’unaṅwa pas qa hahlayhtoti.
Noqw pay nu umumi pas qaatsat paṅqawni: Pas nuy ahpiyniniqw pam umuṅem lomahintani; pi nuy qa ahpiyniqw umumi Unaṅwtavi’taqa soon umumi pítuni, pi nu ahpiyen aṅqw put umumi távini.
Ason pam pite’ yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqamuy qaanhtotiqat pumuy navotnani, pu hakiy hin suan hinmaqat pumuy māmatsnani, pu God sinmuy hin yukunaniqat amumi mahtaknani.
Pam pumuy inumi qa tuptsiwyaqe qaanhtotiqat pumuy navotnani.
Piw nuy suan hinmaqat pumuy māmatsnani, Inay awnihqat akw’a; noqw uma pāpu inumi qa yórikyani.
Piw God sinmuy hin yukunaniqat amumi mahtaknani, pi pam yep qatsit aw moṅwit pay eṅem yúkuqe pas qahihtata.
Nāt nu nihtiwhtaqat hihta umumi yuaaykuniqw, uma kurs hin nāt put sohsok ömahtotani.
Nīk̇aṅw ason i’ Hikwsi pas antsanihqa pite’, pam sohsok antsanihqat umuy māmatstoynani; pam qa nāp nahpiynihqat yuaataniqee. Pam hihta navote’ put yuaaykumantani, pu pam hīhihta nātoyaniqat umuy āwintani.
Ason pam nuy pas pavan hihtatani, pi pam itutuqayhpiy ömahtat, put umuy āwintani.
Inay tutuqayhpiat sohsoy piw itutuqayhpi, paniqw ōviy nu paṅqawu: Pam ason itutuqayhpiy ömahtat, put umuy āwintani.
Nāt hihsavoniqw pay uma inumi qa yórikyani, pu piw pay hihsavoniqw uma inumi yórikyani, nu Inay awniniqw ōviy’o.
Pahsat pu put aw nánatuwnayaqam haqawat nānami paṅqaqwa: Ya sen pam hihta itamumi lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Nāt hihsavoniqw pay uma inumi qa yórikyani, pu piw pay hihsavoniqw uma inumi yórikyani, pu Nu Inay awniniqw ōviy’o, kita?
Noqw ōviy puma paṅqaqwa: Ya sen pam hihta paṅqawhqe Hihsavoniq’ö, kita? Itam hihta paṅqawhqat aw māmatsya.
Noqw puma as put tūviṅtotaniqey nānawaknaqw Jesus navoti’taqe amumi paṅqawu: Ya nu umumi Pay hihsavoniqw uma inumi qa yórikyani, pu piw pay hihsavoniqw uma inumi yórikyani, kítahqat uma nātuviṅlalwa?
Pas antsaa, pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Nāt uma tsaykitani, pu pas hihta ep qahahlayhtotiqey pan hiṅqaqwani; noqw tuwat yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqam hahlayyani, noqw úmawat qahahlayyani; nīk̇aṅw pay umuhqahahlayhpi hahlayhpiniwhtini.
Wuhti tihtatutuyne’ qahahlayṅwu, tuwaniyat aw pítuṅwuniqw ōviy’o; nīk̇aṅw ason pam tihte’ pahsat k̇ānavotpiy pāpu qa u’ni’taṅwu, sino tūwaqatsit aw tihtiwhq put ep hahlayṅwunihqe ōviy’o.
Noqw pan uma qahahlayyani; nīk̇aṅw pay nu nāt piw umumi pohtani, noqw umuh’unaṅwa hahlayhtotini, pu umuhhahlayhpiy soon himu sohtapnani.
Pu hisat aw pituqw uma soon pāpu nuy hihta tūviṅlawni. Pas antsaa, pas antsa nu umumi paṅqawni: Uma ituṅwniy aw yank̇ahk̇aṅw Inay aw nāp hihta ōviy tūviṅtotaqw pam umuy put máqamantani.
Yuk pahsavo hapi uma qa hisat nāt ituṅwniy aw yank̇ahk̇aṅw hihta ōviy tūviṅtota. Uma aw tūviṅtote’ ömahtotani, nen pas hinhaqam hahlayhtotini.
Yan nu pay tupkiwtaqat umumi yuaayku; ason hisat aw pituqw pep pu’ nu soon pāpu ilavayiy tupkitat, umuy Inay pas suyan āawnani.
Ason pep pu’ uma ituṅwniy aw yank̇ahk̇aṅw hihta ōviy tūviṅlalwani. Noqw nu umuṅem Inay aw tūviṅtaniqey hapi qa paṅqawu;
Pi Ina pas nāp umumi unaṅway’taqw ōviy’o, ispi uma inumi unaṅway’yuṅq’ö, nihqe nu God aṅqw pítuhqat uma tūtuptsiwa.
Nu Inay aṅqw yámakqe, tūwaqatsit aw pitu; nit pu’ nu tūwaqatsit mātapt, Inay awni.
Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put aw paṅqaqwa: Meh, pu’ hapi um pas suyan yuaaykuqe, pāpu qa sómokit lavayhti.
Pu’ hapi itam uṅ sohsok hihta navoti’taqat tūtuptsiwa; noqw soon kurs pas hak sȫwu hihta tūviṅlawni. It akw pu’ itam uṅ God aṅqw pítuhqat tūtuptsiwa.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma pu’ tūtuptsiwa?
Meh, aw hapi pituto, híkis pay aw pitsíwta, uma tatslak̇e’, nanāp umuhkiy aṅhqe nankwuse’, nuy nalmatapyaniqat aw’i. Nīk̇aṅw pay nu qa nālaa, pi Ina inumuma.
Uma inuhpe kwakwhaiwyuṅwniqat ōviy nu umumi yan lavayhti. Uma tūwaqatsit ep k̇ānanvotyani; nīk̇aṅw pay uma su’qawyuṅwni, nu hapi yep qatsit áṅwuta.
Yan Jesus lavayhtit, ōmiq tātayht, paṅqawu: Inaa, aw hapi pitu; um Uhtiy pas hímunihqat pan nuhtumi mātaktani, noqw Uhti tuwat uṅ pan mātaktani.
Pi um Uhtiy sohsokmuy sinmuy amumi öqalat maqa, nihqe hakimuy hihsa’nihqamuy put aw noaqw, pam qatsit qaso’taqat amumi nóaniqat um pan put eṅem yuku.
Noqw hak uṅ pas suhk̇a antsa God‐nihqat tuwi’te’ pu Jesus Christ uhpiy taviwhqat piw tuwi’te’ qatsit qaso’taqat himuy’vani.
Nu tūwaqatsit ep uṅ pas hímunihqat nuhtumi mātakta; um nuy hihta tumalat ayataqat hapi nu yuku.
Noqw taay, Inaa, ura tūwaqatsit nāt qa háqamniqw nu úmumnihqe lolmat tālawṅwat pitsáṅway’ta. Noqw ōviy nu ūmi pituqw um piw pan nuy lomavitsaṅwtoynani.
Um sinmuy amuṅaqw hakimuy inumi noaqw nu uṅ hákiynihqat pumuy āawna; puma as úhimumyaqw um pumuy inumi noa, noqw puma uhlavayiy aṅ hinwisa.
Nihqe um hihta inumi noaqw pam sohsoy ūṅaqwnihqat puma nanapta.
Pi um it lavayit inumi mātapq nu amumi put mātavi; noqw puma put ömahtota, nihqe nu ūṅaqw yámakqat pas suyan nanaptaqe pay um pas nuy aṅqw távihqat tūtuptsiwa.
Nu pumuy amuṅem okiw nāwakinta; nu yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqamuy qa pumuy amuṅem nāwakinta; um hakimuy inumi noaqw nu pumuy amuṅem nāwakinta, puma uhsinomniqw ōviy’o.
Noqw sohsoyam isinom uhsinomu, pu sohsoyam uhsinom isinomu, noqw nu amuhpiy pas hímuniwhti.
Noqw nu hapi pāpu qa tūwaqatsit ep hinnuma, noqw ima nāt tūwaqatsit epya; noqw nu yaṅqw ūmii. Qahováriwhpu Inaa, um hakimuy inumi nóahqey pumuy pas nāp uhtuṅwniy öqalayat akw oyi’tani, noqw puma sūk̇ayani, itamuni.
Nu nāt tūwaqatsit ep pumuy amumum hinnumqe uhtuṅwniy aṅ pumuy oyi’ta; um hakimuy inumi noaqw nu pumuy pās oyi’taqw qa himuwa haqami hiniwhti, pay i’ súlawhtiniqey namorstiwhqa‐saa, hin pey’taqat anhtiniqat ōviy’o.
Noqw nu yahsatniqw yaṅqw ūmii, nihqe okiw pas pay imuy unaṅwpeq ihahlayhpiy aniwni’yuṅwniqat ōviy nu tūwaqatsit ep yan hiṅqawlawu.
Nu amumi uhlavayiy mātavi, noqw yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqam pumuy amumi qa suhtaq’ewya, puma qa yep sinoiwyuṅqw ōviy’o, nuy qa pep sinoiwtaqat pan’i.
Um as tūwaqatsit aṅqw pumuy ipwaniqat nu qa pan ūmi tūviṅlawu, um qalolmat aṅqw okiw pumuy ayo oyi’taniqat pan’i.
Puma inún qa yep qatsit ep sinoiwyuṅwa.
Um uhlavayiy pas antsanihqat akw pumuy nēṅem qenivo ōyani; uhlavayi pas antsaa.
Um nuy sinmuy amumi tavi, noqw ōviy pay hapi nu piw pan nuhtumi pumuy ayata.
Nihqe nu pumuy tunatyawk̇aṅw qenivo nātavi, puma as pas antsa piw qenivo oyiwyuṅwniqat ōviy’o.
Pu nu qa ímuy‐sa amuṅem tūviṅlawu, nāt hakim pumuy lavayiyamuy ahpiy inumi tūtuptsiwaniqamuy amuṅem pīwu.
Okiw as puma sohsoyam sūk̇ayaniqat nu tūviṅlawu, um Ina inuhpeniqw pu nu uhpenihqat pan piw itamuhpe sūk̇ayaniqata; noqw pep pu’ tūwaqatsit ep sinom um nuy aṅqw távihqat tūtuptsiwani.
Noqw um hin nuy k̇aptsi’taqw pan piw nuy pumuy k̇aptsi’ta, puma itamun sūk̇ayaniqat ōviy’o.
Nu pumuy amuhpeniqw pu um inuhpee, noqw puma itamuhpe pās pasiwyuṅwni, noqw sinom nanaptaqw um nuy aṅqw tavi, nihqe pas hin inumi unaṅway’taqey pan piw amumi unaṅway’ta.
Inaa, um imuy hakimuy nuy maqaqw puma as nuy háqamnihqat pep inumumyaniqat nu nāwakna, nen it lolmat tālawṅwat um nuy máqahqat puma aw tayyuṅwni, pi um nāt tūwaqatsit qa yukiwhq pay pepeq inumi unaṅway’ta.
Súantaqa Inaa, yep qatsit tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqam uṅ qa tuwi’yuṅwa, noqw nu uṅ tuwi’ta, noqw ima hapi um nuy aṅqw távihqat navoti’yuṅwa.
Noqw nu hapi uṅ pumuy āawna. Noqw okiw as um inumi hin unaṅway’taqw pan hapi pumuy nānami unaṅway’yuṅwniqat ōviy nu soon nāt qa uṅ pumuy āwintani. Nen nu pas antsa amuhpe yantani.
Yan Jesus lavayhtit put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy tsamk̇aṅw pahpiy nakwsuqw, puma haqe’ sik̇a Cedron yan mātsiwhqat yupqöymi nöṅa; noqw pam haqami olive qölmi pítuhqe, put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumum paṅso paki.
Noqw put momṅwituy amumi mātapqa Judas piw put háqamnihqat tuwi’ta, Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy tsamk̇aṅw qa sūs paṅsoniṅwuniqw ōviy’o.
Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit Pharisee‐sinmuy amumum tuwalan’a’yatuy hoṅvia’yatuy enaṅ Judas aw mātavi; noqw puma wihqöhi’wisk̇aṅw, kopitsoki’wisk̇aṅw, tunipi’wisk̇ahk̇aṅw put amum paṅsoya.
Noqw ōviy Jesus hin hintsaniwniqey sohsok navoti’taqe amumi nakwsuhqe paṅqawu: Ya uma hakiy hepnumya?
Noqw puma lavayhtotiqe aw paṅqaqwa: Itam hakiy Nazareth aṅqw tāqa Jesus hepnumya. Noqw Jesus amumi paṅqawu: Nu’ pam’i. Noqw Judas amumi put mātapqa pumuy amumum wunu.
Noqw pam panis pamnihqey amumi paṅqawhq pahsat pay puma áhoywat hohyok̇at, tutskwami pataṅmunumhti.
Pahsat pu piw pam pumuy tūviṅtaqe amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hakiy hepnumya? Noqw puma paṅqaqwa: Itam hakiy Nazareth aṅqw tāqat Jesus hepnumya.
Jesus lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay pi nu pamnihqey umumi paṅqawu; noqw ōviy kurs uma nuy hepnumye’, uma imuy mātapyani.
Ura pam hiṅqawhq put anhtiniqw ōviy’o, ura pam paṅqawu: Imuy hakimuy um inumi noaqw nu qa hihtawat kwahi, it’a.
Pahsat pu Simon Peter sipwuvahpi’taqe put hóroknat, God awwat mohpeq moṅwit tūwikiyat wuvahtaqe, putvaqw naqvuyat ayo tuku. Noqw i’ hak tūwiki Malchus yan mātsiwa.
Pahsat pu Jesus Peter aw paṅqawu: Uhsipwuvahpiy tukpuyat aqw pánaa. Ina inuṅem okiwsanhpit kuyapkuyhq pay nu soon qa put hikwni.
Pahsat pu sohsoyam tuwalan’a’yam‐niqw pu moṅwíam, hoṅviaymuyatuy amumum Jesus ṅuayaqe put somya;
Nit mohti Annas aw put wikya, pam pi Caiphas möönaṅwuy’ta; noqw Caiphas put yahsaṅwuy ep God awwat mohpeq moṅw’iwta.
I’ Caiphas hapi ura Jew‐sinmuy amumi paṅqawu pay ura hak sūk̇a sinmuy amuṅem mokq pam ṅas’ewniqata.
Noqw Simon Peter Jesus aṅki, pu suhk̇a put aw nánatuwnaqa; pamwat God awwat mohpeq moṅwit tuwi’ta; nihqe pam Jesus amum God awwat mohpeq moṅwit kīyat aw paki.
Noqw Peter pay hötsíwat ihpaq wunu. Noqw pahsat pu suhk̇a Jesus aw nánatuwnaqa God awwat mohpeq moṅwit tuwi’taqa yámakqe, hötsíwat aw tunatyawtaqat mānat aw yuaaykuqe Peter pana.
Pahsat pu māna hötsíwat aw tunatyawtaqa Peter aw paṅqawu: Ya qa um piw it tāqat aw nánatuwnaqa? Noqw pam paṅqawu: Qae.
Noqw iyohooniqw, ōviy tūtuwikt hoṅvia’yatuy amumum tövumsit hoveyelayaqe aw hoṅk̇ahk̇aṅw nāmukintota. Noqw Peter pumuy amumum aw wunuwk̇aṅw nāmukinta.
Pahsat pu God awwat mohpeq moṅwi Jesus tūviṅtaqe put aw nánatuwnayaqam hákimyaqat put tūviṅta, pu hihta pam pumuy tutuqaynaqata.
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe aw paṅqawu: Nu nuhtumi susmataq yuaata. Nu tsotsvalkive sutsep tutuqayna, pu God kīyat ep’e, paṅso Jew‐sinom sutsep tsotsvalya; nu qa hihta nanauyve lavayhti.
Noqw um hinoqw nuy tūviṅlawu? Nu hihta yuaaykuqat um inumi tūqayyuṅqamuy tūviṅtanik̇aṅwo; meh, puma nuy hiṅqawhq navoti’yuṅwa.
Noqw yan pam lavayhtiqw, pu suhk̇a hoṅiaya put aqlap wúnuhqa mapqölöy akw Jesus wuvahta, paṅqawk̇aṅwo: Ya um hinoqw God awwat mohpeq moṅwit aw panhaqam hiṅqawu?
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Pay pi kurs nuy qalolmat lavayhtiqw um put paṅqawni; kurs pay nuy súaṅqawhq ya um hinoqw nuy wuvahta?
Noqw Annas put somt, God awwat mohpeq moṅwit Caiphas aw hōna.
Noqw Simon Peter pep wunuwk̇aṅw nāmukinta; noqw haqawat pep hoṅqam put aw paṅqaqwa: Ya qa um piw put aw nánatuwnaqa? Noqw pam qa nakwhaqe paṅqawu: Qae.
Noqw haqawa God awwat mohpeq moṅwit tūwikiat Peter aw paṅqawu: Puyaw qa um oliveqölpe put ámumniqw nu ūmi qa tātayi? Pam hapi Malchus aṅqwvi, it hakiy naqvuyat Peter ayo tukuqw put’a.
Pahsat pu Peter piw nāt qa nakwha, noqw pahsat pay taqakowako töqti.
Pahsat pu puma Caiphas aṅqw Jesus haqami Rome aṅqw moṅwit kīyat aw wikya; noqw súitsi; noqw puma pay moṅwkimi qa yuña, taq k̇a Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwhqat aṅqw nȫnösaniqey qa hu’waniwyani.
Pahsat pu Rome aṅqw moṅwi Pilate yan mātsiwhqa yámakqe amumi paṅqawu: Ya uma hihta it nēveltotoynaya?
Noqw puma lavayhtotiqe aw paṅqaqwa: Pay pi as i’ tāqa qa nukpananiqw soon itam ūmi put wikvayani.
Pahsat pu Pilate amumi paṅqawu: Pay pi uma put wikye’ umumi hin tutavot an put yukunayani, kita. Noqw ōviy Jew‐sinom put aw paṅqaqwa: Itam hakiy nīnayaniqey mewniwta.
Ura Jesus hin mokniqey lavayhtiqat anhtiniqw ōviy puma paṅqaqwa.
Pahsat pu Pilate piw pavasiwhkimi pakit, Jesus wáṅwayhqe aw paṅqawu: Ya um Jew‐sinmuy moṅwiamu?
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe put aw paṅqawu: Ya pay um pas nāp it lavayhti? sen pay hakim nuy pamnihqat uṅ āawnaya?
Noqw Pilate lavayhtiqe aw paṅqawu: Ya nu Jew‐sino? Pi nāp uhsinom God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy amumum uṅ inumi mātapya. Ya um hihta hinhti?
Jesus lavayhtiqe aw paṅqawu: Pay imoṅwtunatya qa yep qatsit ahpiy’o, pi as imoṅwtunatya it qatsit ahpiyniqw soon itumal’a’yam as qa rohomhtotini; noqw nu Jew‐sinmuy amumi qa noiwni; noqw pi imoṅwtunatya qa yaṅq’ö.
Noqw ōviy Pilate put aw paṅqawu: Noqw um moṅwi? Jesus lavayhtiqe aw paṅqawu: Um súaṅqawu. Pi nu yaniqw tihtiwa; nihqe nu it hihta pas antsanihqat tuawi’taniqe ōviy tūwaqatsit aw pitu. Pas antsanihqat aṅ hinwisqam sohsoyam itönay nanaptaṅwu.
Noqw Pilate put aw paṅqawu: Ya himu pas antsaa? Pam kitat, piw Jew‐sinmuy amumi yámakqe, amumi paṅqawu: Pas nu qa haqam qaanhtiqat put aw tuwa.
Noqw pay pi Amutsva Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwhqat aw pituqw nu hakiy umumi mātapmantaniqat uma pan tuwi’yuṅwa. Noqw nu Jew‐sinmuy moṅwíyamuy umumi mātapniqat uma nānawakna?
Pahsat pu puma sohsoyam piw nāt sáakmaqe paṅqaqwa: Qa i’ni, Barabbasni. Noqw i’ Barabbas pi hihta tūnawhkilawu.
Pahsat pu Pilate solāwamuy pan ayataqw puma Jesus haqami wikyaqe wuvahpit akw put qa sūs wuvahtota.
Pahsat pu puma hihta kūtay’taqat kwitetotaqe put wihk̇at yukuyat put Jesus qötösomtoynaya, nit pu hihta palasakwat usimnit put usihtoynayaqe,
Aw paṅqaqwa: Öqawmaṅwu, Jew‐sinmuy moṅwíamu! Pu puma may akw wuvalalwa.
Pu ōviy Pilate piw yámakqe sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Meh, nu hapi qa haqam qaantaqat it aw túwahqe umuy navotnaniqey ōviy nu umumi put hórokna.
Pahsat pu Jesus kūtat akw qötösomiwk̇aṅw palasakwat usimnit usk̇aṅw paṅqw yama. Noqw Pilate umumi paṅqawu: Taa, yep tāqa.
Noqw ōviy God awwat mohpeq momṅwit hoṅvia’yatuy amumum put aw yórikyaqe sáakmaqe paṅqaqwa: Nahoylehtsit aw múaa! Nahoylehtsit aw múaa! Noqw Pilate amumi paṅqawu: Uma pi wikye’ put nahoylehtsit aw muayani, nu pi qa hihta qaantaqat put aw tuwa.
Noqw Jew‐sinom lavayhtotiqe paṅqaqwa: Itam hihta ep yukuyamantaniqe tutavot pasiwyuṅwa; noqw itahtutavoyniqw pi soon pam qa mokni, pam God Tíatnihqey paṅqawhqe ōviy’o.
Noqw ōviy Pilate pan lavayit navotqe pu’ pas maqasti.
Nihqe pavasiwhkimi piw pákihqe Jesus aw paṅqawu: Ya um hak háqaqö’? Noqw Jesus aw qa hiṅqawu.
Pahsat pu Pilate put aw paṅqawu: Noqw ya um inumi qa hinwat lavayhtini? Nu uṅ mātapniqey, sen nahoylehtsit aw muiwniqat uṅem yúkuniqey aw öqalat pasiwta. Ya um qa it navoti’ta?
Noqw Jesus lavayhtiqe aw paṅqawu: Pay as öqalat qa ōṅaqw ūmi noiwhq soon um inumi öqalani. Pantaqw ōviy i’ hak nuy ūmi mātapqa uhpenihqe pas wukoqaanhti.
Pahpiy pu Pilate as put mātapniqey tunatyalti; noqw Jew‐sinom sáakmaqe paṅqaqwa: Um it tāqat mātave’ pay Caesar qa kwātsiatni, hak haqam nāmoṅwlawhqa pan Caesar aqw hiṅqawṅwu.
Noqw ōviy Pilate it navotqe Jesus wikk̇aṅw ihpo yama, nit pu haqam Owaqantupha yan túṅwantiwhqat ep moṅw’atsvewat ep qatuptu, haqam Hebrew‐sinmuy amuhkwanihqe Gabatha yan mātsiwhqat ep’e.
Noqw Amutsava Yūmosanihqat ep nōviwniqat totok̇ay’yuṅwa, noqw tāwanasavehaqamo. Noqw Pilate Jew‐sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Taay, yep umuhmoṅwi!
Noqw puma sáakmaqe paṅqaqwa: Tūvaay, tūvaay! Nahoylehtsit aw múaay! Noqw Pilate amumi paṅqawu: Noqw ya nu umuhmoṅwiy nahoylehtsit aw muiwniqat eṅem yúkuni? Noqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit paṅqaqwa: Itam qa hakiy moṅwí’yuṅwa, pas Caesar‐saa.
Pahsat pu puma put nahoylehtsit aw muayaniqat ōviy pam amumi put mātavi; noqw puma ṅuayaqe ahpiy wikya.
Noqw pam nahoylehtsiy īkwiwk̇aṅw haqami Masqötvihk̇a yan túṅwantiwhqat aw’i; pam Hebrew‐sinmuy amuhkwa Golgotha yan túṅwantiwa.
Pep pu’ puma hakimuy lȫqmuy put enaṅ nahoylehtsit aw muaya, nan’ik̇aqee, noqw Jesus amuhtsavee.
Noqw pam hak hímunihqat Pilate pēnaqe nahoylehtsit atsve mua; noqw yan pey’ta: JESUS NAZARETH AṄQWNIHQA JEW‐SINMUY MOṄWIAMU.
Noqw Jesus haqam nahoylehtsit aw muiwhq pam kīṅaqw qa yāpo; noqw ōviy k̇aysiwhqam Jew‐sinom it atsva yan pey’taqat aṅ tuṅwáya. Noqw pam Hebrew‐sinmuy amuhkwa pey’ta, pu Greek‐sinmuyu, pu Latin‐sinmuyu.
Pahsat pu Jew‐sinmuy amuṅaqw God awwat mohpeq momṅwit Pilate aw paṅqaqwa: Jew‐sinmuy moṅwíamu, um qa yan pēnat, pam Jew‐sinmuy moṅwíamnihqey pam kítahqat um pēnani.
Noqw Pilate lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay pi nu hin pēnaqw pay pi pantani.
Pahsat pu solāwam Jesus nahoylehtsit aw muayaqe yuwsiyat nālövo o’yaqe nāhuyva; noqw ahtöqö’napnaat qa tūihiwtaqe ahsupoq pöqniwta.
Noqw ōviy puma nānami paṅqaqwa: Itam qa tsīk̇ayat, put ōviy nanavö’yani, mātaqpi hak putni, kitota. Yan puma tutuvenit antsanhtota, ura pan pey’ta: Puma iyuwsiy nāhuyvayaqe inapnay ōviy nanavö’ya. Noqw ōviy solāwam panhtoti.
Noqw pep Jesus nahoylehtsiyat aqlap put yuat wunuwta, pu yuyat tupkoat Mary, hakiy Cleopas nȫmaata, noqw pu Mary Magdalene.
Noqw Jesus yuy tuwa, pu put aw nánatuwnaqat pas aw unaṅway pep wúnuwtaqata, nihqe yuy aw paṅqawu: Wuhti, ayam uhtii.
Pahsat pu pam put aw nánatuwnaqat aw paṅqawu: Ayam úṅuu. Noqw pahpiy put aw nánatuwnaqa put kiy aw wīki.
Yantaqat atsva pu’ Jesus tumalay pay sohsok yúkuhqey navoti’taqe paṅqawu: Nu pānaqmoki, kita, hin pey’taqat antaniqw ōviy’o.
Noqw pep tsaqaptat aṅqw ovavala a’nö sik̇a kūyiwta; noqw puma hihta söyatkot put aqw móroknayat, pu himu hisop yan mātsiwhqat kohoyat epeq söṅnayat put moami ītaya.
Pu ōviy Jesus ovavalat aṅ yúkuhqe paṅqawu: Yukilti, kitat yōkoltit sohsok hikwsu.
Noqw ép nasuṅwintalöṅnit pas k̇aptsitiwhqat ep totok̇ay’yuṅwa. Noqw pumuy tokoam nāt nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep nahoylehtsit aṅ hāyiwyuṅwniqat ima Jew‐sinom qa nānawakna. Noqw ōviy puma Pilate awyaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Um as solāwamuy ayataqw, puma hok̇ayamuy qöqhitote’ pumuy haqami hintsatsnani.
Pahsat pu ōviy solāwam ö́kihqe mohti’maqat‐nik̇aṅw pu mitwat put amum nahoylehtsit aw muiltiqat pumuy lȫvaq hok̇ayamuy qöqhitota.
Nit puma Jesus aw ökiqw pay kurs pam mōki, noqw ōviy pay puma put hok̇ayat qa qö́hiknaya.
Nīk̇aṅw suhk̇a solāwa lansay akw put suyvaqewat söhkwiknaqw pahsat aṅqw uṅwa kūyit enaṅ munva.
Noqw nu hapi it aw yori, nihqe hihta navoti’taqey pas suyan tuawi’ta; nu qa atsálawu, noqw uma kurs hin qa tūtuptsiwani.
Hin pey’taqat hapi anhtiniqw ōviy īi yaniwhti, ura yan pey’ta: Qa himuwa put ȫqaat qöhikiwni, yan’i.
Pu piw sutsk̇e’ yan pey’ta: Puma hakiy söhkwiknayaqey aw yórikyani, yan’i.
Yantaqat atsva pu’ hak tāqa Aramatheat aṅqwnihqa Joseph yan mātsiwhqa Pilate awnihqe Jesus tokoyat haqami hintsanniqey put aw maqaptsi’ta; noqw Pilate put hu’wa. Noqw ōviy pam pítuhqe Jesus tokoyat haqami yawma. Pam hak as nuhtum Jesus aw tuptsiwa; nīk̇aṅw Jew‐sinmuy mamqasqe ōviy qa hakiy put āawna.
Noqw pu piw Nicodemus hihta myrrh aloes enaṅ namiqwriwtaqat tsivót‐sikip sunat pututuwanit pahsa’haqam kimak̇aṅw ep pitu. Ura pam hak mohtihaqam míhikiwtaqw Jesus aw pitu.
Pu ōviy puma Jesus tokoyat haqami távihqe kwaṅwáhovaqtuqat tōsit atsva put siwuwuykinat tsatsákwmötsaput linen yan mātsiwhqat akw put mok̇ahta, hin Jew‐sinom hakiy masyuwsinayaṅwuqat pan’i.
Noqw pam haqam nahoylehtsit ep muiltiqat ep himuqölö; noqw pep puhutuamtuhsö; noqw nāt pas qa hak hisat paṅsoq taviwa.
Noqw Jew‐sinom totok̇ay’yuṅqw ōviy puma pep Jesus tavi, pam tuamtuhsö áhayhpniqw ōviy’o.
Noqw Sundayt aw pituqw, suits talavay nāt qa talq, Mary Magdalene tūamit aw’i; noqw kurs owa tūamit aqw ūtsiwtaṅwuqa ayo taviwa.
Pahsat pu pam wárikqe, Simon Peter‐nit pu nuy, Jesus aw unaṅwayat yan túṅwantiwhqat, itamumi paṅqawu: Taq kurs Tutuyqawhqat tūamit aṅqw hóroknaya; nihqe haqami pi put hintsatsna.
Pu ōviy nu Peter amum tūamit aqw wari.
Noqw nu Peter ehpeqtaqe pay mohti paṅso pitu.
Nihqe nu motoltiqe ahpamiq tātayhqe tsatsákwmötsaput ep oyiqw tuwa; nīk̇aṅw pay nu qa aqw paki.
Pahsat pu Simon Peter inuṅk pitu; nihqe tūamit aqw pákihqe, tsatsákwmötsaput ep oyaqw tuwa.
Pu höhönpi put qötöyat akw as mōkiwtaqa pay tsatsákwmötsaput qa enaṅ qatsk̇aṅw pay nāla suphaqam qātsi.
Pahsat pu nu tuwat aqw paki, nihqe nu yórikqe tuptsiwa.
Pam mokiwuy aṅqw pas soon ahoy qa tātayniqat pan pey’taqat nāt itam qa mātsi’yuṅqe ōviy’o.
Pahsat pu itam ahoy paṅqw nima.
Noqw Mary tūamit ihpaq wunuwk̇aṅw okiw pakmumuya; nihqe ōviy pam pan hiṅqawk̇aṅw, motoltit, tūamit aqw yori;
Nihqe hakimuy lȫqmuy hoṅviayatuy qȫtsat yuwsi’taqamuy pepeq qatuqw tuwa, haqe’ Jesus tokoat as qatsqat pep suhk̇a qötöveniqw, pu suhk̇a kukveq’a.
Noqw puma hakim put aw paṅqawu: Wuhti, ya um hinoqw pakmumuya? Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: Ispi kurs puma Itutuyqawhqay haqami hintsatsnaqe, haqam put taviyaqw nu qa navoti’taqe ōviy’o.
Yan pam hiṅqawht, ahoy namtökk̇aṅw Jesus pep wunuqw tuwa; nit pam Jesus‐niqw qa māmatsi.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Wuhti, ya um hinoqw pakmumuya? Ya um hakiy hepnuma? Noqw pay pam ūyit tumalay’taqanihqat pam wūwahqe aw paṅqawu: Tāqa, kurs um put haqami hintsane’, um haqam put távihqey nuy āawnani; noqw nu haqami hintsanni.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Mary. Noqw pam aw namtökt, put aw paṅqawu: Rabboni, kita. (Pam Tūtutuqaynaqa i’nihqe pam’i.)
Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Um nuy qa ṅuṅ’ani, taq nu nāt Inay aw qa wūvi. Um itupkomuy amuminen amumi paṅqawni: Nu God Inay aw wupni, pu pay pam piw Umunaa, pu Umuhtutuyqawhqa.
Noqw Mary Magdalene Tutuyqawhqat aw yórikqey put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi tūawva, pu pam yan put aw lavayhtiqata.
Noqw ép Sundayt ep tapkiqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam haqam tsovawtaqe, okiw Jew‐sinmuy mamqasyaqe ōviy hötsíwhpa’ uhtsi’yuṅqw, Jesus pítuhqe, amuhsonve wunuwk̇aṅw paṅqawu: Uma kwakwhat unaṅway’yuṅwni.
Yan pam lavayhtit, tokoy haqami söhkwiknayaqat pumuy amumi mahtakna may énaṅa. Noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam Tutuyqawhqat aw yórikyaqe hahlayhtoti.
Pahsat pu Jesus piw amumi paṅqawu: Uma kwakwhat unaṅway’yuṅwni. Nu hapi hin Inay nuy ayataqat pan piw tuwat umuy aṅqe’ ayata.
Yan pam lavayhtit, amumi hikwsut paṅqawu: Huvam Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit kwusuyaa.
Uma hakiy qaanhtipuyat ayo yukuyaqw pam ayo yukiwṅwu; pu uma hakiy qaanhtipuyat qa ayo yukiwniqat paṅqaqwaqw pam qa ayo yukiwṅwu.
Noqw imuy pakwt lȫq sihk̇ay’taqamuy amuṅaqw hak Thomas, Didimus yan túṅwantiwhqa, qa amumumniqw Jesus pitu.
Noqw ōviy mímawat Jesus aw nánatuwnayaqam put aw paṅqaqwa: Itam Tutuyqawhqat aw yórikya. Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: Pas nu māyat ep muahpit akw pey’vaqat aw qa yórikk̇aṅw pu imalatsiy akw put aw qa hintsank̇aṅw, pu put tokoyat haqam söhkwiknayaqat aqw imay qa pane’ soon tuptsiwni.
Noqw ahpiy nanalsikis talq put aw nánatuwnayaqam piw haqam ahpave tsovawta, noqw Thomas pumuy amumuma. Noqw hösíwa uhtsiwtaqw Jesus pítuhqe amuhsonve wunuk̇aṅw paṅqawu: Uma kwakwhat unaṅway’yuṅwni.
Pahsat pu pam Thomas aw paṅqawu: Kurs uhmalatsiy aqw pew hintsanaa, pu imay aw yórikuu; pu pew māvuyalte’, itokoy haqam söhkwiknayaqat aqw uhmay pánaa, nit um pāpu qapēvewnat tuptsiwni’tani.
Noqw Thomas put aw paṅqawu: God, Itutuyqawhqa.
Noqw Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Thomas, paysoq pi um inumi yórikqe ōviy tuptsiwa; inumi qa yórikyat tūtuptsiwaqam pas hihlayhpit epyani.
Noqw Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumumnik̇aṅw pas qa tsa’ k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’taqat tumalta; noqw pāvam qa sohsoy it tutuvenit aṅ pey’ta.
Noqw pay hapi pas Jesus Moṅw’asi’taqanihqat, pu God Tíatnihqat uma tūtuptsiwaniqw ōviy īi yantaqa pēniwa, pu uma tūtuptsiwe’ put ahpiy qatsit tutwani.
Iit atsve pu Jesus wuhkovatuphat Tiberias yan mātsiwhqat ep put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi piw namtakna; noqw pam hin namtaknaqat nu umuy āawnani.
Ima yahsa’hakim haqam sūpya: Simon Peter, pu Thomas, Didimus yan túṅwantiwhqa, pu Galileet ep Canat aṅqw tāqa Nathanael, pu Zebedeet tímat‐niqw, pu hakim lȫyöm piw put aw nánatuwnaqamu.
Noqw Simon Peter pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Nu pakiwmaqto; noqw puma aw paṅqaqwa: Itam úmumyani. Noqw ōviy puma ahpiyyaqe āpiy pākihut aqw yuña, nit ep mihikq puma qa hihta kwisnaya.
Noqw qavoṅvaqw talavay Jesus patuphat qalaveq wunu; noqw put aw nánatuwnayaqam put Jesus‐niqw qa māmatsya.
Pahsat pu Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Tōtimu, ya uma qa hihta kwisnaya? Noqw puma put aw paṅqaqwa. Qae.
Pu pam amumi paṅqawu: Uma pākihut putvaqewat umuhtutsayay pāmiq tūvaye’ tutwani. Noqw puma panhtotiqe, pas antsa pāvakiwhtuy qaan’ewakw hintaqamuy intotaqe qa k̇ātoti.
Paniqw ōviy nu Jesus pas aw unaṅwayat yan túṅwantiwhqa Peter aw paṅqawu: Taq Tutuyqawhqa. Noqw Simon Peter Tutuyqawhqat‐nihqat navotqe, napnay aṅ paki, qa yuwsi’taqe ōviy’o, nit pu pāmiq tsoo.
Noqw mímawat put aw nánatuwnayaqam tutsáyat ep pāvakiwhtuy íniwyuṅqamuy pay pākihut akw lölökink̇ahk̇aṅw öki, puma tutskwat aṅqw qa yāpyaqe ōviy’o, pay tsivót‐sikip sunat kwílakit pahsaphaqamo.
Pu ōviy puma panis tutskwami ökit, pep tȫvut hoveyeliwtaqat tutwa. Noqw pāvakiwht put aṅ oyi. Pu pölavikit piw tutwa.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma pāvakiwhtuy umuhtunimuy aṅqw pew kiwisni.
Noqw Simon Peter put aqw wupqe yaṅsakoqmuy pāvakiwhtuy tutsáyat ep íniwtaqamuy tutskwami lölökinta, tsaṅe’sikip sunat‐sik̇aṅw aṅqw pakwt payhkomuy sihk̇ay’taqamuyu (153); noqw pas as qaan’ewakw hintaqw piw tutsaya qa tsīki.
Noqw Jesus pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Huvam pewye’ nȫnösaa. Noqw soon kurs haqawa put aw nánatuwnayaqam pam haknihqat tūviṅtani, suyan pi pam Tutuyqawhqaniqw ōviy’o.
Pahsat pu Jesus amuminihqe pölavikit kwusut, pumuy put huyta, pu pāvakiwhtuy pīwu.
It akw hapi pu’ Jesus put aw nánatuwnayaqamuy amumi pāyis nāmahtakna, mokiwuy aṅqw ahoy tātayht’a.
Pu ōviy pumuy nȫnösat, Jesus Simon Peter aw paṅqawu: Simon Jonas tíata, ya um imuy amuhpenihqe inumi pas unaṅway’ta? Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Owi, Tutuyqawhqa, pay nu uṅ hahlayhq um navoti’ta. Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Imamñatuy nopni’taa.
Pu aṅqw piw pam put aw paṅqawu: Simon, Jonas tíata, ya um inumi unaṅway’ta? Noqw pam paṅqawu: Owi Tutuyqawhqa, pay nu uṅ hahlayhq um navoti’ta. Noqw pam paṅqawu: Ikanelvokmuy amumi tunatyawtaa.
Pu pam pāyisni’mak̇aṅw put aw paṅqawu: Simon, Jonas tíata, ya um nuy hahlayi? Noqw pahsat pu Peter pas qahahlayhti, pam pu’ Ya um nuy hahlayi put aw kítaqw ōviy’o. Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, pay pi um sohsok hihta navoti’ta; nu uṅ hahlayhq um navoti’ta. Jesus put aw paṅqawu: Ikanelvokmuy nopni’taa.
Pas antsaa, pas antsa nu ūmi paṅqawni: Um tsaynihqe nāyuwsinat haqami unaṅwte’ paṅso haqaminiṅwu; nīk̇aṅw pay ason um wúyokte’ uhmay hohtaknani; noqw pu suhk̇a uṅ yuwsinani, nit pu uṅ haqami qa nāwaknaqw uṅ paṅso wikni.
Pam yan lavayhtiqe put hin mokniqat paṅqawu. Noqw pam mokiwuy akw God pas pavan mātaktani. Pu pam yan lavayhtit put aw paṅqawu: Um inuṅk hinmani.
Noqw Peter namtökqe nuy pumuy amuṅkniqw tuwa. Nu hapi Jesus aw unaṅwayat túṅwantiwhqe ura tapkiqw nōnovaqw put tawitsqayat aw tahtsikiwk̇aṅw aw paṅqawu: Ya hak uṅ momṅwituy amumi mātapni?
Noqw Peter nuy túwahqe Jesus aw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, noqw i’ tuwat hinhtini?
Noqw Jesus aw paṅqawu: Pay pi as pas nuy hisat pítuniqat aw pahsavo pam qátuniqat nu nāwaknaniqw, ya um put hintsanni? Um inuṅk hinmani.
Pantaqat ahpiy pu’ yaw nu pay qa mokniqat mímawat nánatuwnayaqam yan lavayta. Noqw pi Jesus put aw qa paṅqawu: Pam qa mokni, qa kita; nīk̇aṅw Pay pi as pas nuy hisat pítuniqat aw pahsavo pam qátuniqat nu nāwaknaniqw, ya um hintsanni? kita.
Nu hapi put aw nánatuwnaqa īit tuawi’ta, nihqe īit pēna. Noqw uma navoti’yuṅqw ituawi pas qaatsa.
Pu piw pas as nihtiwtaqat Jesus tumalta; noqw k̇a as pam sohsoy pēniwniniqw hikis pi k̇a tūwaqatsit ep soon tutuvenit pēniwniqat eṅem qénini. Pas antsaa.
Ura nu mohtihaqam pēna, Theophilus; nihqe ura Jesus sohsok hihta hintsaktivaqat, pu tūtutuqaynativaqat nu yuaata,
Hisat ōmi wīkiwhqat pahsavoo. Ura pam ayaiwyuṅqamuy namorstaqey amumi Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit aṅ tutaptat, paṅso wīkiwa.
Pu piw pam k̇ānavot, put atsve hīhihta qaöwíhintaqat akw pumuy amumi pas suyan taytaqey mahtakna; lȫp sunat tālat aṅ pumuy amumi nāmataqlawu; nihqe God moṅwtunatyaat hin hintaqat pumuy amumi yuaata.
Noqw ura pam pumuy amumum tsovawtaqe, puma Jerusalem aṅqw qa ahpiyyaniqat amumi tutaptaqe, Nayat aṅqw pumuy amumi hakiy awinit ōviy maqaptsi’yuṅwniqat paṅqawu. Ura uma inuhpiy put nanapta, pam kita.
Pay as pi John pas antsa kūyit akw tūtuvoylalawu; nīk̇aṅw uma hapi yahpiy qa wūhakis talq Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuvoylatiwyani.
Noqw ōviy puma tsovaltiqe, put tūviṅtotaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Tutuyqawhqa, ya um pu’haqam Israel‐sinmuy amumi moṅwtunatyat ahoy pitsínani?
Noqw pam amumi paṅqawu: Pay pam hísatniqat, pu haqe’ qalawmaqw aw pítuniqat Ina pas nāp öqalay akw yuki’taqat pay qa uma put navoti’yuṅwni.
Pay ason uma öqalat makiwyani, Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit umumi pítuq’ö; nen uma nuy hin navoti’yuṅqey tuawi’yuṅwni Jerusalem ep’e, pu sohsovik Judeat aṅ’a, pu Samariat aṅ’a, pu ahpiy tūwaqalavoqhaqamii.
Yan pam lavayhtiqw, puma aw tāyuṅqw, pam ōmi wīkiwa; noqw ōmaw put wikqe, pumuy amutpik tupk̇a.
Noqw pam ōmi wuptoqw, puma aṅk‐sa tāyuṅqw, hakim lȫyöm tāqat qȫtsat yuwsi’k̇aṅw pumuy amumi suptuqe, amuqlap wunuptu;
Nihqe paṅqawu: Uma Galileet aṅqw tahtaqtu, ya uma hinoqw pas ōmiq‐sa tayk̇ahk̇aṅw hōñi? Pay hapi i’ Jesus umuṅaqw ōmi wīkiwhqat uma aw tāyuṅqw, hin pam ōmi wupqey pan piw ahoy pítuni.
Pahsat pu puma tsomot Olivet yan mātsiwhqat aṅqw ahoy Jerusalem awya. (Pam tsomo Jerusalem aṅqw hak nasuṅwintalöṅnit ep haqami pahsavo nakwsumantaniqat pahsaphaqamo.)
Noqw puma ep ö́kihqe, tupatsveq ahpami yuña; pepeq ima yēse: I’ Peter, pu James, pu John, pu Andrew, pu Philip, pu Thomas, pu Bartholomew, pu Matthew, pu James, hakiy Alphaeus tíata, noqw pu Simon Zelotes, noqw pu Judas it James tupkoata.
Ima sohsoyam sun unaṅway nāwakintota; pu pas okiwlalwa qa qé’iwwisk̇ahk̇aṅwo, hakimuy momoymuy amumuma, pu Jesus yuyat Maryt‐nik̇aṅw pu Jesus tupkomuyatuy amumuma.
Noqw ephaqam Peter tuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy amuṅaqw wunuptu, (ima tsovawtaqam navaysikip sunat pahsa’haqamya)
Nihqe amumi paṅqawu: Tahtaqtu, isinomu, ura Qahováriwtaqa Hikwsi David moayat ahpiy tutuvenyukit aṅ aṅwu pay hin lavayhtiqw pas soon pam qa antani; pam Jesus ṅuawisqamuy put aw tsamqat Judas paṅqawu.
Pam as ura itamum tōnawta; nihqe itamum it yan tumalat aw taviwa.
Noqw i’ tāqa ura qalomáhinhtiqe, ahsatiy akw tutskwat tui; nihqe kopaṅvosqe nāsavaqe pahtokq, sohsoy sīsihuat nöṅaṅayku.
Noqw sohsoyam Jerusalem ep ki’yuṅqam put nanapta; noqw ōviy pep tutskwa pumuy amuhkwa Aceldama yan túṅwantiwa; pam tutskwa uṅwat akw tuiwhpu i’nihqe pam’i.
Pay ura Tātawit aṅ yan pey’ta: Nam kīat kīqötiwaa; nam qa hak aṅ qátuu, yan’i; pu piw yan’i: Nam tumalmakiwaat pas suhk̇a makiwaa.
Imuy yep yesqamuy amuṅaqw haqawat Jesus qatsíyat aṅ ahsupoq itamum hinnumya, John hisat Jesus kūyit akw tuvoylataqat ahpiy’o, pu put itamuṅaqw ōmiq wīkiwhqat aw pahsavoo. Noqw ōviy itam pumuy amuṅaqw haqawat namorstotaqw, pam itamum Jesus mokiwuy aṅqw ahoy tātayhqat yuaatani.
<range>
Noqw ōviy puma hakimuy lȫqmuy taviya, hakiy Joseph, Barsabas yan túṅwantiwhqat, pam hak piw Justus yan mātsiwhqat, nik̇aṅw pu hakiy Matthias pīwu.
Nit puma nānawaknaqe paṅqaqwa: Taay, Tutuyqawhqa, um sohsokmuy amumi unaṅwayamuy navoti’ta; um imuy tāqatuy himuwat namorstaqey mahtaknani.
Noqw pam it tumalat ep wúnupte’, itamun aṅqe’ ayaiwtani. Ura Judas qaanhtiqe put aṅqw ayo yama, pas nāp qeniy awniqee, kitota.
Pu puma pumuy amuhpe hihta akw tuwantotaqw, pam Matthias ep yēva. Noqw pam pakwt sukw sihk̇ay’taqamuy ayaiwyuṅqamuy amumum pohtoylaniwa.
Noqw talöṅnit Pentecost yan mātsiwhqat aw pituqw, tuptsiwni’yuṅqam sohsoyam sun unaṅway haqam sūp tsovawta.
Noqw nāt pumuy panyuṅqw, pahsat pay himu wukohuk̇aṅwuy an söykitaqa ōṅaqw pítuhqe, pumuy haqam kīve taṅawtaqw, pep pās ohpo.
Noqw pep himu ūwiṅwuy antaqa amumi mātaqtiqe, nāhoy tsihtsiktiqe, leñit anhtiqe nānap amuhpa’ kwāvilti.
Noqw puma sohsoyam Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuyqawiwyuṅqe, pahsat pu hīhihtuy amuhkwa yuaaykuya, hin Hikwsi pumuy lavayhuytaqat pan’i.
Noqw ephaqam k̇aysiwhqam Jew‐sinom God pas k̇aptsi’yuṅqam Jerusalem ep tsovawta. Puma nānan’ivaqw tutskwat aṅqw öki.
Noqw i’ yantaqa aṅqe’ nanaptiwhq, sinom qaan’ewakw hintaqam sūmi tsovaltiqe, hin kurs wūwaya, puma nanāp amumi tūqayyuṅqw, amuhkwa yuaatotaqw ōviy’o.
Noqw puma sohsoyam pas hin unaṅwtotiqe k̇ātayuṅqe nānami paṅqaqwa: Meh, ya ima yuaatotaqam qa sohsoyam Galileet aṅqw sinomu?
Noqw hintaqw ōviy itam nanāp hin lavaymakiway’k̇ahk̇aṅw, tihtiwyaqey pan pumuy yuaatotaqw nanvotya?
Parthian‐sínomu, Mede‐sínomu, Elamite‐sínomu, pu Mesopotamiat aṅ yesqamu, pu Judeat aṅ’a, pu Cappadociat aṅ’a, pu Pontus aṅ’a, pu Asiat aṅ’a,
Pu Phrygiat aṅ’a, pu Pamphyliat aṅ’a, pu Egypt aṅ’a, pu Cyrenet ánan’ik Lybiat aṅ hāhaqe’ yesqamu, pu Rome aṅqw yaktaqamu, Jew‐sínomu, pu Jew‐sinmuy amún tuptsiwni’yuṅqamu,
Crete‐sínomu, pu Arabia‐sínomu, puma God k̇ātutmalayat itamuhkwa yuaatotaqw, itam sohsoyam nanvotya, kitota.
Nihqe puma sohsoyam pas hin unaṅwtotiqe hin kurs hinhtotiniqe paṅqaqwa: Hin pa i’ hintani?
Noqw pētu tututsiwyaqe paṅqaqwa: Ima puhut wine akw hōnaq’iwyuṅwa.
Noqw Peter pakwt sukw sihk̇ay’taqamuy amumum wunuk̇aṅw, lavayhtiqe sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma Judeat ep yesqamu, pu sohsoyam Jerusalem ep ki’yuṅqamu, nu umuy it āawnani; uma ilavayiy aw tuqayvastotani.
Itam qa hōnaq’iwyuṅqw uma pan itamumi wūwantota, nāt pu’ töṅva.
Pi i’ hapi God lavay’ayayat Joel aṅ lavayhtiwa, ura paṅqawu:
Pu so’ṅwamiq hapi yantani, kita God, nu sohsokmuy sinmuy amumi Ihikwsiy wūtani. Noqw umuhtim tōtim pu mamant inuṅem yuaatotani; pu umuhtahtaqt su’peyaqam tuawyorstotani, pu umuhwuwuyom tahtaqt tumokyorstotani.
Pu ep nu imuy itutuwiktuy tahtaqtuy pu momoyamuy amumi Ihikwsiy wūtani. Noqw puma inuṅem yuaatotani.
Pu nu ōvaqe tokpelat aṅqe’ k̇ātatayhpit poñalawni, pu atpik tūwaqatsit aṅ hihta tuawi’yuṅqata, úṅwata, pu ūwiṅwuyu, pu kwits’ohpokita.
Tāwa qatālawvani, pu mūyaw uṅwat anhtini nāt Tutuyqawhqat wukotalöṅniyat pas qaöwíhintaqat aw qa pítuq’ö.
Pep pu’ ason hak Tutuyqawhqat aw taqa’naṅwtiqa ayo yámakmantani, kita úrai.
Uma Israel‐sinom tahtaqtu, uma it lavayit aw tuqayvastotani. I’ Nazareth aṅqw tāqa Jesus God aṅqw hahlaywa. Noqw God öqalay akw put ahpiy k̇ātumalat, pu kātatayhpit hihta tuawi’yuṅqat tumalta. Yan pam put hahlayhqey umumi mahtakna. Noqw uma hapi pas nāp put navoti’yuṅwa.
Put hapi uma God pasiwniyat, pu aṅwu pay hihta navotiyat akw put ṅuayaqe, qaanhinwisqamuy amumi put mātatveqw, puma nahoylehtsit aw put muayaqe, nīnaya.
Noqw God put ahoy tātayna, mokiwuy öqalayat aṅqw put mātapqee, kurs hin pam put ṅui’taniqw ōviy’o.
Pi David ura put yan lavayhti: Pas nu sutsep inutpipo Tutuyqawhqat tuway’ta; pi pam iputvaqe wúnuq’ö. Noqw ōviy soon nu hin unaṅway’tani.
Paniqw ōviy iunaṅwa hahlayhti, pu ileñi pas hahlayhti, pu ōviy piw itoko ūmi yank̇aṅw nāsuṅwni’tani.
Ispi um soon ihikwsiy maskiveq mātapniq’ö; piw um soon uhtumal’ayay Qahováriwtaqat hovahtiniqw nakwhani.
Um qatsit haqe’ qatsqat nuy āawna; um inumum yantak̇aṅw nuy hahlayhtapnani, kita úrai.
Tahtaqtu, isinomu, kurs nu pas qatuhtusk̇aṅw umumi itahwu’yay David lavayhtini; ura pam mokqe āmilti, noqw put tūamiat nāt itamum yanta.
Ura David God lavay’ayaatnihqe navoti’taqw, ura God put aw qaöwívasiwnaqe, pam put aniwniyat aṅqw Christ wunuptsinat, put moṅw’atsvewayat ep qatuptsinaniqey yan lavayhti.
Noqw pam it yantaqat aṅwu pay tuway’taqe, Christ ahoy tātayniqat lavayhti, pu put hikwsiat maskiveq qa mātaviwa, piw tokoat qa hovahti.
It Jesus hapi God ahoy tātayna, noqw itam hapi pas nāp put aw yóriki’yuṅwa.
Noqw God hapi put momi távihqe, putvaqe put qatuptsina; nihqe it awinit Hikwsit put aw noa. Noqw pam it wūtaqw, uma put pantaqat hapi pu’ aw yórikya, pu nanapta.
David pi ōmi qa wūvi, nīk̇aṅw pam ura pas nāp paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa Imoṅwiy aw paṅqawu: Um hāk iputvaqewat qátuni,
Nu hisat uhtuwqamuy áṅwutaqw, puma ūmi maqaptsi’yuṅwniqat pahsavoo.
Noqw ōviy Israel‐sinom sohsoyam it pas suyan nanaptani: Uma hapi it Jesus nahoylehsit aw muaya. Noqw God hapi put Tutuyqawhqanihqat pan yuku, piw put Christ, yan tuṅwa. (Pam Moṅw’asi’taqa i’nihqe pam’i.)
Noqw puma it yantaqat nanaptaqe pavan pas unaṅwmokyaqe, Peter‐nik̇aṅw pu mimuy ayaiwyuṅqamuy amumi paṅqaqwa: Tahtaqtu, itahpavamu, noqw itam hinhtotini?
Pahsat pu Peter amumi paṅqawu: Uma umuhtunatyay aṅqw lasyani. Nen uma sohsoyam Jesus Christ natṅwaniyat aṅ kūyit akw tuvoylatotini, umuhqaanhtipu ayo yukiltiniqat ōviy’o; nen uma Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit kuwahtiwhqat makiwyani.
Pi awini hapi umuṅemi; pu umuhtimuy amuṅemi, pu sohsokmuy yāvaqyaqamuy amuṅemi, hihsa’nihqam hakimuy Itahtutuyqawhqa God wáṅwayniqamuy amuṅemi.
Pu pay wūhaq lavayit akw pam amumi hin hintaqat yuaataqe, amumi ö’qalqe paṅqawu: Uma pu’ qatsívaptsiwyuṅqamuy nukusyesqamuy qa amumum hinwisni; taq k̇a uma amún súlawhtini.
Pahsat pu k̇aysiwhqam hahlayk̇ahk̇aṅw, put lavayiyat kwusuyaqe, kūyit akw tuvoylatoti; noqw put tāwat ep payhp sōmorit pahsa’haqam sinom pumuy amumi tōnalti.
Nihqe puma su’qawk̇ahk̇aṅw, yūmosa ayaiwyuṅqam pumuy hin tutuqaynayaqat aṅ tutuqayya, pu sūp hinwisk̇ahk̇aṅw, Jesus u’nik̇ahk̇aṅw pölavikit yóṅoylalwa, piw nāwakinwisa.
Noqw sinom sohsoyam maqastoti; noqw God ayaiwyuṅqamuy amuhpiy hīhihta k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’yuṅqat nihtiwtaqat hintsaki.
Noqw ima tuptsiwni’yuṅqam sūp hinnumya; nihqe sohsok hihta sūmi himuy’yuṅwa.
Nihqe puma hihta himuy huyaye’, hihta hihsa’ ömahtotaqey nāhuytaṅwu, hin pumuy hihta haqni’yuṅqat pan’i.
Noqw puma nāqavo sun tunatyawk̇ahk̇aṅw God kīyat ep hinnumya, pu haqam hakiy kīyat ep pölavikit yóṅoyhtotaṅwu; pu puma hahlayk̇ahk̇aṅw nȫsiwhqay nōnova, sun unaṅway’k̇ahk̇aṅwo.
Pu puma God tayawink̇ahk̇aṅw sohsokmuy amuhpiy hahlaywa. Pu Tutuyqawhqa ayo nȫṅantaqamuy akw nāqavo put aw tōnawtaqamuy amumi hóyokinta.
Noqw hísatniqw nānawaknaṅwuniqw, tāwat atvelpeniqw, Peter John amum God kīyat aqw’a.
Noqw hakim hakiy tāqat tihtiwhpuy aṅqaqw tuhapiwtaqat tsöpwisa; puma nāqavo God kīyat aw hötsíwat Lomasniwa yan túṅwantiwhqat epeq put tahtapya, pam God kīyat aw yuṅtaqamuy amumi okiw hihta tuṅlaytaniqat ōviy’o.
Noqw ōviy pam Peter‐nik̇aṅw pu John pumuy God kīyat aw pakitoqw túwahqe, amumi hihta tuhtui.
Noqw Peter John amum put aw taynumt, aw paṅqawu: Kurs itamumi tātayii.
Noqw pam pumuy amuṅaqw hihta makiwniqey wūwank̇aṅw, amumi‐sa tayta.
Pahsat pu Peter paṅqawu: Nu sīvat ṅastaa; nīk̇aṅw nu hihta himuy’taqw uṅ máqani; nu Jesus Christ natṅwaniyat aw yank̇aṅw ūmi paṅqawni: Wunuptut nakwsuu, kitat,
Put putvaqw māyat ṅuat, wunuptsinaqw, pahsat pay put kuk’at, pu kuktupk̇aqe hoṅviti.
Noqw pam suṅwnuptut, nakwsuqe, pumuy amumum God kīyat aw paki, waymak̇aṅw, tso’tik̇aṅw, God pas hihtalawk̇aṅwo.
Noqw pam waymak̇aṅw God hihtalawhq sinom sohsoyam aw tāyuṅwa.
Noqw puma māmatsyaqw, pay as pam God kīyat aw hötsíwat Lomasniwa yan túṅwantiwhqat epeq qatuk̇aṅw, nuhtumi hihta tuṅlay’taṅwu; noqw pam hintsaniwhqat ep puma kātayuṅqe, hin kurs wūwaya.
Noqw tāqa tuhap’iwtaṅwuqa powatiqa Peter John enaṅ hūrs ṅuy’taqw, sinom haqam Solomon Tuhööata yan mātsiwhqat aw sohsoyam pumuy amumi yuyutya.
Noqw kurs sinom kātayuṅqw, Peter māmatsqe, amumi paṅqawu: Uma Israel‐sinom tahtaqtu, ya uma hinoqw it ep pas kātayuṅwa? Ya uma hinoqw pas itamumi‐sa tāyuṅwa suhpan k̇a itam pas nāp itah’öqalay, pu itahlomaqatsiy ahpiy it nakwsunaqat pan’i.
I’ hapi hak Abraham, pu Isaac, pu Jacob itahwu’yamuy aw yantaqaam, God Tiy Jesus pas pavan sinota. Put hapi uma Pilate aw mātatveqe qa putyaniqey atpip paṅqaqwa, pas as pam put mātapniqey su’qawtaq’ö,
Nihqe uma it hakiy Qahováriwtaqat, pu Súantaqat qa nānakwhaqe, tuwat soq hak hakiy nīnaqat umumi noiwniqat uma nānawakna;
Nihqe Qatsit aw Tūtsamhqat nīnaya; noqw God put so’pumuy amuṅaqw ahoy tātayna; noqw itam hapi it pas suyan aw yóriki’ta.
Noqw i’ tāqa put natṅwaniyat qapēvewnaqe, put natṅwaniyat aw yank̇aṅw hoṅvita. Uma hapi put aw tāyuṅwa, piw put tuwi’yuṅwa. Pay pas panta. Pam Jesus aw tuptsiwni’k̇aṅw sohsokmuy umutpik pās powiwk̇aṅw wunu.
Noqw taay, isinomu, pay nu navoti’taqw uma hintsatsk̇aqey qa mātsi’yunwa, umuhmomṅwituy amun’i.
Noqw pay hapi God sohsokmuy lavay’aymuy moayamuy ahpiy hin hintaniqat lavaytiqey aw antsana, ura Christ okiwsaniwniqat pam kita.
Oviy uma umuhtunatyay aṅqw lasye’, God aw lasyani; noqw umuhqaanhtipu umuhpiy ayo hȫniwni, noqw Tutuyqawhqa umuy suyan unaṅwtoynani.
Noqw pam Jesus Christ, umumi mohti yuaatiwhqat aṅqw tavini.
Put hapi ōveqatsit pas pay soon qa kwúsuni, hisat sohsoy himu ahoy pūhutiniqat aw pahsavoo. Put hapi ura God qatsit yayhniwhqat pahpiy sohsokmuy pas hihtuy lavay’aymuy amuhpiy lavayhti.
Ura Moses itanamuy amumi pas suyan paṅqawu: God Umuhtutuyqawhqa umuhsinomuy amuṅaqw umuṅem lavay’ayay wunuptsinani, nuy hímunihqat pan’i. Ason pam umumi hin lavayhtiqw, uma sohsok aṅ aw tūqayyuṅwni.
Pu ason hak haqam put lavay’ayat aw qa tuqayvastaqa hapi sinmuy amuṅaqw súlawhtimantani.
Owí, pi sohsoyam God lavay’aymat, Samuel ahpiy hihsa’nihqam lavayhtotiqam yepehaq hin hintaniqat lavayhtoti.
Uma hapi God lavay’aymuyatuy timatu, pu itanamuy amumi God pasiwniyat oyi’yuṅqamu; ura pam Abraham aw paṅqawu: Pu ason hapi uhnatkoy ep tūwaqatsit aṅ sopk̇awtaqam sinom hahlayhpit ep ö́kini.
Noqw God hapi Tiy Jesus ahoy tātaynaqe umumi put mohti hōna, umuhnukpanay aṅqw umuy lasne’, hahlayhpit aw umuy ökinaniqe ōviy’o.
Noqw nāto puma sinmuy amumi yuaataqw, pay God awwat momṅwit‐niqw, pu God kīyat ep tuwalanmoṅwi‐niqw, pu Sadducee‐sinom pumuy amumi pas kipok’unaṅway öki,
Ayaiwtaqam nuhtumi yuaataqe, so’pum Jesus ahpiy ahoy tātayyaniqat tūtutuqaynaqw, put ep qa salayhtotiqe ōviy’o.
Noqw pay nuṅwu pas tapkiqw, ōviy puma ason qāvo hintaniqat tunatyawk̇ahk̇aṅw, pumuy sivikimi panaya.
Noqw pay k̇aysiwhqam lavayit nanaptaqam tūtuptsiwa; noqw tahtaqt tsivót‐sikip sōmorit pahsa’haqam aw öki.
Pu ōviy qavoṅvaqw pumuy moṅwímat‐niqw, wukw’aymat‐niqw, tutavot tutuqaynayaqam‐niqw,
Pu God awwat mohpeq moṅwi Annas‐niqw, pu Caiphas‐niqw, John‐niqw, pu Alexander‐niqw, pu ahpiy hakim hihsa’nihqam God awwat mohpeq moṅwit sinomat Jerusalem awwat sūmi tsovalti.
Pu ōviy puma pumuy nāsami taviyaqe tūviṅtotaqe amumi paṅqaqwa: Ya uma hihta öqalat akw it yantsaki; hal ya uma hakiy natṅwaniyat aw yank̇aṅw panhti?
Noqw pahsat Peter Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuyqawiwk̇aṅw amumi paṅqawu: Uma aṅ sinmuy amuṅaqw momṅwitu, pu Israel‐sinmuy amuṅaqw wukw’a’yatu,
Kurs k̇a pi itam pu’ it tālat ep tūviṅtiwni, hin it tāqat qapasiwtaqat ep lolma tumaltiwhqata, pu hin pam qalaptuqat ep’e.
Noqw ōviy hapi nu sohsokmuy umumi paṅqawni; pu sohsokmuy Israel‐sinmuy amumii: Uma hapi it Jesus Christ Nazareth aṅqw tāqat nahoylehtsit aw muayaqw, God so’pumuy amuṅaqw put ahoy tātayna; noqw i’ tāqa put ahpiy yep umutpik pasiwk̇aṅw wunu.
Jesus Christ owat ánk̇aṅw, umuy kīlalwaqamuy amuhpiy ayo tūviwhqa tuyqaveq paki.
Pi itam put natṅwaniyat‐sa ahpiy ayo nö́ṅakni, qa hakiy sukw ahpiy’o; pi tūwaqalvoqhaqami qa suhk̇a hak God ahpiy ayo Tūooyhqa yan túṅwantiwa.
Noqw puma Peter‐nik̇aṅw pu John pumuy amumi nanaptaqw, kurs pay puma qa haqam pas tutuqayk̇aṅw, söqapñatnik̇aṅw, pas qa tuhtusk̇aṅw yuaataqw, puma kātayuṅwa; nihqe amumi māmatsyaqw, kurs puma Jesus amum hinnumṅwu.
Pu tāqa qalaptuqa pumuy amumum wunuqw, puma aw tāyuṅqe kurs put ep hiṅqaqwani.
Noqw puma pumuy tsovawtaqamuy amuṅaqw yámakniqat puma amumi paṅqaqwat, pahsat put yuaatotaqe,
Paṅqaqwa: Ya sen itam imuy tāqatuy hintsanyani? Suyan pi puma a’nö hihta tumaltaqw pam pantaqa Jerusalem ep ki’yuṅqamuy sohsokmuy amumi mātakti. Noqw kurs itam hin pumuy qa panhtiqat paṅqaqwani.
Noqw pay i’ qa pas sinmuy amuhpa’ kúrukniqat ōviy itam pumuy pavan tsāwinayaqw, puma pāpu qa hakiy aw it natṅwanit aṅ yuaatani, kitota.
Pu puma pumuy wáṅwayyaqe mēwaya; nihqe pāpu puma Jesus natṅwaniyat aṅ qa yuaataniqat, pu qa tūtutuqaynaniqat amumi paṅqaqwa.
Noqw Peter John amum lavayhtiqe, amumi paṅqawu: Huvupatpi úmuyniqw himuwa God atpip súanta, sen itam umumi pas tūqaytani, sen itam it God awwat tūqaytani?
Kurs pi hin tis itam hihta aw yórikqey, pu navotqey qa yuaatani, kita.
Noqw pay puma sinmuy amumi tuhtusyaqe, hin kurs pumuy sisvinayani; nihqe ōviy puma piw pumuy tsāwinayat, mātapya, sinom sohsoyam hin hiniwhtiqat ep God pas hihtalalwaqw ōviy’o.
Pi it hakiy tāqat ep himu hihta tuawi’taqa tumaltiwhq qalaptuqw, pam hak lȫp sunat ep hóyokiwtaqat yahsaṅwi’ta.
Noqw puma mātaviwhqe sinomuy amumii; nihqe ima God awwat momṅwit wukw’a’yatuy amumum pumuy hintsatsnaqat puma pumuy sohsok āawna.
Noqw puma put nanaptaqe, sun unaṅway God aw lavayhtotiqe paṅqaqwa: Tutuyqawhqa, God, um hapi ōveqatsit yuku, pu tūwaqatsita, pu pātuwaqatsita, pu sohsok put aṅ hihta hinyuṅqata.
Ura um uhtumal’ayay David moayat ahpiy paṅqawu: Ya hīhihtu sinom hinoqw itsívutoti; pu sinom hihta an’e’wakw tunatyaltoti?
Tūwaqatsit ep momṅwit hoṅva, pu nuhtumi momṅwit Tutuyqawhqat ehpewi natsvalaya, pu Moṅw’asniyat ehpewii.
Pay pas antsa i’ Herod, pu Pontus Pilate, puma imuy pay qa‐Israel‐sinmuy‐nik̇aṅw pu pas Israel‐sinmuy amumum Jesus Uhtiy Qahováriwtaqat ehpewi sūmi tsovalti, Uhmoṅw’asniy ehpewii,
Um aṅwu pay hisat uhmay, pu uhwuwniy akw hin pasiwnaqat anhtotiniqe ōviy’o.
Taay, Tutuyqawhqa, um pumuy tsatsáwinpiyamuy aw yórikni; noqw uhtumal’a’yam qanalmaqasyak̇ahk̇aṅw uhlavayiy yuaatotaniqat um amuṅem pan yúkuni.
Um uhmay akw nuhtumi unaṅwtave’ tūqalaptsintani; pu k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’yuṅqat, Jesus Uhtiy Qahováriwtaqat natṅwaniyat aṅ tumalay’tani, kitota.
Noqw puma nānawaknaqe yukuyaqw, pumuy haqam tsovawtaqat ep tayayayku; noqw puma sohsoyam Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuyqawiwk̇ahk̇aṅw, qanalmamqasyak̇ahk̇aṅw, God lavayiyat yuaatota.
Noqw ima tuptsiwni’yuṅqam sohsoyam sun unaṅway’yuṅwa, pu sun tunatyawyuṅwa; piw qa hak amuṅaqw hihta himuy pas himuy’taqe paṅqawlawu; puma sohsok hihta sūmi himuy’yuṅwa.
Noqw ayaiwyuṅqam Tutuyqawhqat Jesus ahoy tātayhqat a’nö lay’taqat yuaatota; noqw pumuy sohsokmuy amumi ōkwalni qaöwivitsiwta.
Piw qa hak pumuy amuṅaqw hihta akw okiwhinta; puma hihsa’nihqam aṅqe’ tutskwat, pu kīkihut himuy’yuṅqam put huyantivayaqw, huyiwhqat hihk̇ayat kīvantaqe,
Ayaiwyuṅqamuy amutpipo put ōoya; noqw hak hihta ṅastaniqw puma put maqayaṅwu.
Noqw hak Joses ayaiwyuṅqamuy amuhpiy Barnabas yan túṅwantiwhqa (pam Tsākw‐ep‐suyan‐unaṅwa i’nihqe pam’i) Levi‐wuṅwa, Cyprus aṅqw sino,
Tútskway’taqe put húyaqe, sīvat kívahqe ayaiwyuṅqamuy amutpipo put oya.
Noqw hak tāqa Ananias yan mātsiwhqa nȫmay Sapphirat amum tutskway huya;
Nit soq hihk̇ayat hihsa’ nēṅemta; noqw nȫmaat amum put navoti’ta; nihqe pay qa sohsok kívahqe, ayaiwyuṅqamuy amutpipo put oya.
Noqw Peter paṅqawu: Ananias, ya um hinoqw Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit aw atsátaniqat, pu tutskwat hihk̇ayat hihsa’ nēṅemtaniqat Satan uṅ pan unaṅwtoyna?
Puyaw pam nāt qa huyiwhqe, qa uhhimu; pu pam huyiwhqe ya qa um hihk̇ayat aw moṅwi? Ya um hinoqw yanhaqam uh’unaṅwpeq tunaltyalti? Um qa sinmuy amumi atsáta; pi um God aw atsáta.
Noqw Ananias yan lavayit navotqe, aṅqe’ minukt mōki; noqw sohsoyam it nanaptaqam pas maqastoti.
Noqw hakim tōtim hoṅvaqe put mok̇ahtotat, ihpo hóroknayaqe haqam tavimaya.
Pu ahpiy k̇a tāwa aṅhqe pāyis qöniltiqw, pahsa’haqam nȫmaat hiniwhtiqat qa navoti’k̇aṅw ep paki.
Noqw Peter lavayhtiqe put aw paṅqawu: Kurs nuy āawnaa, ya pay uma pas yahsa’ ōviy tutskwat huya? Noqw pam paṅqawu: Owi, pay pahsa’ ōviy’o.
Pahsat pu Peter put aw paṅqawu: Ya hintaqw ōviy uma Tutuyqawhqat Hikwsiyat aw hepniqey sun unaṅwti? Meh, uhpuwsuṅway tavimayaqam hötsiwmi ökiwiwta; nihqe puma uṅ yaṅqw haqami taviwisni.
Noqw pahsat pay pam put kukmiq munukt mōki; noqw tōtim ö́kihqe put mokput tutwa; nihqe paṅqw put hóroknayaqe, puwsuṅwayat ehpeq taviya.
Noqw sohsoyam Jesus aw tōnawtaqam put ep pas tsātsawna, pu’ hakim hihsa’nihqam it nanaptaqam pīwu.
Noqw ayaiwyuṅqamuy māyamuy ahpiy k̇ātatayhpi hihta tuawi’yuṅqa sinmuy amuhpa’ tumalay’tiwa. (Noqw puma sun unaṅway haqam Solomon tuhöoyat ep tsovawta.
Pu ahpiy mimuy amuṅaqw soon hak pumuy amumi tōnaltiniqey kurs suhtaq’ewni; noqw sinom pumuy pas hihtay’yuṅwa.
Noqw tūtuptsiwaqam Tutuyqawhqat aw wūhaq’iwma, k̇aysiwhqam tahtaqtu, pu momoyamu.)
Noqw ōviy sinom tūtuyyaqamuy kisk̇ami tsamvantaqe, ahpat, pu puvuwhpit aṅ ōoyya, hísatniqw Peter paṅqe’niqw ṅas’ew kihsiwniat hihtawat ep kistamantaniqat ōviy’o.
Pu Jerusalem ahpiy hāhaqe’ kitsókit aṅqw qaan’ewakw hintaqam sinom tūtuyyaqamuy tsamk̇ahk̇aṅw ökiwta, pu hakimuy tuyoy’e’wakw hīhikwsimuy akw qa kwaṅwáhinyuṅqamuyu; noqw puma sohsoyam qalaptuya.
Pahsat pu God awwat mohpeq moṅwi wunuptu, pu put an tunatyawyuṅqamu, ima Sadducee‐sinom tōnawtaqamu, nihqe puma itsívutotiqe,
Ayaiwyuṅqamuy amumi may’yuṅqe, pumuy sumisivikit aw taṅatota.
Noqw pay Tutuyqawhqat hoṅviayaat mihikq sivikit uutspiyat hötahtat, pumuy paṅqw ipwaqe, amumi paṅqawu:
Yupavé, uma God kīyat ep hoṅk̇ahk̇aṅw, it qatsit hin hintaqat nuhtumi sohsok yuaatotani.
Noqw puma yan nanaptaqe, suits talavay God kīyat aw yuṅqe, pep sinmuy tutuqaynaya. Noqw God awwat mohpeq moṅwi pitu, pu put ámumyaqamu, nihqe wuwan’aymuy tsovala, pu sohsokmuy Israel‐sinmuy amuṅaqw wukw’a’yamuyu; nihqe sivikimi pumuy tsamwisniqat hakimuy ayatota.
Noqw ayaiwyaqam ep ö́kihqe, pumuy sivikive qa tutwat puma áhoyyaqe tūawvaya;
Nihqe paṅqaqwa: Pay as pas sivikimi hūrs uhtsiwta; noqw tūtuwalaqam ihk̇aqe hötsíwhpa hōñi. Noqw itam aw hötayaqe, ahpave qa hakiy tutwa.
Noqw God awwat susmohpeq moṅwi, pu God kīyat ep tuwalanmoṅwi, pu God awwat mohpeq momṅwit it nanaptaqe, hin i’ haqami hiniwhtiniqat wūwantota.
Noqw pahsat hak pítuhqe pumuy āawnaqe paṅqawu: Meh, ura uma imuy tahtaqtuy sivikimi taṅatotaqw, puma God kīyat ep hoṅk̇ahk̇aṅw sinmuy tutuqaynaya.
Pahsat pu tuwalanmoṅwi, hoṅvia’yatuy tsamk̇aṅw amuminihqe pumuy paṅqw pās tsāma, sinmuy mamqasqe ōviy’o, taq k̇a puma pumuy tatatupyaniq’ö.
Pu ōviy puma pumuy moṅwtsovawtaqamuy amutpipo tsamvaya. Noqw God awwat susmohpeq moṅwi pumuy amumi paṅqawu:
Ura itam umuy pās mēwayaqe, uma Jesus natṅwaniyat qa aṅ tūtutuqaynayaniqat umumi paṅqaqwa, nōqa? Noqw meh, tuwat soq uma Jerusalem ep umuhtutuqayhpiy aṅqe’ kúruknayaqe, it tāqat qatsíyat itamuy tukopnayaniqey anyuṅwa.
Pahsat pu Peter mímuywatuy ayaiwyuṅqamuy amumum lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay kurs pi hin itam God qa awwat tuqayvastotamantani, qa sinot aw’i.
Itanamuy aw yantaqaam God as Jesus wunuptsinaqw, uma put himutskit ep hahyaqe nīnaya.
Noqw God put putvaqe momi tavi, pam motisinoniqat, pu ayo Tūooyniqat ōviy’o, Israel‐sinmuy nāp tunatyay aṅqw lasne’, pumuy qaanhtipuyat ayo yúkuniqe ōviy’o.
Noqw itam hapi īit navoti’yuṅqe, put tuawi’yuṅwa, pu i’ Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit pīwu, put hapi God put tunatyayat aṅ hinwisqamuy amumi nóaṅwu.
Noqw puma put nanaptaqw, pavan unaṅwaam tuyvaqw, puma pumuy qöqyaniqey nānami yuaatota.
Pahsat pu hak Pharisee‐sino Gamaliel yan mātsiwhqa, tutavot tūtutuqaynaqa pumuy tsovawtaqamuy amuṅaqw wunuptu; pam hak sohsokmuy amuhpiy k̇aptsiwta; nihqe ima ayaiwyuṅqam pay hāk hihsavo nö́ṅakniqat paṅqawu.
Pahsat pu pam tsovawtaqamuy amumi paṅqawu: Uma Israel‐sinom tahtaqtu, uma imuy hintsatsnaniqey wūwantotaqey ep tunatyaltotini.
Taq pay nāt ura qa pew pituqw, hak Theudas mātaktiqe pas himunihqey pan nāyuaata. Noqw ura put hakiy aw tahtaqt sunát‐sikip sunat pahsa’haqam natsk̇aya. Noqw ura pam nīniwhq, sohsoyam put aw tuqayvastotaqam tatslakqe, qa háqamtoti.
Pu it tāqat aṅk ura hak Galileet aṅqw Judas nāmataqta, nāventiwhqat ep’e, nihqe k̇aysiwhqamuy naṅk wīsila; pamwa piw mokq, sohsoyam put aw tuqayvastotaqam ahtsavala.
Noqw ōviy nu umumi paṅqawni: Uma imuy sinmuy amumi qa hintsatsk̇ani, uma qa amumi may’yuṅwni; pay i’ yan tunatya, pu tumala kurs pay sinmuy amuhpiynen pay soon aniwhtini;
Taq k̇a pam pantaqa God ahpiy hintaniqw soon uma put símoknayani, taq nāphisat k̇a uma God aw rohomnumyani, kita.
Noqw puma put lavayiyat kwusuya; nihqe ayaiwyuṅqamuy wáṅwayyaqe, a’nö wuvahtotat, pāpu puma Jesus natṅwaniyat aṅ qa yuaatotaniqat amumi paṅqaqwat mātapya.
Noqw puma hahlayk̇ahk̇aṅw moṅwtsovawtaqamuy amuṅaqw ahpiyya, kurs puma nuhtum put natṅwaniyat ep hamanhintsaniwyaniqey hihk̇ay’vayaqe ōviy’o.
Noqw puma nāqavo God kīyat ep‐nik̇aṅw pu sohsovik kīnawit Jesus pas Christ‐nihqat tūtutuqaynayaqey, pu yuaatotaqey qa qe’iwwisa.
Noqw ephaqam tuptsiwni’yunqam wūhaq’iwmaqw, Greek‐sinmuy amuhkwa yuaatotaqam Hebrew‐sinmuy amumiq qayan unaṅway hiṅqaqwa, puma nāqavo hihta akw tūvaaṅwank̇ahk̇aṅw pumuy amuṅaqw koṅnanalvutuy tatami’yuṅqw ōviy’o.
Pahsat pu pakwt lȫq sihk̇ay’taqam ayaiwyuṅqam sohsokmuy tuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy tsovalayaqe, amumi paṅqaqwa: Soon tis pi itam God lavayiyat mātavi’k̇ahk̇aṅw tūnopni’yuṅqw pam súantani.
Oviy uma umuṅaqw hakimuy tsaṅe’ tahtaqtuy amumi lomanavotit namorstotani, hakim Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuyqawiwyuṅqamuyu, pu suan wuwni’yuṅqamuyu. Noqw puma it yantaqat aw tunatyawyuṅwniqat itam ep pumuy o’yani.
Nīk̇aṅw itamwat nāwakinpit, pu lavayit tumalay’yuṅwniqey aw‐sa yuki’yuṅwni.
Noqw i’ yan lavayi sohsokmuy sinmuy amumi lomatöqti. Noqw ōviy puma hakiy Stephen qapēvewnit, pu Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuyqawiwtaqat namorstota, pu Philip, pu Prochorus, pu Nicanor, pu Timon, pu Parmenias, pu Nicolas, pam hak Antioch aṅqwnihqe qa‐Jew‐sínonik̇aṅw Jew‐sinmuy amún tuptsiwni’ta.
Nihqe puma ayaiwyuṅqamuy amutpipo pumuy o’ya. Noqw puma amumi matyawk̇ahk̇aṅw, amuṅem nānawakna.
Noqw God lavayiat suyhtsepṅwat öqawi’ma, noqw wūhaqti; noqw God awwat momṅwituy amuṅaqw k̇aysiwhqam it tuptsiwnit kwusuyaqe aṅ hinwisa.
Noqw Stephen qapēvewnit, pu öqalat akw qaöwíhink̇aṅw sinmuy amuhpa’ hīhihta k̇ātatayhpit hintsaki, pu hihta supsiwyuṅqata.
Noqw tsotsvalki Mātaviwyaqamuy Tsotsvalkiamu yan túṅwantiwhqat aṅqw hakim hoṅvaqe Stephen amum nāṅwuy’yuṅwa, pu Cyreniat aṅqw sínomu, pu Alexandriat aṅq’ö, pu Ciliciat‐nik̇aṅw Asiat aṅq’ö.
Noqw Stephen Hikwsit ahpiy suan lavayhtiṅwuniqw, puma kurs hin put áṅwutotani.
Pahsat pu puma hakimuy tahtaqtuy pan unaṅwtoynayaqw, puma paṅqaqwa: Itam aw tūqayyuṅqw Moses aqw qalomáhiṅqawu, pu God aqw’a.
Kitotaqe sinmuy hin unaṅwtoynaya, pu wukw’a’yatuyu, pu tutavot tutuqaynayaqamuyu. Noqw puma Stephen aw ö́kihqe, ṅuayaqe, moṅwtsovawtaqamuy amumi wikvaya.
Nihqe hakim put ehpewi hihta atsátotaniqamuy momi o’yaqw puma paṅqaqwa: Pas i’ tāqa panis tuwat it pas k̇aptsiwtaqat kīhut, pu hin hinwisniqat tutavot aqw qalomáhiṅqawlawu;
Oviy pi itam aw tūqayyuṅqw, paṅqawu: Yaw i’ Jesus Nazareth aṅqw tāqa it kīhut sahpuknani, pu yaw Moses itamumi itahhintsakpiy tutaptaqat aw alöṅtani.
Noqw moṅwtsovawtaqam sohsoyam Stephen aw tāyuṅqw, pas pitsáṅwaat hakiy God hoṅviayayat taywayat anta.
Pahsat pu God awwat mohpeq moṅwi Stephen aw paṅqawu: Ya pas pay ima hiṅqaqwaqw panta?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Tahtaqtu, isinomu, itanamu, kurs huvam tuqayvastotaa! Ura itana Abraham nāt Charran ep qa qátuhqe, Mesopotamiat ep qatuqw, God lolmat tālawṅwat pitsáṅway’taqa put aw mātakti;
Nihqe aw paṅqawu: Um uhtutskway, pu uhsinomuy amuṅaqw ahpiyni; nen nu tutskwat uṅ āawnaniqat um aqwni.
Pahsat pu pam Chaldia‐sinmuy tutskwayamuy aṅqw ahpiynihqe, Charran‐tutskwat ep qatuptu. Noqw put naat mokq paṅqw pu God it tutskwat uma ep pu’ yesqat aw put nahlakna.
Nīk̇aṅw pam pep hihsaqhaqam himuy’taniqat pam put qa maqa; pas qae, qa ṅas’ew haqami wuhkukniqat pahsaq’a; nīk̇aṅw pam put pas máqaniqey aw paṅqawu pu’ aṅk put ahpiy sinototiniqamuyu. Noqw puma put himuy’yuṅwni, put aw kita, nāt pam qa ti’taq’ö.
Nihqe God yan lavayhti: Yaw put ahpiy aniwhtotiqam haqam qa nāp tutskway ep hinnumyani; noqw yaw pep sinom pumuy tusoqtuwiktotani; nen súnat‐sikip sunat yahsaṅwuy aṅ pumuy okiwsahsanyani.
Pu ason hihtuwat sinom pumuy tusoqtuwiki’yuṅqw nu pumuy amuṅem hinwat yúkuni, kita God; pu ason pantaqat atsva puma paṅqw nóṅak̇e’, yep nuy tumalay’yuṅwi.
Noqw God put aw pasiwnaqe, poṅotkituvoyla put tuawi’taniqat pan put aw yuku; noqw ōviy Isaac tihtiwhq, Abraham nanalsikis talqat ep put poṅotku; noqw Isaac Jacob pantsana; noqw Jacob pakwt lȫq sihkay’taqamuy timuy piw pantsanhta. Noqw puma hapi itahwu’yamu.
Noqw wūwuyom Joseph atsviy unaṅtuyvayaqe, Egypt aqw put huyaya; noqw God put amum yantaqe,
Sohsok kānanvotpiyat aṅqw put ayo tavi’ma; pu Egypt epeq moṅwit Pharoaht aw put lomamataqta, pu súanwuwnitoyna. Noqw pam put Egypt aw moṅwtavi, pu put amum ki’yuṅqamuy sohsokmuy amumii.
Noqw Egypt aṅ ahsupoq tsö́ṅösti, pu Chanaan aṅ’a, noqw sinom okiwhtoti; noqw itanam qa tunöstutwa.
Noqw yaw Egypt epeq söhövosi óyihqat Jacob navotqe, mohti itanamuy paṅsoq hōna.
Nit pu piw yaw Joseph haknihqey pāvamuy āawna; noqw Joseph sinomat hákimyaqey Pharaoht āawniwa.
Pahsat pu Joseph nay Jacob wáṅwayi, pu sohsokmuy sinomuyu, payhp sunat‐nik̇aṅw aṅqw pakwt tsivot sihk̇aytaqamuyu.
Noqw ōviy Jacob Egypt aqw’a; nihqe pam pepeq mōki, pam’i pu itanamu.
Noqw pumuy tokoyamuy Sychem aw kiwisqe, pep tuamqölöt aqw taṅatota, ura Abraham Sychem ep hakiy Emmor tímuyatuy amuṅaqw sīvat akw put tuihqat paṅsoq’a.
Noqw hihta awinit God Abraham aw qaöwívasiwnaqat aw hayiṅwtiqw, sinom Egypt epeq natkototaqe suhpanti.
Noqw pas suhk̇a moṅwi Joseph qa tuwi’taqa moṅwqenit ep wunuptu.
Nihqe pam hak itanamuy amumi tutuhistivaqe pumuy okiwsahsanqw, yaw timat qa yesniqat ōviy puma titipostuy ihk̇e tatamlalwaniqat pam nāwakna.
Pan yēsiwhq, Moses tihtiwa; nihqe yaw súhimu; nihqe payhkomuy mūmuyawhtuy aṅ nay kīyat ep aw unaṅwtaviwta.
Noqw pam haqami tūviwhq, Pharaoht tiat māna put wikqe, put nēṅem wuṅwna.
Noqw Moses Egypt epeq sinmuy hihta wuwantuwiyamuy aṅ sohsok tuwi’taqe, a’nö lay’taqat lavayi’ta, pu hintsakpit’a.
Noqw pam lȫp sunat yahsaṅwni’k̇aṅw, pas nāp sinomuy, Israel‐sinmuy, amumi kurs pohtaniqey unaṅwti.
Noqw suhk̇a qaanhintsahtsaniwhq, pam túwahqe eṅem lavayhti; nihqe eṅem nāoyhqe Egypt‐sinot nīna.
Suhpan as God put ahpiy put sinomuyatuy ayo óyaniqat puma māmatsyaniqat pam wūwaqe ōviy’o. Noqw puma qa māmatsya.
Pu qavoṅvaqw hakim nāyawhq, pam amumi pítuhqe as piw pumuy nāmi pö́hiknaniqey wūwaqe amumi paṅqawu: Soh, tāqatu, uma nātupkomu; ya uma hinoqw nāyuyuyhna?
Noqw sinosṅway qaanhintsahtsanqa Moses ayo naatsqöqna paṅqawk̇aṅwo: Ya hak uṅ itamumi moṅwtavi? Puyaw hak uṅ itamuy hin yukunaniqat aw uṅ tavi?
Ya um tāvok Egypt‐sinot nīnaqe, nuy piw nīnaniqe ōviy’o?
Yan pam hiṅqawhq, pahsat pu Moses Egypt aṅqw wāyaqe, Madian‐tutskwat ep qatuptu; nihqe pam pep lȫqmuy tīyotuy tímuy’va.
Noqw lȫp sunat yahsaṅwuy aṅ ruhpakq, pep pu’ qayēsiwhpuve tūkwit Sinat ep Tutuyqawhqat hoṅviayaat himutskit uwiwitaqat aṅqw put aw mātakti.
Noqw Moses put túwahqe, pep himu hintaqat aw wūwantaqe, as aw tātayniqe, ōviy aw nakwsuqw, Tutuyqawhqat tönaat put aw paṅqawu:
Nu hapi umunamuy aw yantaqaam God, Abraham aw yantaqaata, pu Isaac, pu Jacob aw yantaqaamu. Pahsat pu Moses tsawnaqe tururuykuqe, kurs hin aw tātayni.
Pahsat pu Tutuyqawhqa put aw paṅqawu: Um uhtotsiy óyani, taq um pas hihta ep wunu.
Pay nu pas Egypt epeq isinmuy okiwhinyuṅqat antsa yori; pu nu pumuy eykitotaqw navota. Nihqe nu pumuy put aṅqw qenivo oyaniqe ōviy hāwi. Noqw taa, nu uṅ Egypt aqw hōnani.
It Moses hapi ura puma qanānakwhaqe aw paṅqaqwa: Ya hak uṅ itamumi moṅwtavi? Puyaw hak uṅ itamuy hin yukunaniqat aw uṅ tavi? Ura kitota. Noqw pay God put moṅwtavi; piw pam sinomuyatuy amumi put ayata, pam hoṅviayat himutskit aṅqw put aw mātaqtiqat māyat ahpiy pumuy ayo ōoyniqat ōviy’o.
Pam hapi Egypt epeq hīhihta k̇ātatayhpit hihta tuawi’yuṅqat tumaltat, pumuy paṅqw ipwa, pu patuphat Pālaṅpu yan mātsiwhqat aṅqee, pu qayēsiwhpuvee, lȫp sunat yahsaṅwuy aṅ’a.
I’ Moses hapi ura Israel‐sinmuy amumi paṅqawu: God Umuhtutuyqawhqa umuhsinomuy amuṅaqw umuṅem lavay’ayat wunuptsinani, nuy hímunihqat pan’i; uma put aw tūqayyuṅwni.
I’ hapi qayesiwhpuve tsovawtaqamuy amumum hinnuma, pu tūkwit Sinat epeq put aw yuaaykuqat hoṅviayat ámuma, pu itanamuy amumuma. I’ hapi hak taytaqat lavayit itamumi mātapniqey ōviy put makiwa.
Noqw itanam put aw qa tuqayvastotaniqey nānawaknaqe, put nahpiy ayo tūvayaqe, unaṅwpeq ahoy Egypt aw namtökya;
Nihqe Aaron aw paṅqaqwa: Itamuy hihtuy amumi yanyuṅwniqamuy itamuṅem yukuhtaa; noqw puma itamupyeve hinwisni. Pay pi itamuy Egypt aṅqw nö́ṅaknaqa Moses kurs haqamii, kitota.
Nihqe ép puma wakashoyat yukuyaqe, wutsit aw hom’ooyyak̇ahk̇aṅw, nāp may akw hihta tumaltotaqey ep hahlayya.
Pahsat pu God pumuy amuṅaqw ayo namtökqe, ōvaqe hihtuy qaan’ewakw hintaqamuy amumi nāwakinwisniqat aw pumuy mātavi; pay pi ura God lavay’aymuyatuy pēniyamuy aṅ yan pey’ta: Ya pas antsa pay uma lȫp sunat yahsaṅwuy aṅ qayēsiwhpuve inumi hihtuy qö́yank̇ahk̇aṅw, hom’ooyya, uma Israel‐sinomu?
Qa hin’i; uma Moloch mötsápkiyat yawnumya, pu aw umuhyantaqay Remphan sōhuyata; uma hihtuy pumuy amún sosniwyaqamuy yukuhtota amumi nāwakintotaniqe ōviy’o. Noqw ōviy nu umuy Babylon yupqöymiq tsamni, yan’i.
Itanam pi ura qayēsiwhpuve hihta tuawi’taqat mötsápkit pasiwyuṅwa, hin pam Moses aw tutaptaqat pan’i. Nihqe ura Moses aw paṅqawu pam hin yukiwtaqat aw yórikqey pan put yúkuniqata.
Noqw pu amuṅk itanam Joshuat amum hīhihtuy sinmuy tutskwayamuy kwahanayaqe, ep put kwusivaya, ura God itanamuy amupyeve pumuy haqami lālayi; noqw mötsápkihu David qatsíyat aw pahsavo pep wunu.
Noqw pam God aṅqw paaṅwaniwhq, as Jacob aw yantaqayat God eṅem kītaniqey unaṅwti.
Noqw Solomon hapi put eṅem kīta.
Noqw pu pas Sus’oveqnihqa kīkihut sinmuy māyamuy akw yukiltotiqat qa aṅ qatu; pi ura God lavay’ayay ahpiy paṅqawu:
Oveqatsi imoṅw’atsvewa, pu tūwaqatsi iwuwukpi. Ya uma inuṅem kīhut yukuyani? kita Tutuyqawhqa. Ya sen nu pep nāsuṅwnani?
Ya īi himu qa sohsoy imay akw yukilti?
Is uma hihtu qa ṅöyaltotiṅwuqamu, a’nö unaṅway’yuṅqamu, pu naqsöp’iwyuṅqamu! uma sutsep Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit aw rohomnumya; uma umunamuy hinyuṅqw amunyuṅwa.
Ya umunam God lavay’aymuyatuy hihtawat qa okiwsasna? Pu ura hak Súantaqa pituniqat hakim aṅwu pay lavayhtotiqamuy puma qöqya; noqw yepehaq uma put nuhtumi mātapyaqe nīnaya.
Uma as ōveqatsit aṅqw hoṅvia’yatuy amuhpiy tutavot ömahtotak̇aṅw, qa aṅ hinwisa, kita.
Noqw puma it nanaptaqe, pavan pas unaṅwso’qe, tamay ṅuritota.
Noqw pam Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuyqawiwk̇aṅw ōveqatsit aqwhaqami taytaqe, God lolmat tālawṅwayat‐nik̇aṅw pu Jesus God putvaqe wunuqw tuwa;
Nihqe paṅqawu: Meh, nu ōveqatsit aw hötsíltiqw tuwa; noqw Sinot Tiat God putvaqe wunu.
Pahsat pu puma a’nö hiṅqawk̇ahk̇aṅw, naqvuy útatotat, sūsaq put aw yuhtukqe,
Put kīṅaqw haqami tūvayaqe, tatatupya. Noqw put ehpewi hiṅqaqwaqam hakiy puhuwuṅwiwtaqat Saul yan mātsiwhqat kukmiq yuwsiy o’ya.
Noqw puma Stephen tatatupyaqw, pam God aw okiw taqa’naṅwtiqe paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa Jesus, um okiw ihikwsiy kwusuni, kita.
Pu pam tamötswunuptuqe, pas tönay aṅqe’ paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, um okiw it qaanhtiput pumuy qa tukopnani, kita. Yan pam lavayhtit mōki.
Noqw puma put nīnantotaqw, Saul amún unaṅway’ta. Noqw put tāwat ep Jerusalem epeq Jesus aw tōnawtaqamuy amumi qaan’ewakw hintsaktivayaqe, pumuy okiwsahsantivaya. Noqw puma sohsoyam Judeat, pu Samariat aṅ ahsupoq hāhaqe’ ahtsavalya, pay ima ayaiwyuṅqam‐sa qe’ya.
Noqw hakim unaṅwvastahtaqt Stephen haqami taviwisqe, okiw put ep a’nö tsaykita.
Noqw tuwat Saul Jesus aw tōnawtaqamuy amumi hintsaktivaqe, sohsovik kīnawit papkinuma, nihqe tahtaqtuy, pu momoymuy sivikimi lölökinlawhqe, taṅatima.
Noqw ōviy aṅqe’ ahtsavalyaqam sohsovik nuhtumi lavayit yuaatota.
Pahsat pu Philip Samariat ep wuhkokitsokit aqwnihqe, nuhtumi Christ yuaata.
Noqw pam hihta yuaataqw, sinom aw tūqayk̇ahk̇aṅw sun unaṅway put aw unaṅwtavi’yuṅwa, hihta k̇ātatayhpit supsiwyuṅqat hintsakqat aw tayk̇ahk̇aṅwo,
Pas qalomáhihikwsim pumuy akw tuyqawiwyuṅqamuy k̇aysiwhqamuy amuṅaqw a’nö hiṅqawk̇ahk̇aṅw, nȫṅantaqw ōviy’o; pu k̇aysiwhqam amuhpa’ qataytaqat tūtuyyaqam, pu qayaktaqam qalaptuya.
Noqw pep kitsókit ep sinom pas pavan hinhaqam hahlayya.
Noqw hak tāqa Simon yan mātsiwhqa pay hisat mohti pep kitsókit ep tuhisay hintsaki; nihqe Samariat ep sinmuy pas hintsani’ta; pas a’nö hímunihqey anta.
Noqw sohsoyam put aw tūqayyuṅwa, sushin’ewakw aṅqw suspavannihqat aqw pahsavoo, paṅqawk̇ahk̇aṅwo: I’ tāqa God a’nö öqalaata, kitota;
Nihqe puma put k̇aptsi’yuṅwa, pam hisatṅahaqaqw tuhisay akw pumuy hintsani’taqw ōviy’o.
Noqw Philip God moṅwtunatyayat, pu Jesus Christ yuaataqw puma tūtuptsiwaqe, kūyit akw tuvoylatoti, tahtaqtu, pu momoyamu.
Noqw Simon tuwat pas nāp tuptsiwhqe, kūyit akw tuvoylatiwa; nihqe Philip amum hinnuma. Noqw pam hīhihta kātatayhpit hihta tuawi’yuṅqat hintsakq aw taytaqe k̇ātayta.
Noqw yaw Samariat ep sinom God lavayiyat kwusuyaqat ayaiwyuṅqam Jerusalem epeq yesqam nanaptaqe, Peter John enaṅ pumuy amumiq hōnaya.
Noqw puma pumuy amumiqnihqe, puma Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit kwusuyaniqat ōviy amuṅem nāwakna,
Pay nāt pam pumuy qa haqawat aw pituqw ōviy’o, pay panis puma Tutuyqawhqat natṅwaniyat‐sa aṅ kūyit akw tuvoylatoti.
Pahsat pu puma pumuy amumi may akw toṅokq puma Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit makiwya.
Noqw ayaiwtaqam hakiy aw may akw toṅokq Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit put aw noiwṅwuqat Simon pan yórikqe pumuy sīvat āawna,
Paṅqawk̇aṅwo: Uma piw nuy enaṅ it öqalat maqaqw, nu hakiy aw imay akw toṅokq pam Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit makiwmantani.
Noqw Peter put aw paṅqawu: Pay nam uhsiva umum súlawhtii, God kuwahtipuat pay sīvat akw tuiwṅwuqat um pan wūwantaqw ōviy’o.
Um qa haqam it yantaqat ep qeni’ta, piw makiway’ta, pi uh’unaṅwa God atpip qa súanta.
Oviy um it yan uhnukpanay aṅqw lasni; nen God aw nāwaknani; noqw hisnen uh’unaṅwpeq uhtunatyay qaantaqat ep ūmi pö́hikiwni.
Taq kurs um qanut a’nö tsīvot anta; um nukpantunatyat akw sóontsaniwta.
Pahsat pu Simon lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Uma okiw inuṅem Tutuyqawhqat aw nāwaknani; noqw uma īit hihta lavayhtiqw, okiw pam qa himuwa inumi pítuni.
Pu puma pas suyan hin navoti’taqey lavayhtit, Tutuyqawhqat lavayiyat nuhtumi yuaaykut, ahoy Jerusalem aqw’a; nihqe Samariat ep hāhaqe’ sinmuy kitsókiyamuy aṅ lomatuawit yuaatima.
Noqw Tutuyqawhqat hoṅviayaat Philip aw paṅqawu: Um wunuptut tātöqni, Jerusalem aṅqw Gazat aqw pöhut aqw’a, kita. Pam paṅqe’ qayēwiwa.
Noqw pam wunuptut aqw’a. Noqw meh, hak Ethiopiat aṅqw tāqa okiwlawniqe Jerusalem epeq pitumaqa paṅqe’ áhoynik̇aṅw, karētay aṅqw tsokiwma. Pam nömaqtsit aw qa awiwa, Ethiopiat epeq sinmuy moṅwíyamuy wuhtit Candacet aṅqw öqalat qaöwívasiwk̇aṅw, put sohsok hihta nukṅwayat aw tunatyawta. Pu pam God lavay’ayayat Esaias pēniyat aṅ túṅwanma.
<range>
Pahsat pu Hikwsi Philip aw paṅqawu: Um pas awnen karētat ámumni, kita.
Noqw ōviy Philip put aw wárikqe, navotq pam God lavay’ayayat Esaias pēniyat aṅ túṅwanma. Noqw Philip put aw paṅqawu: Ya um hihta aṅ túṅwanmaqey mātsi’ta?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Pay kurs pi hin’i, hal pay hak pas nuy tutuqaynaqw‐saa, pam kítahqe, Philip put aqw wūve’, amum tsokiwmaniqat pam nāwakna.
Noqw tutuvenit aṅ haqe’ yan pey’taqat pam aṅ túṅwanma: Kanēlo haqam nīniwniqey aw wīkiwhqat pam pan wīkiwa, pu mañat ārilantaqat pam atpip qa hiṅqawṅwuniqw pan pam qa hiṅqawu.
Pam qa hímuniwhtiqw, eṅem suan lavayiniqa ayo yukiwa; noqw hak sen put natkomuyatuy pohtoylani? Pi qatsíat tūwaqatsit aṅqw haqami hintsaniwa.
Noqw nömaqtsit aw qa awiwa Philip aw paṅqawu: Taa, um as okiw nuy āawnani: Ya God lavay’ayaat hakiy yuaata, sen nāyuaata, sen pay hakiy paṅqawu?
Pahsat pu Philip lavayhtiqe, haqe’ pan pey’taqat pahpiy yuaativa; nihqe put aw Jesus yuaata.
Noqw puma ahpiy panmak̇aṅw haqami pāmi pitu; noqw nömaqtsit aw qa awiwa paṅqawu: Meh, yep pāhu; ya nu kūyit akw tuvoylatiwniqw himu nuy put aw uhtsi’tani?
Noqw Philip paṅqawu: Pay pi um pas sohsok uh’unaṅway akw tuptsiwe’, panhtini, kita. Noqw pam lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay Jesus Christ God tíatnihqat nu tuptsiwa.
Pahsat pu pay karēta hāk huruhtiniqat pam paṅqawu; noqw puma nāma pāmiq paki, Philip‐niqw pu nömaqtsit aw qa awiwa; noqw pam put kūyit akw tuyoylata.
Noqw puma pāṅaqw yamakq, pahsat pay Tutuyqawhqat Hikwsiat Philip haqami wīki; noqw nömaqtsit aw qa awiwa pāpu aw qa yori; nīk̇aṅw pam pahpiy hahlayhk̇aṅw, nakwsu.
Noqw Philip Azotus ep nātuwiwhqe, ahsupoq kitsókit aṅ lomatuawit yuaatinumk̇aṅw, Caesareat ep pitu.
Noqw Saul nāt pas itsívuhihkwisk̇aṅw, Tutuyqawhqat aw tuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy pavan pas hintsanniqey, pu pas qö́yaniqey tunatyawk̇aṅw, God awwat susmohpeq moṅwit aw’i;
Nihqe Damascus ep aṅqe’ tsotsvalkit aṅ sinmuy amumi put eṅem pēnayaniqat nāwakna; noqw kurs pam hakimuy tahtaqtuy, sen momoymuy Jesus aw tuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy tuwe’, pumuy somhtat, Jerusalem aqw tsamni.
Noqw ōviy pam paṅsoqnihqe, Damascus aw hayiṅwnaqw, ōṅaqw tāla put ánan’ik suhtalawva;
Noqw pam tutskwami posqe, hakiy tönayat navotq, put aw paṅqawu: Saul, Saul, ya um hinoqw nuy okiwsahsana?
Noqw pam paṅqawu: Ya um hak’i, Tutuyqawhqa? Noqw Tutuyqawhqa paṅqawu: Nu Jesus, um nuy hapi okiwsahsana. Um sökwíkinpit aqw horarataqw, pam uṅem anahaa.
Noqw pam tsawnaqe, tururutik̇aṅw, pas hin unaṅway’k̇aṅw paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, noqw nu hinhtiniqat um nāwakna? Noqw Tutuyqawhqa put aw paṅqawu: Um wunuptut, kīmini; noqw ason um hinhtiniqat uṅ pep āawnayani.
Noqw tahtaqt put ámumyaqam qa hiṅqawk̇ahk̇aṅw aṅqe’ hōñi; hakiy as tönayat nanvotyak̇ahk̇aṅw hakiy qa tuway’yuṅwa.
Pahsat pu Saul tutskwaṅaqw wunuptuqe, as pōsiy púruknat, qa hihta tuwa; noqw puma put māyat ṅuy’wisqe, Damascus ep wikvaya.
Noqw pam pāyis tālat aṅ kurs hin hihta túwani, piw qa nȫsa, qa hīko.
Noqw hak tuptsiwni’taqa Ananias yan mātsiwhqa Damascus ep qatu. Noqw pam tuawyorikq, Tutuyqawhqa put aw paṅqawu: Ananias, Noqw pam paṅqawu: Yep nūu, Tutuyqawhqa.
Noqw Tutuyqawhqa put aw paṅqawu: Um wunuptut, Sūwipo kisk̇at yan mātsiwhqat awni; nen Judas kīyat ep hakiy Tarsus aṅqwnihqat Saul yan mātsiwhqat ōviy tūvintani; taq meh, pam okiwlawu,
Nihqe tuawyorikq hak tāqa Ananias yan mātsiwhqa ep pákihqe, put aw may akw toṅo pōsiy tālawnaniqat ōviy’o.
Pahsat pu Ananias lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Tutuyqawhqa, pas yaw i’ tāqa Jerusalem epeq uhsinmuy okiwsahsanqat nu k̇aysiwhqamuy amuṅaqw navota.
Noqw yaw pam yep uhnatṅwaniy aw tatqa’naṅwyaqamuy sohsokmuy somhtaniqey God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy öqalat pasiwk̇aṅw pitu.
Noqw pay Tutuyqawhqa put aw paṅqawu: Um awni, taq pam pas inamors’awiwa; pam qa‐Jew‐sinmuy, pu pas momṅwituy‐nik̇aṅw, pu Israel‐sinmuy amumi inatṅwaniy tūawmani.
Pu nāt pam inatṅwaniy ep hīhihta aṅ qaan’ewakw okiwsaniwniqat nu put āawnani, kita.
Noqw ōviy Ananias awnihqe, kīmi pákihqe, put aw may akw toṅot, paṅqawu: Itupko Saul, Tutuyqawhqa Jesus uṅ aṅqaqwniqw ūmi mātaktiqa nuy aṅqw hōna, umuhposiy tālawnaniqat ōviy’o, pu Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuyqawiwtaniqat ōviy’o.
Noqw pahsat pay himu nasiṅwput antaqa put pōsiyat aṅqw löhökq, pam pōsiy tālawnaqe wunuptu; nihqe kūyit akw tuvoylatit, nösqe, öqawhta.
Pahsat pu Saul Damascus ep tuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy amumum hihsavo qatu,
Nihqe āpiy tsotsvalkiva i’ Jesus God Tíatnihqat yuaatinuma.
Noqw sohsoyam put aw tūqayyuṅqam hin kurs wūwantotaqe paṅqaqwa: Ya qa i’ Jerusalem epeq it natṅwanit aw tatqa’naṅwyaqamuy hovalaqe, hakimiy panyuṅqamuy somhte’ God awwat mohpeq momṅwituy amumi tsamniqe ōviy pew pitsíwta? kitota.
Noqw tuwat Saul pas suyhtsepṅwat öqawi’maqe, Damascus ep Jew‐sinmuy yumoṅwaltaqe, pay Jesus pas antsa Christ‐nihqat amumi mātaqlawu.
Noqw ōviy ahpiy wūyavotiqw, Jew‐sinom put nīnayaniqey nanawinya.
Nihqe puma put nīnayaniqe ōviy tālö‐nik̇aṅw, pu tōkilat aṅ höhtsiwat aw tunatyawyuṅwa. Noqw yaw puma put moqmani’yuṅqw Saul navota.
Pahsat pu tuptsiwni’yuṅqam míhikiwtaqw put tuhpelat aṅ tutsáyat akw hawnaya.
Noqw Saul Jerusalem epeq pítuhqe, as tuptsiwni’yuṅqamuy amumumtiniqey anhtiqw, puma sohsoyam put mamqasyaqe, pam pas antsa tuptsiwni’taqat qa tūtuptsiwa.
Noqw Barnabas put aw unaṅwtapqe, ayaiwyuṅqamuy amumi put wikva; nihqe hin pam Damascus aqwniqw, Tutuyqawhqa put aw namtaknaqe, put aw yuaaykuqat pam pumuy āawna, pu hin Paul Damascus epeq qa tuhtusk̇aṅw, Jesus natṅwaniyat aṅ nuhtumi yuaataqata. (Noqw pep pu’ puma put kwusuya.)
Noqw Paul Jerusalem epeq pumuy amumum hinnumqe,
Qa tuhtusk̇aṅw Tutuyqawhqat Jesus natṅwaniyat aṅ nuhtumi yuaata; nihqe Greek‐sinmuy amuhkwa yuaatotaqamuy amumum put ep nāṅwuy’taqw puma put nīnayaniqey tunatyawyuṅwa.
Noqw tuptsiwni’yuṅqam put nanaptaqe, Caesareat aqw put wikyaqe paṅqw put Tarsus aqw taviya.
Pahsat pu Jesus aw tōnawtaqam Judeat, pu Galileet, pu Samariat aṅ ahsupoq yesqam suyan unaṅwtotiqe, öqawhtota; nihqe Tutuyqawhqat k̇aptsi’k̇ahk̇aṅw wūhaq’iwma, Qahováriwtaqa Hikwsi amumi unaṅwtapq’ö.
Noqw Peter aṅqe’ sohsovik nakwsuqe, Lyddat epeq God sinomuyatuy amumi hāwi.
Nihqe pepeq pam hakiy tāqat Aeneas yan mātsiwhqat tuwa, put hakiy ahpa qa taytaqw, pam okiw nanal yahsaṅwuy aṅ tuyhqatsi.
Noqw Peter put aw paṅqawu: Aeneas, Jesus Christ uṅ qalaptsina. Wunuptut, uh’ahpay tsovalaa, kita. Noqw pahsat pay pam wunuptu.
Noqw sohsoyam Lyddat pu Saron ep ki’yuṅqam put aw yórikyaqe Tutuyqawhqat awwat lasya.
Noqw hak Joppat ep tuptsiwni’taqa Tabitha yan mātsiwa, pam Dorcas (Tsöviwmana) i’nihqe pam’i. Noqw i’ hak wuhti lolmat tumalay’ta, pu hīhihta akw tūvaaṅwanta.
Noqw pam ephaqam tūtuyhtiqe mōki; noqw puma put pāhomyaqe tupatsveq taviya.
Noqw pay pi Lydda Joppat áhayhpo; noqw yaw Peter pep qátuhqat tuptsiwni’yuṅqam nanaptaqe, hakimuy lȫqmuy tāqatuy paṅso ayatotaqw, pam qa sȫwunit, pumuy amuminiqat puma nāwakna.
Pahsat pu Peter nakwsuqe, pumuy amumuma. Noqw ōviy pam pituqw, puma put tupatsmiq wupnaya; noqw sohsoyam koṅnanalvut okiw put aqlap hoṅqe, tsaykik̇ahk̇aṅw nāt Dorcas pumuy amumum qátuhqe kwakwsat, pu yūyuwsit yukuhtaqat puma put aw matamintota.
Noqw pay Peter pumuy sohsokmuy paṅqw ipwat, tamötswunuptut nāwakna; nit pahsat put tokoyat aw namtökt paṅqawu: Tabitha, qatuptuu. Noqw pam pōsiy púruknaqe, Peter túwahqe, pahsat qatuptu.
Noqw pam put aw māvuyaltiqe, wunuptsinaqe, God sinomuyatuy koṅnanalvutuy enaṅ wáṅwayhqe, pumuy put āawna, kurs pam taytaq’ö.
Noqw i’ yantaqa Joppat aṅ ahsupoq nanaptiwhq, k̇aysiwhqam Tutuyqawhqat aw tūtuptsiwa.
Noqw Peter Joppat ep hakiy pūvuk̇at pöhiwantaqat Simon amum wūhakis qatu.
Noqw hak tāqa Cornelius yan mātsiwhqa, tsivót‐sikip sunat solāwamuy Italian‐sínomu yan túṅwantiwyaqamuy amumi moṅwi, Caesareat ep ki’ta.
Pam hak pās unaṅway qatu; noqw sohsoyam timat put amum God k̇aptsi’yuṅwa; pu pam hihta himuy akw sinmuy paaṅwank̇aṅw, sutsep God aw nāwakinma.
Pam hak tāwat atvelpeniqwhaqam pas suyan tūawtaqw, God hoṅviayaat put aw pákihqe, aw paṅqawu: Cornelius.
Noqw pam put aw yórikqe, tsawnaqe, paṅqawu: Ya hímuu, Tutuyqawhqa? Noqw pam put aw paṅqawu: Uhnawakinpi, pu uhnuoktutmala ōmi yayvaniwhq, God put soon suhtokni.
Noqw ōviy um hakimuy tahtaqtuy Joppat aqw ayataqw, hakiy Simon, Peter yan piw mātsiwhqat, wáṅwayyani.
Pam hakiy pūvuk̇at pöhiwantaqat Simon amum qatuqw, put kīat pātuwaqatsit qalaveq wunu. Ason pam hin hintaniqat ūmi paṅqawni.
Pu ōviy hoṅviaya Cornelius aw yuaaykuqa ahpiyniqw, pam lȫqmuy kiy ep tumal’aymuy wáṅwayi, pu solāwam put eṅem hihtayaniqe sutsep aw maqaptsi’yuṅqamuy amuṅaqw hak God k̇aptsi’taqat solāwa pīwu.
Nihqe pam pumuy sohsok īit āawnat, Joppat aqw hōna.
Noqw qavoṅvaqw puma aqwyaqe, kīmi hayiṅwni’wisq, Peter nāwaknaniqe tāwanasave kits’omiq wūvi.
Noqw pas pam tsöṅmokqe, as hihta nösniqey antaqw, nāto novalalwaqw, pam pay sawitoqwhinhti;
Nihqe ōmi hötsíltiqw tuwaqw, aṅqw himu wuyaqmötsapueway nālövaq tsukuveq som’iwk̇aṅw put aw hawtoqe, tutskwami hāwi.
Noqw sohsoy hihtu tūwaqatsit aṅ nālöq hok̇ay’yuṅqam put ep íniwyuṅwa, pu tūtuvosiptu, pu hihtu hoyoyotinumyaqam pīwu, pu masay’yuṅqamu.
Noqw hakiy tönaat put aw paṅqawu: Wunuptuu, Peter, um qöye’ nösni.
Noqw Peter paṅqawu: Sóoni, Tutuyqawhqa; taq nu qa haq hihta pay qa pas hihtanihqat, pu qa powaiwtaqat nȫsa.
Noqw hakiy tönaat piw put aw paṅqawu: God hihta powataqw, pam pay qa pas hímunihqat um qa paṅqawni.
Noqw i’ pāyis panhtiqw, himu mötsápueway ahoy ōmiq haqami wūvi.
Noqw Peter hihta tuawyorikqey mātaq kurs pam hímunihqat pan wūwantaqw, ima tahtaqt Cornelius aṅqw ayatiwyaqam Simon haqam ki’taqat hakimuy tūviṅtotaqe, ihk̇aqe ṅö́yaknit aw hötsíwhpeq hōñi,
Nihqe sen hak Simon, Peter yan piw mātsiwhqat, pep qátuhqat tūviṅlalwa.
Noqw nāt Peter tuawyorikiy aṅ wūwantaqw, Qahováriwtaqa Hikwsi put aw paṅqawu: Meh, hakim pahyom tahtaqt uṅ hepnumya.
Oviy um wunuptut hāwe’, amumumni qa hin wūwank̇aṅwo; pay nu pumuy aṅqw hōna.
Pahsat pu Peter hakimuy Cornelius aṅqw put aw ayatiwyaqamuy amumi hawqe, paṅqawu: Taay, pay uma nuy hepnumya; sen hihta ōviy uma öki.
Noqw puma paṅqaqwa: I’ Cornelius tsivót‐sikip súnatnihqamuy solāwamuy amumi moṅwi God aṅqw hoṅviayat pas hímunihqat ahpiy navota, yaw pam uṅ kiy aw wáṅwaye’, uṅ hin lavayhtiqw, put aw tūqaytaniqat hoṅviaya put aw paṅqawu. Pam tāqa súanta, pu God k̇aptsi’ta, pu Jew‐sinmuy sohsokmuy amuhpiy aw lomanavotiwta.
Pahsat pu pam pumuy taṅataqe pās oya; pu qavoṅvaqw pumuy amumum aqw’a; noqw haqawat tuptsiwni’yuṅqam Joppat aṅqw put ámumya.
Pu ōviy qavoṅvaqw puma Caesareat ep öki. Noqw Cornelius pumuy nuhtaytaqe, kurs sinomuy‐nik̇aṅw pu aṅ pas kwatsmuy tsovala.
Noqw Peter aw pakitoqw, Cornelius ahsawvaqe, atpipo tamötswunuptut, pas put hihtata.
Noqw pay Peter put wunuptsina, paṅqawk̇aṅwo: Wunuptuu, pay nu piw un sino.
Pu ōviy pam put amum yuaatak̇aṅw, aw pakiqw, sinom k̇aysiwhqam tsovawta.
Noqw pam pumuy amumi paṅqawu: Pay pi uma navoti’yuṅqw, soon as hak Jew‐sínonik̇aṅw ayam supwat hihtuy sinmuy amu’puñalṅwu, piw amuminiṅwu. Noqw pay nu’ qa hakiy pay qa hímunihqat, pu qa powaiwtaqat paṅqawlawniqat God inumi paṅqawu.
Noqw ōviy nu qa rohomnumt, panis nuy wiktamayaqw, pay nu aṅq’ö; noqw hinoqw pi uma nuy wáṅwayya?
Noqw Cornelius paṅqawu: Nālötok nu pew pahsavohaqam napwalni’taqe, tāwat atvelpetiqw nu ikiy ep nāwaknaqw, hak tāqa talqaqsalqat yuwsi’k̇aṅw inutpip wunuptu;
Nihqe paṅqawu: Cornelius, uhnawakinpi navotniwa; noqw God soon uhnuoktutmalay suhtokni.
Um ōviy Joppat aqw hakimuy ayataqw, hakiy Simon, Peter yan piw mātsiwhqat, wáṅwayyani. Pam hakiy pūvuk̇at pöhiwantaqat kīyat ep qatu, pātuwaqatsit qalaveq’a; ason pam pite’, ūmi hin lavayhtini, kita.
Noqw ōviy nu qa sȫwunit uṅ wáṅwayi; noqw um súanhtiqe pitu. Noqw ōviy hapi itam sohsoyam yep God atpip yēse, hin pam ūmi tutaptaqat sohsok nanaptaniqee.
Pahsat pu Peter lavayhtiqe paṅqawu: Pay kurs pas suyan God qa sinonuiña.
Pay kurs pas sohsokmuy hihtuy sinmuy amuṅaqw hak haqam put k̇aptsi’k̇aṅw súanhinmaqa put aw súantaṅwu.
God hapi Israel‐sinmuy amumi lavayiy távihqe, Jesus Christ ahpiy namivöhikiwuy yuaata. (Pam hapi sohsokmuy amumi tutuyqawi.)
Pay uma put lavayit navoti’yuṅwa. Ura John kūyit akw tuvoylatiwyaniqat nuhtumi yuaataqw, pahpiy pam lavayi Galileet aṅqw hoyoyoykuk̇aṅw, Judeat aṅ ahsupoq yuaatiwa.
Ura God Nazareth aṅqw tāqat Jesus Qahováriwtaqat Hikwsit akw tuvoylataqe öqalmaqa. Ura pam sinmuy amuhpa’ lolmat tumalay’numa, pu Nukpanat ahpiy sóon’iwyuṅqamuy sohsokmuy powatima, God put ámumniqw ōviy’o.
Noqw pam Jew‐sinmuy tutskwayamuy epnik̇aṅw, pu Jerusalem epeq hihta tumaltaqat itam hapi sohsok aw yóriki’yuṅqe, navoti’yuṅwa; noqw pay sinom himutskit ep put hahyaqe nīnaya.
